1.content:
Here are a few options, Feel free to add to them, or make your own from here.

The Mall: Two guys are trapped in a mall and how will they fair?

The Glitch: A guy gets zapped into a computer program.

The Fantasy: Browsing a comic book store, a guy is suddenly pulled into a work of fiction.

The Thief: On the run, a petty thief is looking for somewhere to hide.
1.title: Options

11.content:
Jake and Evan were two friends in high school, and always hung out at the mall, but sometimes their childish sides got the best of them, like today. They were walking past a teen girl's clothing store, and they had the nasty idea of sneaking into the changing room to see the girls changing. They walked in and went to the dressing room, which was empty, which was odd.

"Hey Jake, doesn't this room seem a bit off to you?" Evan said.

"Naw, let's just get into a room and we can wait for the girls to show up." Jake said.

They walked into a room, that curiously already had clothes in it. They inspected it and noticed that it was a full outfit. It was a bra and panty set, a pink mini-skirt, tan pantyhose, a pink sleeveless peasant top, and pink open toe heels. Suddenly they hear someone coming. Jake hops on top of the seat so that it looks like there's only one person in there. A girl knocks and the boys jump.

"Need any help in there miss?" she asks

Evan, in his best girl voice says "No, I was just making sure I like the colors"

"Okay, take as much time as you need, I'll be right here.

"Shit, we can't leave unless one of us distracts her by dressing like a girl" Jake says. "You have longer hair and a slenderer figure, you should do it"

"Fine, but you owe me big time" Evan says as he dresses himself in the outfit. Feeling ridiculous, but at least looking like a girl he leaves the room to show the salesgirl, you notice that her nametag says Julie. "How do I look?"

"You look great, you know your friend can come out too" she says

"What?"

"I saw you lurking, who do you think cleared the room and left clothes in there?" she says as Jake walks out.

"Uh, uh um..." you say

"Uh huh, now you and your friend have two choices, you can either comply with what I tell you or I cal security and you get arrested"

"I guess that's fair" the both of them say dejectedly.

"Now, would your friend like to get dressed, or shall he get a different punishment?"
11.title: The Mall

111.content:
The girl smiled devilishly as she inspected Jake. "My my my, there are lots of possibilities for you. I could dress you up like your friend here, or perhaps I could dress you up in something else. Im thinking, something with a lot of ruffles and laces. Ooh! Maybe even a diaper! You'd look great in one of those."

Jake gulped. "Can't you just let us go? We promise to be good from now on."

The girl rolled her eyes. "Oh how daft do you think I am? You say you'll be good but you don't mean it. I'm gonna give you guys the whole treatment."

Jake groaned. "Oh damn."

"Actually I think I'll decide this on a coin flip. Heads, like your friend, Tails, get dressed like a sweet little girl." She dug a coin out of her pocket and flipped it into the air.

Jake hope with all his might that the coin would be struck by lighting. Or better yet, the girl.
111.title: Same punishment

choices: A sexy black dress with heels
A schoolgirl outfit with heeled mary janes.

Jake feels him being held down while they give him a complete makeover including hair extensions and makeup until they look like real girls so real you could say you wouldn’t be able to believe that they aren’t. After a few minutes they get off of Jake and Evan “okay girls time to leave and I don’t want to see you again until you have learned your lesson. Do they leave the store or stand up?

Jake takes off his clothes and slides into the panties. Then he pulls the skirt up and then the shirt. He puts on the pantyhose and the shoes and walks out and looks uncomfortable, but also passable. "Is this torture over yet?" he asks.

111121.content:
"A salon? Why?" Jackie asked.

"Because you two girls can be pretty like me, but you need a little push!" Julie replied.

"And if we don't listen?" Eva asked.

"You will have to face security dressed like that..." she said pointing at their clothes.

"Fine." Jackie said dejectedly.

She led them into the salon and walked up to two salon chairs. They sat and Julie turned to the girl working there.

"Give these two the works, will you Kara?" Julie asked.

"Peeping toms?" Kara asked. Kara looked to be about Julie's age.

"So, where shall we start?" Julie asked.
111121.title: Salon

1111212.content:
"Let's start on those nails." Kara says and sits them down in two chairs.

"I was thinking pink for Eva and a nice french for Jackie." Julie says.

"Great idea." Kara says and gets to work.

She massages their hands and puts their feet in a tub to soak them. She does the manicure and adds extensions to make them longer. Soon, the two peeping toms were the owners of long polished fingernails. Then she started on their feet and did the same, completing it.

"They look great, what next?" Julie asks.
1111212.title: Mani/Pedi

112.content:
Julie says "No as a matter of fact I think I have a better idea. What's your names?"

"I'm Evan and he's Jake." Repiled Evan timidly.

"Well it seems as though you were caught red handed with your boyfriend in the dressing room Eva. *tsk tsk* A girl your age should have more respect for yourself." Julie responded in a very matter-of-fact tone.

She looked at them disapprovingly but with an evil smirk on her face.

"I'll tell you what, since Jake needs to learn some manners how about he treats you to the whole day on a shopping spree any girl would absolutely love to go on. I can join you to make sure that you get everything you need."

"No, no that will be okay I learned my lesson." Evan had responded very quickly.

"Oh but I insist tha-" Julie continued on until she was interrupted by Jake

"Really it is okay thanks for your help"

Julies face suddenly dropped and the smile turned into a stern grimace. "Look, I don't think you understand what you had done. You boys are peeping toms. That is a crime that will ruin your lives if I choose to call the police. So you either spend some time as a couple or I will be forced to call the authorities to tell them what you've done."

Both boys looked shocked and quite scared now understanding the situation. They dropped their heads down in defeat acknowledging that Julie will get her way.

Julie's face turned back into a chipper smile as she turned to the back room and yelled "Hey Angie, cover for me today will ya?" A faint "okay" could be heard from the employees only room.

She looked at the boys and asked "so where shall we head first?"

1121.content:
Julie dragged the two boys out of the store and across the mall to a salon, where they saw several women getting their hair and nails done. One of the women working looked up and saw Julie, Evan and Jake, and smiled.

"Julie, how are you?" the woman asked.

"I'm good, Carly. These are my friends, Eva and Jake. Jake here is treating Eva, his girlfriend to a shopping spree, and I thought a good place to start would be here." Julie replied.

Evan and Jake stood quietly as Carly looked them up and down.

"Well, of course that's a good idea. I'll make sure Eva gets the works." Carly said. "Come with me, Eva,"

Carly led Evan to one of the chairs and sat him down in it, smirking after seeing the outfit up close. She draped a cape over Evan and prepared to get to work.

"Where should I start, Julie?" Carly asked.

Julie started to speak...
1121.title: Salon

11212.content:
"Well, her nails are a mess, so I think you should start there." Julie said. She got close to Evan and leaned down towards him. "Tell Carly here what you'd like, honey."

"Uh... Um..." he started, but Julie interrupted him.

"What's that? You want acrylic french tips, and a matching pedicure?" Julie asked.

"Sounds perfect, it goes great with everything." Carly said and prepared to do Evan's nails.

Evan's shoes were removed and his feet were plunged into a foot bath, while Carly prepped his fingers for the acrylics.

"You're going to look so gorgeous when I'm through with you, that your boyfriend won't be able to keep his hands off of you." Carly said.

Evan just weakly smiled and tried to forget about his ordeal.

At the end of it, Evan had ten elegant French tipped fingernails and matching toenails. Julie looked over and nodded in approval.

"Now it's time for..." Julie started.

Before he got his haircut he was somehow passable as girl but after he got his haircut no one would mistake him for a boy.

12111.content:
It turns out the program didn’t turn your face into that of a girl’s, it was quickly drawing dramatic makeup all over your clearly male face. You stare in horror at the huge pink ballgown that’s been drawn on you, and every inch of your body is frozen against your attempts at fleeing from this nightmare.

The cursor suddenly turns into the brush tool again, and selects bright pink as its fill color. It quickly begins diving against the top of your head, swirling around, changing brush sizes and shades of color rapidly as it goes. You stare at your reflection in the mirror, watching the massive elaborate pink updo slowly draw itself atop your head.

After what seems like ages, the cursor seems to be finished, and moves away from the towering display of femininity that now stands atop your made up face. The pink hair is the most elaborate updo you’ve ever seen, as well as the biggest! A lot of detail has been put into it, with hair swooping and swirling this way and that, defying gravity with its size.

The cursor wastes no time as it quickly moves up to the file menu, clicks it open, and clicks ‘Save’ A large dialogue box pops up in front of you, with the text reversed from where you’re standing. You read it carefully, then your made up eyes open wide as the cursor hovers over the ‘OK’ button.

“Warning! There is already a file named “male_victim_original_form.psd” in this location. Saving will overwrite the original file. This action can NOT be undone.”

The cursor hits “OK”, and you feel a wave of electricity wash through your body, tickling and prickling you this way and that. The cursor clicks the file menu again, scrolls down, and clicks “Close”.

In an instant, you are back in your room. You aren’t alone, however, as the massive pink frilly gown has come along with you, along with the towering pink beehive hairdo. Now in control of your body, you grab the dress in disbelief, and feel the thick soft layers squishing in your hands. You reach up and let out a gasp as your hands bury themselves in a thick maze of soft pink hair. The smell and taste of makeup is wafting from your face, and you look down at the incredible mass of the dress surrounding you for several feet in every direction.

As soon as you get your bearings, you try to find a zipper to free yourself from the gown. Your hands fly around the huge pink cloud, but there doesn’t seem to be an opening anywhere. You grab the top of the bodice and try to yank it down, but its attached to your skin and pulls on your chest just as hard. The giant hairdo is no different, you might as well be trying to pull your own hair out by the roots, none of it comes loose or loses its style, no matter how hard you yank at it.

The first bit of sunlight starts coming in through the window, and you realize the computer had you trapped all night. You hear the front door open - it’s your roommates, they’ve gotten off night shift and are home!

“Hey dude, are you awake?” You heard one of them yell up at you. “You’re going to be late for work again if you don’t get up!” The sound of their footsteps coming up the stairs has you in full panic mode. You frantically look around the room, and decide to...
12111.title: A guy in a dress

121111.content:
Heart starting to feel like a jackhammer in your chest, you stand up and move towards the door, locking it before they can barge in. Unfortunately, your door's lock has been useless for years. One quick throw of the shoulder, and you'll be on display. Instinctively, you retreat, eyes widening as you think about how they're going to react to you dressed like this. As you move away from the door, you try your hardest to ignore the strange, ticklish sensation of this pink nightmare's petticoats on your otherwise naked body, although as you once again come to a stand still and the skirts rustle against your backside, you find it extremely difficult. The sickly-sweet smell of your makeup is getting overpowering, but when you try to wipe it off with the back of your hand, you get nothing, not even a smear of lipstick. Your eyes widen even further as you try again and again, with no better results. You're snapped out of yet another attempt, now almost clawing at your face in desperation, when the noises outside your door gets loud enough to remind you that you only have seconds left before your roommates open the door and see you dressed like a drag queen Disney princess.

The the combined smell of the caked-on makeup and the sensation of underskirt on bare legs is starting to make your palms slick with fear, and the nearing sound of pounding footsteps isn't helping. Gripping the soft satin covering at the front of the dress's overskirt with both hands, you lift it so that you can better move (trying your hardest not to think about what you're doing looks like). It hits you immediately, turning your stomach to ice: you don't know where to move to.

Hands starting to shake, you whip around, your new hair moving with the motion in a way that makes your skin crawl as you search for any way out of your current situation. Trying to ignore the fruity taste of your newly-feminine lower lip as you chew on it in panic, you stare wide-eyed at the open window. It's second story, yes, but is a fall any worse than being seen like this?
121111.title: Try to climb out the window and escape

1213.content:
The cursor quickly dives over to the layers panel and clicks on “create new layer”. You see a flash of what looks like a thin pane of glass appearing in front of you, and the cursor quickly moves up to the top menu and clicks on “open file”. A huge list of images appears, with thumbnails revealing all manner of clothing. You barely have time to look at any of them as the cursor double clicks “super_cute_raver_girl.psd”. A big white panel opens up beside you, and you can’t see through the back of it. However, you do see the cursor select a large portion of the panel and click “copy”, then move over top of you. You struggle against the invisible force holding you in place, but you can’t move an inch, and you watch helplessly as the cursor clicks “paste”.

You are hit with a tingling surge of electricity, and suddenly feel yourself crammed into something incredibly uncomfortable. Your eyes widen at the sight of what has appeared on your body - a ridiculous raver outfit, complete with a poofy crinoline, big fluffy pink boots with baby blue stripes running around them, as well as a huge fluffy pink hood with a thick white trim and perky animal ears popping up on top. A thick glittering blue wig flows out from under the hood, which flows down your shoulders and around a tight corset top. Your legs are wrapped in a pair of striped tights, which disappear into the thick volume of your fuzzy boots. Again you try to move out of the panel, but you have no control over your body and are frozen in place.

You watch in shock as the cursor quickly opens another file, and does the same select/copy routine, and moves over top of your face. When the cursor hits “paste”, you see a ghostly eyeless colorful face appear in front of you, complete with sparkling blue eyeshadow, huge thick lashes and glittering pink lips. It looks like the face of an overdone drag queen, and you see the cursor click “transform” in the menu bar, and begin squishing and stretch the face in front of yours. The face moves closer and closer to you, resizing this way and that until you’re looking perfectly though the eye holes, the face sized exactly to your own. The cursor moves over to the layer menu and selects “Merge Down”, and you let out a scream as the face slaps against yours and sticks in place. You blink your new thick eyelashes in a panic, and the smell of the thick raver makeup is now all around you. Your lips taste like big pieces of candy, and you can feel the thick foundation caked on your skin.

Just when you thought this couldn’t get any worse, the cursor moves over the the layer panel once again, and clicks “Merge Down” on the outfit’s layer. You feel another shock, this one much more intense, and the outfit seems to feel even tighter on you than it was before. There is now only one layer left, and it’s you looking like a drag queen raver.

The cursor seems satisfied with how you look, and moves up to the file menu, where it clicks “Save As”. A menu pops up and it selects “male_victim_original.psd”. A dialog box pops up that says “Warning! Overwriting this existing file cannot be undone. Are you sure you wish to proceed.” You yell out a loud NO as the cursor clicks on OK, and the outfit suddenly feels even more cozy than it did before.

The cursor clicks “close”, and suddenly your room comes back into view and you have control over your body once again. You stumble and trip in your big boots, and fall to the floor. The sparkling blue wig falls around your face, and the fur of your outfit fluffs and ripples as you hit the floor. You put your hands down and find them lost in a cloud of crinoline, and you get to your feet as quickly as you can in your fluffy boots. Looking down, you can see the outfit has clearly come with you, and it’s definitely not the most comfortable ensemble in the world. The corset is squeezing you tight, the big fur hood is already feeling too hot, and the room is quickly filling with a sickeningly sweet smell of candy.

Shaking in horror and confusion, you...

The pointer clicks finish and you feel a release. You start to move your body and realize that you're free from the pointer's control. You looked around and saw a bustling mall.

The thick hair cascades around your upper body, draping over your shoulders and swishing all the way down your back, stopping just above your knees. You grab a handful of hair in each hand and stare at it in disbelief, the bright pink strands are silky soft to the touch. You pull at the hair and are met with a painful jolt all around your scalp - it's as if the extensions are now a part of you!

The second is a Hime Gyaru style - essentially a modern 60s hairstyle popular with girls in Japan. It consists of thick bangs sprouting underneath a massive teased pouf of hair, along with huge thick waves pouring out from underneath it. Tiny bows and strings of pearls adorn it along with a big white flower - it is clearly the most girly of the choices, which really doesn't make a difference considering how cartoonishly overdone all the styles are.

You panic and start looking around, only to see that your room has disappeared. You are in a strange dark void with a spotlight over top of you - the only other thing you can see is the toolbar and cursor, which moves and clicks the...

13.content:
Alex has been have a rough couple of weeks. His hours at work had been cut and it was looking like he might end up losing the job completely. Rather then dwell on his misfortune, however, he thought he might treat himself to something to take his mind off of real life for a little while.

Being a fan of all things geeky, Alex took a trip to his favorite comicshop just out of town. They sold comics, obviously, but they also sold boardgames, trading cards, roleplaying books, and the occasional action figure. Just being in the shop made him feel a little better and maybe he could see if Ted, the owner, might be able to give him a little work.

Sitting at a table near the center of the store was a heavy set man dealing himself, what looked to be playing cards.

When the man turned, a warm smile appeared on his face. “Hey Alex, how are you?”

“Could be better.” you say trying not to sound too negative. “What have you got there?”

“Its a new card game called Enchanter. My sellers sent me a demo pack but I can't seem to make heads or tales of it. Want to take a look?”

“Maybe in a bit, I want to take a look around for now.”
13.title: The Fantasy

choices: Sit at a lone table and try out Enchanter.
Grab a comic book and read it alone.
131.content:
Alex leaves the store patron to his game and sets out to find Ted; business before pleasure, as they say.

Knowing that Ted is constantly asked and pleaded with for a job in his store, Alex knows his chances are slim, but he is desperate and not afraid to suffer some rejection if it means a chance at earning some extra cash.

Alex walks towards the far end of the store, hoping to find Ted near the backroom. The door, usually locked shut, is slightly ajar, allowing Alex a chance to peek inside. He sees Ted on a phone call, looking a bit distressed, talking to what he soon discovers is one of his employees.

"Linda, this is awfully short notice. You can't give me two weeks?...", he pleads.

After a short pause of explanation from the other side of the phone, Ted sighs heavily, saying only, "Don't worry about it. I'll figure something out.", and hanging up the phone. Alex is ready to back off, sensing Ted's frustration, just after Ted notices him.

"Who's there?... oh, hello Alex." Ted exclaims, still not so agitated to properly greet a regular customer.

"Something the matter, Ted?" Alex quizzes.

Ted only sighs again, rubbing his temple, "I just had one of my summer help quit to travel Europe for the summer." he says. "Replacing her will be tough."

Alex's eyes light up, and he jumps at the opportunity, "Actually Ted, I was looking for more work myself... maybe I could take the job?", he says with a smile. What great timing, he thinks to himself... this could be his lucky day!

Ted has to stop himself from rolling his eyes at the young comic fan... seems like all of his customers would like to work there, he thinks to himself. Even still, a possible solution to his problem has fell into his lap; it'd be silly not to at least consider it. "Okay Alex. Sit down with me for a minute, let's have an interview."

Alex's excitement is palpable; he can barely contain how excited he is that he's being given a chance. As he sits for the interview, Ted starts with his first and most important question...

"Do you have any retail experience?", he asks matter-of-factly.

Off to a bad start, Alex ponders... "N-no. I work with customers now and again, but I mostly do backstock and inventory control at where I'm working right now..."

"Hmmm...", Ted murmurs. The interview continues... but Alex fears that it was over right then and there. Ted gets so many people asking to work for him at a comic store, it's likely that he can afford to be picky, even in tough spots like this. Ted inquires about his comic and gaming knowledge, to which Alex feels is his strongpoint. However, he grows nervous over the course of the interview, and stumbles to express points about his hobbies that he can normally talk about for hours.

When finished, Ted thanks him for his time and says that he'll get back to him if anything opens up, but Alex can already feel like he blew his chance. Even still, as he's feeling a bit desperate, he decides to outright ask...

"So... did I get the job?", he asked hopefully.

With a sigh, "I'm not sure you are the best fit for what I'm looking for, to be honest Alex. Working a sales-focused retail job is a bit different than what I think you are used to, and to be honest, Linda was my best salesperson; I can't replace her with just anyone. I need someone with experience, and someone who can talk naturally even to strangers. Not to mention, it didn't hurt that Linda was attractive; she had energy and a lot of customers came just to see her. A lot of my regulars will be expecting me to replace her with someone similar. I know it's not completely fair, but it's the truth that in this line of work, women have an advantage in sales."

Alex nods along, hoping to keep cool in case Ted changed his mind, and then leaves him to look over other applications in the backroom. With nothing but time on his hands now, he simply wants to sit around and mope.
131.title: Alex asks if Ted could use some help around the...

1311.content:
Dejected and depressed, Alex takes a seat at a table and simply slouches into his chair. After a moment of wandering thought he glances at the tabletop to see a deck of black cards. "Enchanter", they read on the deck box; this is the same game the man from before was playing.

Alex looks around to see if the heavy set fellow is still here, but he can't seem to locate him. Curious about the game, he takes the deck into his hand and looks it over... the man DID invite him to try it, after all. Opening up the deck reveals a myriad of different cards with descriptions and finely drawn images on each one. Most of the cards have some sort of fantasy character on them and some text describing what the card does. After further investigation, he finds that each character card has a task that they are suited for, and the players use their three-card hand to find the best solution to the task they are given, either by the game or by a game master. The characters do not typically use combat prowess to solve problems like other games, but are expected to role play and talk their way through most problems. He figures that is where the "Enchanter" name comes from. Whoever manages to complete the most tasks successfully wins the game.

Finding the design intriguing but possibly too free-form, he decides to give it a try and draws three cards for him to use in a mock game. Without a game master to officiate, he draws a scenario card; this card shows the players what it is that they need to do with their character cards.

Flipping the card over, it reads "Experience: Grow your character's talents to new heights". This inadvertently upsets Alex... having just been denied a job for lack of experience, he is hardly in the mood to hear about the virtues of it. Regardless, he takes a look at his hand and reads over his cards.

First is the Barmaid card, with an image of a busty brunette holding several glasses of ale. The Barmaid is skilled at cooling tempers in tense situations, and auto-succeeds any Flirtation checks.

Secondly is the Songstress card, with an image of a lithe Elven girl with long blonde hair. Playing her magic harp invigorates her allies, making her an unlikely but invaluable ally on any adventure.

Lastly is the Harlot card, with the image of a curvaceous redhead woman. The Harlot is a master of seduction, and uses her guile and charm to gather information, get close to a target, or just have a good time.

"...hurm.", Alex mumbles to himself. It is like this game is mocking him, expecting him to gather experience for a bunch of female characters, when he was just turned down a chance to get experience himself partially because he was the wrong gender. As if in defiance, Alex decides to try out a test run, as if to say to whoever watching that he can gain experience as well as anyone. Reaching into his hand, Alex decides to play...
1311.title: Sit at a lone table and try out Enchanter.

choices: Calmly take a look around the building.
Get out of these clothes and get out of here!
13111.content:
Laying the Barmaid card on the table, Alex begins to think up a scenario in which a barmaid would get better at her trade. Realizing that without other players to run his idea by, the game falls flat, and he feels silly for even trying to play it alone...

...it is then that he notices that the text on the card is different from before. Perplexed, he looks more closely at the card's wording.

Task: Stay in character and perfect the Barmaid's craft.
Success: +1 Luck
Failure: 1 year in Prism

"...what the hell?", he exclaims, certain that the card did not say that before. What exactly is this game, he thinks to himself. But before even he can even wager a guess, the area around him dims, until his surroundings are pitch black. Falling down to his behind, Alex finds that his chair has disappeared, including the table, the cards, the entire comic book store, all consumed by darkness.

"Hello...?", he says with fear. "HELLLOOOOO!?". The echoes of his screams soon die, but he is not in darkness for long...

The area illuminates again quickly, but his eyes have little trouble adjusting. Alex finds himself inside a humble bedroom with stone walls, with dim candles to illuminate the room.

Beginning to panic, Alex starts to look around frantically to find a way out, or better yet a way back home. Finding a door to his left, he starts to move toward it, but is distracted by the loud "CLOMP" of his shoe on the stone floor. Looking down in curiosity as to why his sneakers sound like that, he finds that he cannot see to his feet because of the two large mounds on his chest, snuggled tight in a leather corset around his waist.

"...WHAT THE?!", he proclaims, grasping at the globes in a panic. He is relieved to find that they are not real, and after a quick check over himself he finds that, despite his apparently female attire, he is still 100% his normal male self. Upon further inspection, he finds that he is wearing a short sleeved-blouse with large puffs on each shoulder, with the aforementioned corset holding it and his faux-busom in place, as well as a skirt and petticoat that extends to just above his knees. The loud sound on his feet would be the short-but-heavy heel on his new, feminine shoes, with white stockings running up each leg.

Starting to panic, Alex comes across a mirror in the room, and rushes towards it (at least as much as he can rush in his new heels). The reflection he sees startles him; on top of his head is a deep brown wig with strands of hair framing his face, the rest of it tied into two buns on top of his head. His boyish face is made up with various make-up; mascara, rouge, light brown lipstick, and dark eyeshadow... he recognizes his face as his own, but to a stranger his face appears to be that of a sultry young woman. From the neck down he is dressed in what can only be called the attire of a bar wench, his brown leather corset tightly covering his white blouse and just barely holding in his very large, very stuffed bra. A white apron covers most of the blue skirt adorned on his waist, matching nicely with his white stockings. If he didn't know the "woman" in this reflection was him, he might find her very attractive... a terrifying thought to Alex right now.

Having to take all this in is quite a shock to Alex, who is now taking stock of his options...
13111.title: The Barmaid Card

131111.content:
Alex tried to ignore the sensations telling her she was fully a woman. Ignore the way the clothes hung on her body, and how real and alive that body felt.

She went exploring around the bar. She tried to ignore the extra heft that was her full, feminine ass. The way it made her hips move differently, the sway and shimmy coming naturally with every step. She fought to pretend the bounce of her bust was an illusion.

The stone floor felt real, her body felt real, and as she explored the safe and quiet room she felt intimidated. Alex knew exactly what he'd think if he saw that woman in person... in the flesh.

Taking another look in the mirror, Alex still hoping the illusion would shatter that he'd see himself there, he was disappointed.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/00/ce/3b/...

The same, lusty, busty barmaid was reflected there.

The room had no more secrets to reveal, and as she headed towards the door. The sound of raucous behaviour penetrated the door. Hands already shaking, she didn't want to be discovered here, alone and vulnerable. Almost as terrifying was the thought of going out and meeting whoever was responsible for creating that noise.

It at least sounded good-natured, a bustling bar, full of male voices... You recall your role all too clearly, as you step out of the room.
131111.title: Calmly take a look around the building.

1312.content:
Alex grabs a comic book and slumps down in an armchair wedged into a corner between two bookshelves. He flicks through the comic sulkily, barely reading it. Stupid women. Its unfair that they should get first pick of the jobs simply because the shy, nerdy patrons of the store will empty their wallets just to be able to talk to a girl.

What hurt even more was that he had himself purchased countless worthless editions of Daredevil just because he'd known Linda was a fan. For a time he'd even entertained the thought that she liked him.

Ted walks past Alex's corner, not noticing him, engrossed in a phone conversation as he drags his fingers through his hair. A moment later he returns, pacing towards the counter. "...are you sure you can't make it... you'd be doing me a huge favour... not even for triple time?...yeah, no, I get it. Bye," he finishes rather bluntly, hanging up with a jab of his thumb. He rings another number and continues to walk up and down the length of the small shop.

"...Cassie, hi! Listen you- ... you're in Madrid... not back until tuesday... nevermind. Have a good holiday."

He continues to burn through his phonebook in this way until his endless footfalls push Alex's patience over the edge. He clears his throat loudly and Ted looks up. "Sorry, Alex. Didn't see you there."

"Staffing trouble?" Alex asks half-sympathetically, wishing Ted would just leave him to the peace and quiet and the solace of his comic book world.

"Everybody is busy," Ted groans. "We're supposed to be having a big comic book release this afternoon and I just assumed Linda would be around to fit into the costume. Wasn't expecting her to leave me in the lurch like this. Looks like I'm just gonna have to disappoint the customers." His eyes tetchily narrow as he spots the comic in Alex's hands. "Are you paying for that, yeah?"

"If I had money I would," Alex mutters back sullenly.

Ted is suddenly staring at him in a very strange way. "How... how much do you weigh?"

"Huh?" Alex has always been of a slender build. He shifts uncomfortably as Ted's eyes rove over his body. "Maybe like... 150lb."

Ted's face lights up. "Great! Listen, you need money, I need a worker. All you gotta do is stand around and greet the customers. It's easy money and if you do well there might be a permanent position in it for you. Only catch is there's a... uniform. You up for it?"

"Whatever, I'll take it."

"When I say "uniform" it's actually more of a costume. Specifically Linda's..."

"What!"

"Relax! If we do this right nobody will even recognise you!"

Alex grinds his teeth. "... what costume is it?"

14222222.content:
You start to walk away, deciding to leave the guy as fast as possible when suddenly "There it is, that's my purse"

You gulp, coming up towards you is both the cop AND the woman you stole the purse from. You're not sure the disguise is going to hold up but running away would make things worse (not that you'd go fast in these heels).

The cop seemed less certain "Now, now miss," it took a second to realise he was speaking to you. "Would you mind if we took a look at your bag?

You put on a shocked expression, trying to look like you were indignant at the thought. The woman spoke again.

"I'm telling you its my bag, I recognise the crease. I don't know where she got it but it's mine. Give it back."

"No its hers," it was the guy who asked you out, you'd forgotten he was still there.

"And who might you be?" asked the cop.

"Her boyfriend." Your heart leapt in your stomach, why was he doing this? "I got it for her for her birthday, I think it's a popular model. I can understand the confusion."

The woman halted, stunned. She looked back at you as if asking for confirmation and feeling the emotion she held back you simply nodded.

The cop wasn't quite ready to settle the matter just yet. "We've had a theft about an hour ago, some boy stole a purse and we've been looking for him. Do you know anything about...."

"We've been together all day," the guy interjected, "and no, we haven't seen anything like that."

By the stage, some of the guy's friends had come up and enthusiastically said how they'd all been together all day.

The cop nodded, and giving an apologetic expression to the woman, the two walked off.

You let out a breath you didn't know you'd been holding. You looked back at the guy and his friends and found they were all looking at you.

"Thank you," you said, keeping your voice high.

"You're welcome," he replied. "And I get it that you don't want to go out with me."

You take in a breath. You didn't want to, but after what he just did you felt you couldn't just leave him high and dry....

"Go out with him," one of his friends said.

"Yeah, he had your back, not easy to get a man like that." another friend piped up.

"Okay," you said, "Just one."

The guy burst into a wide smile. "Thank you, you won't regret it, I'm Terry by the way."

"Veronica," you blurt out, not sure where you go the name from.

"So Vera, where would you like to go?"

You're names Clay

You'd heard stories here and there of Girls suing Universities to allow them to play on Men's Sports teams, and even a few cases to join Fraternities, that's when you got the idea.

You looked up the rules and laws of the University, and there was nothing that would make it so you couldn't join, so if they didn't allow you to, you could sue for a lot of money, and if they let you, you'd get to live in a house full of women, it was a win/win you figured.

You brought this up to the Dean of Marley University, along with the president to Delta Delta Delta OR DDD, and after explaining the rules and it would be unfair to deny you, the Dean green lighted it, The Sorority's President wasn't happy about it, but had to follow the Dean's orders, and that afternoon you were signing the contract Joining the DDD's the Sorority with the hottest girls on campus.

A week later you'd sent in your deposit, 1000$, you were reminded, this would cover dues and you wouldn't get it back if you quit early, since you knew there'd be no reason to quit you didn't mind.

And another week later it was pledge week, you were standing alongside the freshman girls who had pledged this semester.

They're all looking at you with disgust, they knew you must've gotten in because of some loophole so you could live in the house with the hottest girls on Campus, and they would be right.

At that Moment The Sorority President stepped in front of all of you

You whispered to Kate "I know you're trying to make me quit, just letting you know its not going to work."

"I'm not trying to make you quit. in fact, I'm not going to let you quit even if you want to. You hadn't thought of that, the Dean had given permission for you to do this, not that he had much choice, he wouldn't be pleased if you quit, not that you had any intention to "okay that makes sense, but why would I want to quit?"

Kate went to the middle of the room again to speak to everyone

Everyone else disperses, and Kate firmly motions for to follow. You follow her in a daze, everything had been turned on you, 5 minutes ago you were living the dream, now it was a nightmare

151111.title: Kate shows you your new Clothing

1512.content:
Marley University was an odd school, aside from the fact that it was far away from any town, and had a town surrounding the campus, which has everything a student would ever need. It was a private high school where all the students boarded, and usually reserved for the more well to do of the state it was in, but they also had scholarship programs and the school had a pretty good mix of students, aside from a surplus of males in the student body. That is where you come in.

You walked up to the gates of the school, with your bags in tow. You had gotten a full scholarship for the next three years at this school. You weren't that attached to the public high school, and since this school had the highest college acceptance rate, you jumped at the opportunity. Your parents couldn't make the trip up, but that's cause of how far it was civilization. You walked through the gates and up to the main building in the middle of campus. You went to the main office and knocked on the door.

"Come." a voice from behind the door said.

You walked in and saw a pretty fancy office. It was nothing like the one at the public school you went to the year before. You wondered if this was where the tuition money went when you were snapped out of your thoughts.

"Yes?" the woman at the desk asked.

"Oh, uh, I'm a new student. John Harper." you replied.

"Ah yes, we were expecting you. You'll be in the Onassis Wing of the Dormitory. Room 436." she said, handing you a key. "Your class schedule should already be in there."

"Cool." you said and walked out of the office and towards the dormitory. You struggled with your bags and dropped one on the floor. As you went to pick it up, a girl walked up to you.

"New arrival?" she asked.

"Yeah." you replied.

"I'm Natalie Chambers." she said.

"John Harper." you said.

"Need help with these?" she asked.

"Sure." you replied.

"What wing are you in?"

"Onassis. Room 436."

"Oh cool! That's the same wing as me, our rooms are close too!"

"They dorm the boys and girls that close to each other?"

"Yeah, they're not really a stickler for stuff like that."

You continued talking about the school until you got to your room. You opened the door and saw a pretty basic room. Bed in one corner, desk in another, closet and set of drawers, The walls were a pale red, that was almost pink, and your schedule was laid out on your bed.

Natalie walked over and picked it up, scanning it, before handing it to you.

"Cool! We're in the same English, Science and Gym classes!"

"That's good. I was hoping I'd have friends in some of my classes."

"Say, why don't I give you the grand tour of Marleyville when you're done settling in?"

"That sounds great!"

"See you then," she said, leaving the room.

You set up all of your stuff and lay down on your bed. This was going to be a good year, you could feel it.
1512.title: Something else

15121.content:
Natalie returned to your room and you went out on the tour. You walked out into the town that you learned that the students and locals called, "Marleyville".

"So the town basically has everything that the students and faculty need, clothing stores, shoe stores, a bookstore, a grocery store, hair and nail salons for the girls, barbershops for the guys, etc..." Natalie started.

"Wow. Why is it like this anyway?" you asked.

"Because the school is so isolated, they wanted to give the students and faculty the feeling of being in a town. It's pretty cool."

"Yeah. So what do I need to know for classes?"

"Well, I just want to warn you that I've heard that the boy's locker room is super duper crowded. I'd see if you can get them to let you use the secondary locker room."

"Is it less crowded?"

"It's unisex, but no guy ever uses it because of their fragile masculinity, since in the past it's mostly been used by girls."

"I'll look into that."

"The teachers are nice, you'll like the classes. Tomorrow when classes start I'll introduce you to my group. You'll fit right in."

"I just want to thank you, for all of this."

"Oh, don't mention it. I wish someone had done this for me when I arrived."

You smiled as the two of you walked back to the dormitory hall.

"John, these are my friends, Jessica, Bree and Luanne." Natalie said.

Jessica was a brunette, wearing the school's uniform. Bree had medium length blonde hair, and she was dressed more casually, and Luanne had red hair done up in a ponytail. They all smiled at you when you walked up.

"Nice to meet you all." you said, taking a seat.

1513.content:
"There goes my last dollar," you mutter to yourself after paying the cab driver. You grab both of your duffels from the curb and walk to your new dorm hall. You head in the front lounge, which is full of parents and their kids. It just reminds you that your parents couldn't care less that you were in college. They didn't even help you get here, let alone pay for it. Setting down your luggage, you slide into line near the front while two parents are distracted talking. After a few minutes of scrolling through Facebook, you get to the front.

"Hello sir, here's your packet, your room number and room key are in there." The girl at the desk explains. "There's also information about your orientation, which will begin tomorrow."

"Thanks," you say offhandedly as you go to pick up your bags, but they aren't there.

"Hey did someone see my bags." You ask no ono one in particular. One father turns and gives you a shrug, but the rest ignore you. You look throughout the lounge, but your bags aren't there.

You work your way to the desk. "Excuse me, I think someone grabbed my bags."

"I'm not sure what I can do about that if you give me your phone number I can call you if someone brings them here." She hands you a sticky note, where you write your name and phone number.

"Thank you."
1513.title: Where's my luggage

choices: ...you can come back to our place with us for a bit."
15133.content:
They'll probably find your bags once people are unpacking so you decide to look around campus. According to the map, the Campus Union Building is close to the center of campus, so you head there first. The distance on the map was deceiving and after about a half hour of walking, you're only just over half-way there. A few minutes later it starts to pour out of nowhere. Since you're closer to the Union Building than to your dorm, you decide to finish your way there.

When you get there, you're drenched from head to toe. It's a big building, from the entrance you can see a food court, a viewing area with a large TV, a study room, and a row of pool tables, in addition to lots of places to sit, but there aren't many people there. You see a few people playing DnD at one of the tables, and a group of girls all wearing wildly different clothes. It looks like one of them noticed you, but you're not sure. There's soccer playing on the TV so you decide to watch until the weather's shifted.

"Hey, are you new here?" A girl asks.

"Yeah, I'm here for orientation," you answer and turn to face her. She's in tight-fitting athletic clothes, showing off her toned body. Her hair's up in a practical bun, and she may be wearing makeup, but it's subtle enough that you can't tell.

"My friends and I thought you might like to meet some people if you want to join us at over there." She motions to the group of girls you saw when you came in.

"That would be nice."

"Great," she says with a smile, "I'm Anna." She walks with you over to her friends.

"Hi, I'm Sarah." She's dressed the most provocatively of the group, with her shirt barely covering her nipples, and her curly red hair covers her chest better than her shirt.

"Hey, I'm Olivia." She says in an English accent. Wearing a striped shirt and pink blazer, something about her smile, and how she sits, tells you that she's in charge.

"I'm Mia." The next girl says shyly. Even seated you can tell she's a good bit shorter than the other girls.

The final girl introduces herself, "I'm Yuki." With her name, you'd expect an accent, but as far as you can tell, she's fully American.

"Take a seat." Olivia offers, and you join them. "What are you planning on majoring in?"

"I'm not really sure, I think Physics." You answer.

"Cool, Mia's a physics major," Olivia mentions.

"Oh, that's cool."

"Yeah... I might be TAing one of your classes." Mia quietly states.

"Oh, are you a Grad student?"

"Yeah, I'm working on my Ph.D." She says with some more confidence.

"What are you researching?"

You both have a conversation about her research, she seems excited to have someone that's interested, even if you don't understand much about it. Your conversation is cut short when you get a phone call.

You excuse yourself and take it. "Hello Sean, this is Hannah from the front desk. I'm sorry but we're closing the desk for the night, and no one brought your luggage."

"Damn, well, thanks for the call."

"Of course, have a good night." She hangs up.

You return to the girls, visibly disappointed.

"What's wrong," Olivia asks.

"Oh, someone took my bags when I was checking in... and the desk just called, no one brought them by."

"Well we were about to go, but..."
15133.title: Explore Campus

151331.content:
"Well we were about to go, but you can come back to our place with us for a bit." Olivia offers.

Your mind is blown by the offer, first, a group of hot girls decide they want to talk with you, now they're inviting you back to their place.

"That would be great." You answer with a smile.

"Trust me, you'll have a great first night of college," Sarah says with a wink.

Everyone gets up and heads to the elevator. You try to start a conversation with Mia again, but she's suddenly very shy again. You all get out into the parking garage, and Olivia leads you to her BMW.

"It only really fits 5, but Sean, would you mind if Mia sits on your lap?"

"That would be alright," you answer, trying not to make it obvious you like the idea.

"Why does it have to be me," Mia asks.

"You're the smallest." Yumi points out.

"If you really don't want to, I can." Sarah offers.

"I'll leave it up to you Sean," Olivia says.

152.title: Let's Have a Ball

1521.content:
It was the biggest bash of the year, and I would finally get what I deserved.

Victoria Montclair has been the envy of many, her wealth surpassing most. She was possibly the most well known person in all the land, and yet her beginnings are known to no one. The mysterious Montclair simply appeared one day with no fan fair at all. She mostly would keep to herself, except for once a year. On that day she would invite every noble house that you could think of to a gathering rich of food and music.

Or so I heard. At the time, I went by the name Drake. I was a cutpurse of slight stature, my hair long and dark, my body lithe and flexible. I had been on the street for a long time and had hear stories of Montclair's parties. Aggravatingly, the rest of us were not invited so I had never been able to see what it was like, at that time. The rich and pampered would wine and dine while I was left to rot in filth. That was going to change, and I had a plan how.

I was able to sneak past the guards at the main gate using a bit of guile and bit more exploding powder that I had purchased from one of my contacts. It cost me everything I had, but when I succeeded in my endeavor, I told myself, it would not matter.

I circled to the western side of Montclair's Manor and began climbing a great deal of ivy that had grown up the side of the building some time ago. After a few minutes, I had scaled the wall and entered a nearby window. In hardly anytime at all I had made it straight to Montclair's bed room, which I was sure would hold many jewels that she must have collected in her greedy little life.

My heart jumped for joy when I spotted the ruby sitting on her bed. The size of it alone would be enough for me to afford all of the little sins I had been dieing to indulge in. All I had to do was leave the same way I came in and no one would have any idea what had happened.
1521.title: A thief that is about to have some bad luck.

15211.content:
A voice behind me made me jump. The voice belonged to a pale woman dressed in red. Her hair was as black as a storm cloud, and her beauty was striking. "What are you doing?" She sounded calm, too calm for a woman that just found a strange man going threw her things. I didn't bother to talk, instead I lunged at her. I figured, if I could knock her out I could just scamper away back down the ivy but things didn't go that way. Before I got anywhere near her, I froze. I couldn't move. There was this light buzzing sound in my ear, like a bee was flying near by and I felt a sort of pressure all around me.

"That wasn't a very nice thing you just tried. I was just going to summon a guard to escort you away but now..." as she spoke, she lifted her arms as well as me with them. With a subtle hand movement I felt the ruby's chain slip from my hands. I watched it hang in the air, just like me.

"This can't be happening," I said to myself, in complete shock.

"Lovely, isn't it?" Montclair gestured to the ruby. "You must have gone threw a lot of effort to take this." A peculiar look appeared on her face.

"You know, I have so much already. It would be selfish of me to keep this when you obviously want it so dearly." She smiled, I didn't like it. "In fact, you should come to my ball. Yes, that would be delightful. First however, you are not properly dressed for such an occasion. Don't worry though, I can help you with that."
15211.title: Caught ruby handed

152111.content:
In a blink of an eye, my clothes were gone. They simply vanished in a puff of smoke! I was completely exposed, but not for long. The lingering black mist of what used to be my dark clothes changed, turning white. As if it was alive, some of the mist coiled around me like a serpent. Montclair's arms waved in odd patterns and her face was strained. Whatever sorcery was going on, it was apparent that she was in complete control. The mist solidified into what appeared to be ladies' silk underthings, but they were on me.

A corset squeezed my middle, creating a womanly shape out of my form. My own flesh was pushed into the cups that were meant to hold a woman's breasts which created a startling illusion that I had breasts of my own.

Again the mist changed, this time from white to pink. I was fully engulfed and, like before, the mist turned solid. This time, however, it left me wearing a pink gown and heels along with a band placed on my unruly hair. With one more gesture, I felt a weight appear on my face which I guessed was makeup and my hair rearrange itself.
152111.title: Dressed for the Ball

1521111.content:
It all happened so fast, before I knew it, it was over. I was placed gently on the ground and I just stood there in shock. Montclair was breathing very hard as she looked at me. The beauty she was had was tarnished. Her face wrinkled her hair a bit out of place, with grey strands sticking out.

"One more thing," she smirked. She lifted her hand and the ruby began to shine as the ruby's chain wrapped around my neck. I tried to rip it away but instead, my hand just casually stroked it.

I felt my stance shift and I tried to shout out,"What did you do?". What came out wasn't a shout but a soft girlish whisper.

"I just thought that I'd place an enchantment on that ruby to make sure you behave yourself at my ball," said Montclair breathing more normally now.

"You crazy witch, I'm not going to your ball!" was what I attempted to scream but I was shocked to hear myself say, "oh I'm so excited, I can't wait."

Montclair chuckled, "Now, now. You must contain your excitement young lady. If you don't, you might scare away the boys."

"Oh that would be terrible," I felt myself say weakly. This was a nightmare. As much as I tried, I could make myself speak the way I wanted. It was then that I felt my body start to slink out of the room, my hips swaying side to side.

"Don't worry," I heard Montclair say behind me, "I'm sure your will have a magical night."
1521111.title: One more thing

15211111.content:
My legs moved with a mind of their own no matter how much I tried to run away. I didn't know where I was but my body navigated as if I had done it many times before. The sound of the heels echoed in my ears with every step, unnerving me in a way I could never express.

I entered the ballroom through a pair of double doors and walked down a flight of stairs. The ballroom was enormous and filled with music. The room looked all the larger by the scarcity of guests. That must be what happens when you keep a tight invite list. I was standing on the dance floor for only moments before a young nobleman asked to dance. I did my best to shout something vulgar but all I heard myself do was giggle instead and I took his arm.

Much of the night was the same. I was on my feet dancing close with nobleman after nobleman, with no rest. It was frighting and embarrassing how many men wanted to dance with me. They would hold me and whisper things into my ear that made me want to gag. I desperately wanted to leave this place and try to forget this ever happened.

After the 18th dance or so, all of the music stopped. The quite was only for a moment before the main door burst open and trumpets sounded. Walking with an air of confidence was Prince Hammond of the Forester family line accompanied by a small entourage.

All eyes were on him when he gestured to the pianist to resume playing. I spotted Montclair quickly joining the prince for his first dance before I was dragged on to dance once more.
15211111.title: Dancing the night away.

152111111.content:
After dancing with an excessively grabby nobleman, I turned to find myself face to face with Prince Hammond. Against my will I curtsied and he bowed.

"May I have this dance?" he asked offering me his hand.

Begrudgingly I was forced to except with a breathy, "It would be an honor."

Placing his hand on the small of my back he responded, "To dance with a maiden so lovely and fair? No, the honor is mine."

This was the worst thing to ever have happened to me. We danced and swayed together the rest of the night, the prince and I. As much as I hate to admit it, he was an excellent dancer. It was a relief to have a partner that didn't keep stepping on my toes. Luckily, he was also a gentleman and his hand stayed only in appropriate places, I'm mean, if I was a girl that is to say. His arms were strong, yet gentle and he smelled quite pleasant, in comparison to the rest of the men.

"May I ask the name of my lady?" Hammond spoke.
After a pause I was forced to respond,"Elisabeth, my Prince," Where that name came from, I'll never know.

Hammond smiled at that and just looked into my eyes. As much as I wanted to, I couldn't look away from his dark eyes. We gazed into each others eyes and that's when it happened. I saw it coming but I couldn't avoid it. I pulled with all of my might but remained still as Hammond leaned in.
152111111.title: A Dance with a Prince.

1521111111.content:
There was no way that I could have prepared for the kiss. It was disgusting but at the same time...it was kind of nice, that is, it wasn't as terrible as if could have been. I felt myself melt into Hammond and wrapped my arms around his neck, pulling him toward me. The kiss was short and Hammond pulled back a bit.

"I'm sorry, that was improper of me I..umph," Hammond attempted to apologize but my lips silenced him as I pulled him back to me. I mean to say, the ruby made me pull him back to me. He made no further attempts to break that kiss, and it felt like it went on forever. Slowly it became more passionate and I heard myself release soft moans of pleasure.

When the kiss ended, we were both grinning and breathing heavy. A glance to my side revealed a disheveled looking Montclair wearing a forced smile.

"May I barrow her for just a moment my Prince?" She said curtseying.

"I, uh...of course," Hammond apprehensively replied.

Montclair took my hand and dragged me away as I continued to look back at Hammoned.

"You little harlot," She quietly hissed at me, "I go to all of this trouble for you, I clothe you, I invite you here, and this is how you repay my kindness?" With that she touched the ruby gathering a small light to her finger. Then I felt like a puppet whose strings were cut. I was free.

"I, I...I'm sorry. I promise I'll leave and never come back," I pleaded.

"Too late. You can't seem to keep from worsening your situation. I just wanted a little fun at your expense but you simply can not behave." With that, she touched her glowing finger to my forehead and I felt those strings retie.
"And how about a minor illusion to keep this all between us?" she growled while waving a hand around me. I only later discovered what the charm did.

"What was..." I started to say but she cut me off.

"No time, Prince Hammond is waiting," She sneered.

She shooed me away and I quickly minced back into Hammond's arms. He held me for a long while before kissing me again then giving me his arm to hold.
1521111111.title: The Kiss

15211111111.content:
We left together that night and from then on we were almost never apart. Hammond was sure to treat me like a princess, up until had made me one. It was during our honeymoon when I discovered what the illusion that Montclair cast actually did. Lets just say that there were no unpleasant surprises for my...husband.

Every year we would again visit the home of Victoria Montclair for her annual ball, and dance all night. Though she acted friendly enough, I could feel the loathing that she felt for me and the delight of what she had done. I'm sure she feels that I have gotten what I deserve.
15211111111.title: Epilogue

1531.content:
"That is the worst idea I have ever heard."

Chris went right back to watching television after hearing out his roommate's dilemma. Not wanting to end the discussion, Michael pressed forward.

"Come on, hear me out. I know it's crazy but I don't have a lot of other options.", he pleaded. Just moments before, Michael returned from the funeral of his grandmother. Michael's grandmother once owned one of the largest automotive company in the United States. While the company was sold off some time ago, she was still the heiress to a gigantic amount of wealth, and in her will she declared Michael the sole benefactor of her entire fortune and estate, much to the chagrin of his other family members. In her will was an unusual amount of terms and conditions for him to receive his inheritance, chief among them...

"Where am I going to find someone to marry who won't just try to take half my money and run?", Michael explained. Chris stopped changing channels just long enough to respond.

"Are you sure that's even legal? Withholding your inheritance if you aren't married? It sounds like something out of a soap opera.", said Chris.

"Trust me, I looked into it with a lawyer. If I don't get married in six months, I lose the inheritance to my step-sisters, case closed.", he complained. "I'd rather die than let those jackals take Grandma's money. They never liked her and were just counting the days until she left them a fortune."

"Let's say I go through with this... don't you think it would be strange if you suddenly appeared with a boyfriend, saying you're ready to get married and settle down with your friend from college?", Chris pointed out. The two of them have been good friends since meeting at University, and had just become roommates not 6 weeks ago.

"That's the thing...", Michael hesitated. "I have to get married in Grandma's home state, and they don't allow same-sex marriage there. For this to work... you'd have to pretend to be a girl."

Chris stared blankly at Michael, "...".

After a long moment of silence, Chris said simply. "I stand corrected. THAT is the worst idea I ever heard."

"Just hear me out! You're not a huge guy, and standing next to me you're kind of short...". Michael was a bit forgiving to his friend's ego; Chris was a thin guy and stood about 5'6, 120 lbs, while Michael was 6'0 and 185 lbs of lean muscle. "I think with a little work, you could pull it off."

Chris, just a few words away from a seriously bruised ego, lashes out, "So what, I look like a girl?", he huffs.

Sensing his friend's frustration, he backs off slightly, "No, no... not without some work you don't." Michael tries another tactic before giving up; an appeal to cash. "Look, there is a lot of money for you in this. My lawyer already drew together a prenup; if you go through with this, you're looking at making 10 million dollars. After taxes."

"...What.", was his only reply.

"The rules of her will state that I have to be married for six months. After that, we get a clean divorce, and you make away with the easiest 10 million you'll ever make.", Michael explained. "I get to keep most of my inheritance, and you become a millionaire." Chris blinked at the word 'millionaire'... he really liked the sound of that. Feeling like Chris was on the verge of changing his mind, Michael pressed forward, "You have to appear at the wedding and maybe some family get-togethers, but you'd spend most of the time hiding out of sight playing video games on the estate. You can quit that job you hate, pay off your student loans, do whatever you want!"

Chris rubbed his chin in thought for a moment, before asking something that had been bothering him, "So... why do you want ME to do this? Why not ask someone else... like an actual GIRL?". A small part of Chris' mind regretted mentioned the idea... maybe he just lost a chance at 10 million dollars.

Michael explained, "I don't have many friends, especially ones that are girls. All the ones I know are married or in serious relationships. Even if they weren't, you are probably still the only person I could trust with this... and besides...", Michael stopped.

Chris blinked, feeling extremely awkward during Michael's long pause, "Uhhhh.... besides 'what'?".

"If I have to just give money away like this... if I have to choose someone to have their life changed for the better... I guess... I'd want it to be you. That's all.", Michael stated.

The room was quiet for what seemed like an eternity, before Chris finally scoffs. "Tsk, what a lame thing to say.", he mumbles, not wanting to express the appreciation he has for his good friend after his admission.

After another pause, with the television spewing commercials in the background, Michael asks again. "So? Will you marry me?"

The awkward pauses come to an end when the two of them share a laugh at Michael's choice of words, but even still, Chris needs to decide whether or not to help his friend.

She's been through some rough times and relationships before Patrick, and she hadn't had an opportunity to pamper herself in a long time, so I thought I'd get her all girlied out for a day." replied Gwen
Gwen hadn't noticed because she was distracted by Stacy but she put her elbow on the keyboard. The computer beeped, and Gwen looked down and then at the computer screen. The screen read. "FILE UPDATED"
"That's terrible! Was the realationship an abusive one?" asked Stacy continued.
Gwen tried to hurry Stacy along now because she wanted to make sure everything was ok with Christina's file. So she rambled on "Well, not abusive, but she was told how to dress and she had to tone everything down for this guy. Basically dressed her as a nun."
"Oh, that's terrible! I'll make the appointment right way." Stacy said as she left her doorway.
Gwen heavilly sighed. Immidiately her attention went to the computer and the Christina file. She read through everything. "Ok, this looks good" She muttered to herself. Ok, ok" she continued as she scrolled down. But something caught her eye.
She looked at Date of Birth.
"Wait a minute." She thought. She took out a calculator and did the math.
"OH SHIT!" She thought.
She smirked, "Well I guess worse things could have happened."
That was it, the file was updated and Christina Mullens was a real woman. The right agencies had just gotten emailed about Christina Mullens and Gwen knew that The Motor Vehicle Agency would be sending out a licence renewal form, and her new social security card would be on the way to Chris' address. Everything was moving right along.
Meanwhile in the other room Stacey was on the phone finishing making her boss' appointment at the salon, for two.
"Yes I'm still holding. Oh that's great! Yes thank you so much, I'm really sorry it was last minute but it was really important. The girl really needs this. She came from an abusive relationship. Her ex basically controlled everything she did and was never to show off her body. She needs the full day salon process." Stacy paused to listen to the woman at the salon.
"Oh that's wonderful! Well I personally haven't seen the girl yet but by the sounds of it she sounds like a mess. I'm sure she could use a little electrolysis on her eyebrows and face. Thank you so much. yes, 1:15. I will tell them." and then Stacy hung up.
Stacy looked through her phone numbers and came to the number she wanted to call.
On the other end of town a woman wearing a white doctor's coat answered the phone. "Hello Dr. Jen Reynolds"
"Hi Jen? It's Stacy over at the county office." She replied.
"Hi Stacy, how are you?" the doctor replied.
"Great! Hey, I know you guys aren't close or anything but did you know your brother was getting married?" she explained
"What? No! I had no idea. Where did you hear that?" Jen asked
"My boss Gwen, who is friends with Patrick just told me, Her and his fiancee are going to the salon today down by your office at 1:15." Stacy continued.
"That little shit, he's trying to fulfill the wishes of my grandmother's will and get married so that he can claim the whole inhertance, this whole thing has got to be a sham. Thanks for letting me know Stacy, I'm going to have to pay this little gold digger a little visit. Thanks for letting me know Stacy, I'll talk to you soon." Jen said as she hung up.
Later at just about 1 pm Chris woke up by the sound of a ringing phone. He felt around his side table until he found the phone receiver and picked it up.
"Hello?" He pretty much whispered into the phone.
"Oh my God! Chris? Are you just waking up? Oh my God it's 5 minutes until 1. Your salon appointment is at 1:15!" Gwen yelled through the phone.
Chris sat up in bed and jumped out. "wait, my appointment? What about you?" he asked
"I"m hung up at work. I'm not going to be able to make it, but you have to go." She explained.
"Oh man!!! I don't want to have a girly day without you there, it's really weird. I'm not comfortable with this, I'm going to just cancel." Chris explained nervously.
"So, you're just giving up all that money because you don't want a relaxing day at the spa? Great!" Gwen asked.
Chris pulled the receiver away and acted like he was going to punch the phone but put it back up to his ear.
"Fine, fine...ok, I'm up. I'l go." He said.
"Just remember everything I told you, do a light makeup because they're going to do a full makeup anyway. The nails, don't forget to tell them you want your nails done because you are newly engaged and you want to show off the beautiful engagement ring. Throw on the jeans and tshirt, put your hair up and you should be good to go. Now go!" Gwen explained. "If you need me for anything, call me." She finished and hung up.
Chris hung the phone up and then walked to his closet, he opened it and then pulled out the women's jeans and tshirt top.
"Well, here goes the longest day in my life."
