"Quite the contrary, you may be a special case but we here at Lovely Academy for Girls pride ourselves on our 100% graduation rate, every student who's ever been enrolled has left acting like a proper young lady, some took longer than others, but every girl has left a lady, you'll be attending the same classes as your cousin, and be subject to the same rules and regulations as her."

Cassie went from looking confused to about to laugh.

That includes the rules about Pants, today will be the last time you are allowed to wrest them, Your parents took the liberty to ship you some clothes that will fit, you'll find them in your room."

There's no I'm just gonna go with you, I'm out of here, you turn towards the main door, and see your car being towed off into the distance.

"Ah yes your parents also requested the return of your car, which works for us since we don't allow cars on Campus.

So that's it, you were stuck here 50 miles from the nearest town enrolled at a Ladies finishing school
1552.title: Finishing, Whether You Like It Or Not

15521.content:
Your lead to a room, its styled femininely, with two beds with feminine bedspreads, you notice there are already a few boxes in there.

"Those are from your parents, and now that your hear, you no longer have an excuse for wearing pants, so you both have 5 minutes to change into skirts or dresses, or you'll get 2 demerits, and I'll explain demerits when I return."

your left alone with Cassie.

"I swear I had no idea you were enrolled too, I would've told you" Cassie says.

"I know I believe you, I'm just still in shock, this can't be a joke can it? I mean they don't actually expect me to just comply and stay here pretending to be a lady, Can they?"

"I've got no idea, but its already been two minutes, and I'm actually enrolled, so I don't want any demerits, I'm not happy about it, but I'm changing into a skirt" you turn your back as Cassie changes, you decide not to, your not gonna just play along, your gonna fight this.

a bit after Cassie changes, The registrar returns with a few papers and other things, she looks at you and sighs.

So your gonna be difficult, well here's the letter your parents wanted you sent for when you arrived."

You tore into it and read it over, it pretty much confirmed what you had already been told, that just as Cassie had been you'd been enrolled here to quell your bad behavior.

You slump into a chair.

Now, Kevin you have two demerits for wearing pants, let me explain, every five demerits gets a new punishment, the first one when you get five demerits changes your dress code from minimum one inch heels to minimum four inch heels, I suggest you change now unless you want more.

You want to speak up, but have no words, you approach the box marked "SKIRTS"

"That includes proper underwear Kevin, oh irs also noted that you are to go by Katy while enrolled."

you look where she's pointing, there's a small package of panties, Cassie smiles weakly and tosses it to you, you open them, and take out a plain white pair.

The registrar who you still don't know the name of, leaves the room and Cassie turns around, giving you privacy to take off your pants and boxers and put the panties and skirt oj, you feel ridiculous.

She returns and gives you both your schedules, along with other rules and regulations, and takes her leave. Make sure you read over those before leaving the room, some of those rules you might break without realizing it.

you read over it, and pick out a few.

Curfews, wearing a bra when outside your room, (at least your allowed to have it off in your room) No T-shirts, no running in the halls (A lady should always walk gracefully apparently) Keep your legs clean shaven, Always curtsy to a senior student, any student above you can give demerits it seems.

you sit on your bed as you read through it all.

"I know you probably don't want to, but I want to explore this place a bit before dinner, I mean we've got 4 hours to kill, so if you want to come you've got to put on a bra and find a new shirt, well so do I.

she tosses a bra and blouse onto your bed as she switches her T-shirt for a more feminine blouse.

You finish reading it over, apparently this is a two year course, 4 semesters, but if a student doesn't pass a certain level of lady-like qualities, they'll have to repeat the semester, so even after two years, if you haven't been trying, you won't be done, you just want to lay down and go to sleep. but Cassie convinces you to change and explore the campus with her.

Cassie shows you how to clip the bra, and helps you button up the blouse.

You put on the one inch heeled shoes provided for you and follow Cassie out the door.
15521.title: Continue

155211.content:
You feel so exposed the skirt reaches your upper valves but you still feel naked, and your wearing a bra too, how much worse can it get

luckily walking in one inch heels is easy

You'd been out of the room for all of 5 minutes when you pass by a slight older woman, you assume ifls just a young teach/instructor/professor, whatever they're called here.

"New students?"

"Uhh Yes." Cassie responds.

"It shows, first neither of your legs are shaven clean, that's a demerit" she taps a few things on the tablet computer she's carrying, "neither of you curtseyed upon our introduction, that's another demerit"

"Shit" you mutter, you're already at 4 one more and you'll be mincing around in 4 inch heels.

"A lady doesn't use such foul language that's another demerit, She looks at you "You must beKaty, the special case, which would make you Cassie, her Cousin."

You flinch ay being called Katy and being referred to as her, when it sinks in, you're already at 5 demerits.

"No please, go easy, I've already got five now" you beg.

"begging is unfit for a lady, I should give you another demerit for that, but I'll let you off this time." She walks off.

You out your head in your hands, this is terrible.

Cassie consoles you, "C'mon lets hurry back to the room before we get caught with any more demerits.

Luckily you get back without being seen, "come to the bathroom I'll shave your legs, I don't do it too often but I'll do my best not to cut you.

You let her slowly shave away all your leg hair, when she's done you nearly want to cry, but at the same time you marvel at how they feel its very surreal. You return to the bedroom while Cassie shaves her own legs.

While your waiting for her to finish, you take a deep breath and calm down, you aren't gonna let this place beat you, if it wants you to be a lady, you'll pretend to be a lady, but deep down you'll still be you.

You hear a knock on the door, but when you open it theirs only a bag with a pair of high heels, you realize they're for you, they're quick about those demerits apparently. You read the note attached.

Katy, wearing any shoes other than these will instantly get you 5 more demerits, please leave all other shoes outside your room.

you take the package inside and check out the shoes, not wanting to wait to long you quickly take off you other heels and slip these new black four inch heels on, leaving the old pair outside the door to get picked up, you assume. You spend the next few minutes taking some tentative practice steps, while Cassie finishes up.

When she's done, she asks

"Who was at the door"

You point at your feet, "These"

"Oh, that was quick, wow good luck the last time I wore heels like that was like 4 years at some Wedding my mom dragged me too"

"I think I'm actually getting the hang of it, if I walk slow enough I can walk petty well."

The two of you start to head out, you both saying to yourself, no cursing, remember to curtsy.
155211.title: The Campus

1552111.content:
You walk through the halls, curtsying every time you pass someone that even looks like they could be a teacher or senior student and eventually make it to a common room where several other students, i.e, girls, were sitting and either reading, talking or doing homework. They looked up when you and Cassie walked into the room, but quickly resume their activities, not even flinching at your appearance.

"Hi." Cassie said. "I'm Cassie and this is my cousin, Kev... er, Katy."

The other girls don't respond. You and Cassie uneasily look at each other and walk out, going to another area of the campus, which is...
1552111.title: Explore Campus take 2

15521111.content:
You walk into the library, finally comfortable with your new heels, though still a little uneasy about the breeze on your legs. You sit down at a table and peruse a few books, before another girl, sits down at the table.

"So you're the new students..." she said. "I'm Jessica."

"Cassie. And this is my cousin, Katy." Cassie said, motioning to you.

"Don't worry, you're not the first student like this. We had a few of them the semester I was enrolled here." Jessica said.

"We went past a common room, but no one would speak to us." you said.

"Yeah, those were probably the girls who've been here only a semester. They're still scared to death of the headmistress and the demerits." Jessica said.

"Sounds like you've been here a while. Are you a senior student?" Cassie asked. Jessica laughed.

"Hardly." Jessica said. "I'm what you'd call a problem student. I've been here since I was fourteen. I'm nearly eighteen and I'm still on the second semester."

"Got any advice?" you asked.

"Well, for you, I'd say keep your head down and do what they say and maybe you can get out of here intact." Jessica replied. "Without getting any more demerits, I see you've already gotten the first punishment."

"Yeah." you said.

"It'll be tough. But most students like you end up out of here in three semesters." Jessica said. "Lemme see your schedules."

You showed Jessica your schedules.

"The first semester is usually easy, but it does get worse." Jessica said. "When dinner rolls around, why don't you two sit with me and my friends, we'll help you get adjusted."

Suddenly, the librarian strolled up to your table and looked you over.

"Ah, Ms. Redmond." the librarian said. "I see you're helping our two newest students acclimate. Maybe you'll pass this semester after all."

Jessica smiled at her.

"Of course, ma'am." she said.

The librarian walked away and Jessica's smile turned to a scowl.

"I've got to go. See you at dinner." Jessica walked away.

What's next?
15521111.title: Library

1553.content: No Strings Attached: A guy finds himself being forced into feminine activities as if pulled by invisible strings. He is the puppet but who is the puppeteer?
1553.title: More Options

15531.content:
You were at a Family Reunion

Your Parent's were here, along with your sister, two girl cousins, one guy cousin, 2 aunts and an uncle.

The first few days had been quite active, a mix of seeing the sights and just spending time together since it didn't happen much.

Today was the opposite, everybody was just hanging out.

You were watching TV in the living room with your sister and girl cousins bored when your Aunt Nancy comes in.

I was thinking about having a spa day who's in?

Both cousins and your sister raise their hand.

"You sure you want to go? it'll be pretty girly" You look up realizing She's talking to you

For some reason your hand is raised, you try to put it down, but it feels like its being pulled.

You start to say No You don't want to go, but your slips feel like they're staples shut, you try and shake your head, but it won't move. it only serves to make your face turn red, and you find your head nodding against your will.

"Aww look he's embarrassed" Your Cousin Amy says "Of course you can come if you want."

This only makes you blush deeper, you don't want to go on a girly spa day, but as if on cue, your legs gets pulled out from the ground and pulls you into a standing position, soon enough your legs are pulling you into walking behind the girls and filing into the car, you lips still feel staples shut and your body acting on its own as if its a puppet.
15531.title: No Strings Attached

155311.content:
On the way there, the girls chatter about how fun it's going to be, and how there's no shame in wanting to be pampered once in a while. You'd like to join the conversation and put the kibosh on all this, but your mouth is still stapled shut.

"I think you're brave for wanting to do this, none of my male friends would be man enough to come along." Amy said.

"This is going to be fun." Your sister said.

"Yeah!" your other cousin, Marie said.

"We're almost there!" Aunt Nancy said.

What next?
155311.title: To the Spa

1553111.content:
The car pulls up and you and the women get out, as your body walks you inside with them. You keep trying to break free, but your body refuses to listen to you. Aunt Nancy goes up to the woman at the front and organizes it, while you stand back with your cousins and sister, unable to speak or move under your own volition. You weren't paying attention to your conversation, you were focusing on getting out of here, but to no avail. After a few minutes, a few spa employees led you and you relatives to a back room with several spa chairs arranged in it. Some started handing out robes to your aunt, cousins and sister.

"It's, uh, policy for all patrons to change into these." one of the employees said to you, as she handed you a robe.

You nodded and went behind a screen to change out of your clothes, and into the robe. You emerged and sat down in one of the chairs, leaning back as you closed your eyes and tried to regain control. As you did that, your sister, aunt and cousins emerged from behind different screens and sat down as well. Several employees then walked into the room, getting ready to prep the spa-goers.

"I wonder what's first?" your sister asked.

"Well, that's going to be..." the employee began to reply.
1553111.title: Spa time!

15531112.content:
"The facial." the employee finished.

The facial, which was a green mush in a bowl that was brushed and spread onto your face by the employee was, actually kinda relaxing. Or it would have been if you weren't fighting with yourself to gain control over your movements.

"Come on... just let me move my arm or something... or my leg..." you thought as your face was covered in the green mush.

The employee then placed two slices of cucumber over your eyes, stereotypical, but apparently it was good for your eyes. As they were placed, you felt yourself involuntarily falling asleep, and you tried to fight back, but you slipped into unconsciousness as the facial was finished.

"And next is..." an employee started.
15531112.title: Facial

155311121.content:
Apparently no one else noticed, as everyone, including you got their nails done. Your feet were in a basin of water and your hands were being prepped. Your sister, cousins and aunt were so focused on their own Mani-Pedi that they didn't notice when the employee asked you what color you wanted and your hand pointed. You meanwhile, were asleep and even if you weren't, you couldn't have stopped it. When it was finished, your aunt, sister and cousin finished first, turning over to you, who was still asleep and wearing the mask.

"Oh my god." Marie said.

"His nails!" Aunt Nancy said. "We have to make them remove it before he wakes up."

"Maybe we should ask him what he wants." your sister said.

You stirred awake as the mask was removed, and your body stood up. You glanced at your hands, which were tipped with french tipped nails and your feet, which were polished the same way. Your relatives watched you to see what you were going to say. You looked at them, and tried to speak, but alas, nothing came out.

"Are you okay?" your sister asked.

You shook your head, nodding "No", but your body betrayed you and nodded the other way.

"Do you want the nail polish removed?" Aunt Nancy asked.

You attempted to nod "Yes", but nodded "No" this time.

"So, where do we go from here?" your sister asked.

"Well..." Aunt Nancy started.
155311121.title: Mani/Pedi

1553111211.content:
"Want to go shopping?" Aunt Nancy asks.

You nod your head yes against your will.

"You've been such a good sport about this, so we'll let you pick where to go."

Despite you trying to say "Home" you're body betrays you and you say...
1553111211.title: We could go shopping

15532.content: Phantom of the Auditorium: Some say that the college auditorium is haunted but one guy knows for sure.
15532.title: Options

choices: You find an item sitting inside the vent
You find nothing, but decide to investigate further
155321.content:
Garnier University was renowned for many of their academic programs, but the one that most people knew about was their musical theater program. And that was what attracted many people to the university in the first place. It was definitely what attracted you to the school. Your passion was singing, though you had some disadvantages, your vocal range was a tad high for a man, somewhere between countertenor and treble. You had always been told your voice would have been beautiful, if you were a girl, but it didn't dash your dreams a bit.

Luckily, Garnier U had variety in between all of their shows, so there was always a part for every range. Even your rather unique one. Though, when you had first arrived on the tour, you had heard some... rumors.

"And here's the auditorium. This is where we put on all of our shows." the tour guide had said.

"Isn't this where that accident was a few years ago?" one of the prospective students asked.

"Accident?" another asked.

"There was a fire a few years back, yes. But everyone came out alive... except for one actor. He was the understudy of the lead role, in the back dressing room." the tour guide replied.

"And his spirit haunts the auditorium to this day!" someone laughed.

"Cut that out! It was a terrible accident and nothing to joke about! A student died!" the tour guide immediately quelled any laughter.

The group was ushered out of the auditorium, but the thought still lingered on everyone's mind. Was there a ghost lurking around the dressing rooms?

But you were unconvinced, you weren't superstitious. When you were accepted and once you started classes, you checked around for the fall musical, which was a retelling of Faust, where the protagonist makes a deal with the devil for personal gain. You were hoping for a role, even though you had been told that freshman usually didn't get roles in the fall.

That was why you were in the auditorium after hours, doing some vocal practice. You were in the dressing rooms, newly renovated since the accident with proper fire suppression systems, and singing the songs that had been distributed for auditions. As you sang, you noticed that something was breaking your concentration. A rattling sound.

"Hello?" you asked. "Is anyone there?"

You didn't get a reply, so you continued singing. But the noise started up again.

This time, you tried to find the source, which was behind a mirror in the back most dressing room. The noise was coming from a vent, old-looking from the sight of it, probably from before they renovated. It was probably just age... but what if there was something inside causing the noise? You could hardly concentrate with all that racket. You pulled the cover off the vent and...
155321.title: Phantom of the Auditorium

choices: You go back to the auditorium to rehearse some more
You notice some strange occurrences around campus
1553211.content:
Sitting directly behind the vent's cover was an ornate hair clip. Looked like it had been some sort of prop for a previous year's show or something.

"This must've been rattling around when the air was circulating." you mused as you pocketed the clip.

You checked your watch and realized that you should be heading back to the dorms. You quickly replaced the vent cover and left, though couldn't push away a strange sensation of being watched.

Meanwhile, within the vent, a shadowy figure stirred, before returning to the depths from which it had came.

You returned to your dorm and put your bag down onto your bed. Across the room, your roommate, Raul Chambers, looked up from his computer.

"Yo, Chris! Where have you been?" he asked. "Haven't seen you all day!"

"Rehearsing for my audition." you replied.

"I thought they didn't start auditioning for another two weeks..." Raul questioned.

"They don't, but you can never be too prepared." you said as you started emptying your pockets, pulling out the hair clip.

Raul made a puzzled face as you placed it down onto your desk.

"What's that?" he asked.

"I dunno. Found it in a vent in the dressing room while I was rehearsing. Thing was rattling around." you replied.

"Maybe the Phantom left it there..." Raul joked.

"Oh, come on! You shouldn't joke about that!" you chided.

"Sorry, but I couldn't help it." Raul laughed.

You pulled out your computer and started working on coursework before turning in for the night.

The next day...
1553211.title: You find an item sitting inside the vent

choices: You wake up in a strange bed in a room under the auditorium
You wake up in the dressing room, having been dressed in women's clothing
15532111.content:
The next day, after classes, you returned to the auditorium. You started singing as you tested the acoustics of the room, finding the best place to practice.

Meanwhile, under the auditorium, a shadowy figure listened intently to the dulcet tones that were reverberating from the auditorium. The figure lamented a cracked and charred picture frame as they listened. As the singing continued, the figure began to move towards the nearest vent.

You got really into one of the songs you were practicing and so you didn't notice the rattling of the vent, or the movement of furniture in the dressing room.

The shadowy figure had heard the voice. It was the most lovely voice ever, and must belong to a lovely woman. He must meet her, for they are destined to be together. As he fought his way out of the subbasement of the auditorium, he awaited finally meeting his soulmate.

You felt a strange presence as you finished up your song. You ran a hand through your hair as you wiped some sweat from your brow. As you looked around to make sure that you were alone, you saw a face, half-obscured by a mask, enter your line of sight. Six inches from your face. You jumped back, tripping over your bag as you tried to run away.

You screamed as you fell back, hitting your head on one of the auditorium seats. The last thing you saw before blacking out was the figure slowly hovering over you as your eyes fluttered closed.
15532111.title: You go back to the auditorium to rehearse some ...

choices: The Phantom appears and tries to help you get more comfortable
You hear a noise that scares you and makes you forget about the clip
155321111.content:
Fighting away the shadows in your vision, you felt your eyes flicker open.

“Mmm...? Where...am I?”

The room was somewhat dark, a beam of light shining down to surround the bed with pure white sheets that you found yourself in. You were...under the stage?

“H...hello?” You ask quietly into the dimly lit room, until your vision passs over a mirror.

You gasp a bit in surprise before realizing what you see is just a reflection of yourself. Wait...

You raise your hand gently to your hair. You were wearing the hair clip! A delicate and very detailed flower, the pink accentuating your light colored hair.

You start to pull it free when...
155321111.title: You wake up in a strange bed in a room under th...

choices: The Phantom rushes away from you
1553211112.content:
A loud metal clang sounded from another room, which caused you to jump!

"What the?" you shouted as you looked around for where the noise came from.

You weren't entirely sure, until you heard some shuffling from a corner of the room and saw a secluded door in the corner. You slowly approached it, preparing for the worst and swung it open to find... nothing behind it.

"Hello?" you asked.

No response. You walked through the door and into a room with a half-dismantled, and very damaged clothing rack lying on the ground with various burned costumes lying around it.

"They must have just closed all this off instead of repairing it..." you thought to yourself.

"Hello?" you asked again.

Something moved in the corner. You slowly approached the shadowy figure when...
1553211112.title: You hear a noise that scares you and makes you ...

choices: Give it a minute then approach
Fall back to the room with the bed and look around
15532111122.content:
“No...no...”

As you quietly approach, the dark figure appears to be mumbling to themselves, looking through the burnt costumes.

“No...She deserves something as beautiful as her voice... no... this won’t do... where would such be...?”

The voice sounded quite as though somewhat frustrated. You stop walking up and quietly step to the side to hide behind a row of costumes as the figure suddenly stands to his feet.

“No! This will not do! I will not give up though!” To punctuate his point, he gave his cape a flip.

Huh. What a weirdo...
15532111122.title: The Phantom rushes away from you

155322.content: Just One day: It's bring your daughter to work day but unfortunately for one father, he only has a son. That is...for now...
155322.title: More Options

1553221.content:
Who's Idea is it for you to pretend to be a girl.

Yours or Your Dad's
1553221.title: Just One Day

15532211.content:
You're father worked at a Security Firm, and you, being really into computers, planned on going into the Tech industry yourself and were really interested in his work.

Problem was you couldn't enter the premise without authorization and a low level Security Clearance, so you'd never been allowed to visit. Until now.

At Dinner a few days ago your father had let drop, that someone had convinced someone up high to allow a bring your daughter to work day, apparently one of the bosses has a daughter he's particularly proud of and that helped.

"Wait! really? So I could Come?"

"I knew you'd want to so I asked, Sorry Alan, Top brass was insistent that it was "Bring Your Daughter to Work Day" I think They were just nervous about a bunch of teenage boys making it a catastrophe. Sorry Kiddo."

That sucked, and was totally unfair, and technically downright sexist, but you let it go.

And that was that, until a few days later, while at school one of the Cheerleaders at school had come in after cutting her hair super short, she'd always had long blond hair and you weren't sure why, but you had a silly thought that her hair was no longer that yours was, it may have even been shorter

https://www.polyvore.com/cgi/img-thing?....

Maybe with just a little bit of effort you could finally get to see You're Dad's workplace.
15532211.title: Yours

155322111.content:
Another few days passed until you finalized your plan You hopped in your car and headed to the nearby mall, picked up a cheap pair of clip-on earrings, some Hairspray and perfume.

https://www.purepearls.com/assets/images...

"I don't exactly need to look like a princess, even if I look boyish I just need the benefit of the doubt, and who's gonna question me afterall."

Back home he tried on the earrings tried combing his hair a few different ways before finding something that worked, it wasn't too difficult to turn his guy hair

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/e0/c7/0b/...

Into a girl's hair

http://www.prettydesigns.com/wp-content/...

Not bad, you looked maybe a little girlish, but to total strangers if you were introduced as a girl, You didn't think they'd have any reason to doubt you.

You took a picture and sent it to dad.

"Think you would mind taking your Daughter Alice to work next week?"

A few minutes later you get a response.
155322111.title: a little bit of effort

1553221112.content:
"You must really want to go, It's funny I almost threw out the idea at dinner as a joke"

Then a second later another text

"I won't stop you, if you want to do come go for it, you're lucky I don't make much small talk at work and nobody knows I don't have a daughter.

Then another

"You look very pretty Alice."

You and your dad had always gotten along quite well, he was of course not gonna let you live this down anytime soon, but you couldn't miss out on this opportunity.

You sent back a sarcastic text

"Thanks Daddy :P" and then felt a bit weird about it

"Sorry that was a bit too much"

you combed your hair back into place took the earings off and started your homework.
1553221112.title: Dad's amused.

15532211121.content:
Time passed quickly and before long it was the day of the event, you'd stayed home from school styled your hair sprayed some perfume, and put on your earrings.

other than that you wore your regular jeans and a loose sweater and tennis shoes, and again you looked just androgynous to pass.

"Honey are you sure you don't want to borrow a bra? it would help your figure." Your Mom said supportively.

"Mom, I'm not trying to crossdress, just made myself look a little girlish so I could go with Dad to work." you tell your mom for the third time today.

"Besides, we need to get going, you sure you're up for it Allen... I mean Alice?"

"Definitely, it might be my only chance to see everything you do."

"Alright then princess, hop in the car." he said, you just rolled your eyes and went along
15532211121.title: The Day of the event.

155322111211.content:
A bit nervous you step out of the car and lag a bit behind your dad as he heads for the entrance.

"Hey Champ, I know this isn't exactly how you wanted to visit, but I am proud of you, doing all this really shows your perseverance.

you pick up the pace and enter behind him, entering into a security check.

Dad shows his ID and introduces you.

"And this is my Daughter Alice."

You just smile and Nod as you are allowed in.

Inside the main area is exactly like you expected, mostly cubicles with a few surrounding offices, and through a door, you can just barely see rows and rows of servers, all humming quietly.

There are many employees bustling around, most of which are with young girls, but a few are older, maybe middle school age, until you finally see a taller girl, straight, but messy blonde hair and bangs, she looks to be about your age.

Dad heads over to her, with you following behind.

"Howard, this must be Christina, you talk so much about." You recognized the name, that must be Howards Rogers, Dad's boss.

"Tina's fine" she says flatly.

"Ed, I didn't know you had a daughter"

"Heh Sometimes I almost forget myself..."

You're pushing it... you think to yourself.

"This is Alice" he says nudging you forward.

"Uh, yeah Hello, its nice to meet you both." You extend a hand and shake Mr. Rogers, but only get a casual nod from Tina.

With that you part ways and Dad begins showing you around, his desk, the programs he uses, and the Servers. It's amazing and everything you hoped it would be.
155322111211.title: There are Several daughters there

1553221112111.content:
Only a few hours later you're watching dad program, while Idly browsing Reddit on your phone when a man enters the room and whispers something to your Father.

"Oh... does the client already know?"

"Yes, Howard has them on the phone, he needs everyone in the conference room."

"Shit, alright, Sorry Alice, you won't be allowed in, its private stuff, I'll see what we can do." he says as the two of you head towards the conference room.

You see Howard with Tina outside the door.

"Perfect, Ed, I'll need you for atleast an hour, probably more, Tina You and Alice can get to know eachother, go and get lunch if you want."

With that They went in and closed the door, leaving you with Tina.

"Sooo, Hi, I guess," Tina said, hardly glancing at you.

You glance at the time, it is almost 11:30. "Want to get lunch?"
1553221112111.title: There's a minor emergency.

15532211121111.content:
she just sighed and said sure.

The two of you started outside, making sure you'd be allowed back in by security, and were outside in the parking lot.

Tina spots a McDonalds and surprisingly seems to perk up

"I haven't had McDonalds in years, mind going there?"

not being a huge fan of the place, but somewhat eager to appease Tina you agree.

"Sure, that's fine with me."

There's Tina ordered some Nuggets and a quarter pounder, while you just got a couple of cheeseburgers.

As you were eating, Tina seemed to be really enjoying her meal.

"Don't eat out a lot" you ask.

"Like never, My Mom's always got me dieting, I haven't had junk food in years, which reminds me, don't tell my dad we went here."

"Seriously why all the dieting?" less nervous now that Tina seems more talkative and not just zoning out like she had been

She grins, "Well, you might not believe me but.
15532211121111.title: "Sure, I guess"

155322111211111.content:
"I do, like a ton of beauty pageants, Mostly Mom's idea."

You raised an Eyebrow, Tina seemed like the type to roll her eyes at the idea of doing something like that, sure she was tall, and honestly, pretty hot, but you still couldn't imagine her.

She laughed, "I told you, you wouldn't believe me, nobody ever does, I'm pretty sure I am the way I am as a way of Rebelling and expressing myself since I don't get much say in my life otherwise..."

You looked even more confused "Did you just psycho-analyze yourself?"

"I like Psycology, sue me." she said sticking out her tongue.

you paused, looking at her.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/25/a2/dc/25a2d...

"You know what, I have proof, I've got a picture, I just won, Miss Green County last month." she pulled out her phone and showed you a picture she had.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/c3/44/1b/c3441...

"That... is undoubtedly you" you laugh, trying to picture the 'too cool for this' girl in front of you posing and smiling like that

"That's the only reason I'm here today, Mom has me constantly either taking Singing, Piano, or Dance lessons, and I'm constantly, wearing Corsets, they help with my posture" she said with a scoff

"So enough about me, what about you, Alice, you're clearly not the feminine type, short hair, boys clothes, and I'm fairly sure those are clip on earrings."

Stunned you pause. "You're very observant."

"I've gotta be, gotta get in the mind of the competition." she laughs.

You laugh too.

She continues, "When was the last time you painted your nails? do you ever wear makeup? do you own any dresses?

"Umm... a long time, no, and no" you say answering in order.

"Girl you're missing out." she held out her hands, her nails all immaculately painted and decorated with little gems."

"Wow those are nice."

"Yeah Mom would kill me if I messed 'em up."

A bit later you're heading back to the office

"Remember, If anyone asks, we went somewhere else for lunch, and I had a salad."

You mimic zipping your lips.
155322111211111.title: Tina's Secret

1553221112111111.content:
You're really.enjoying yourself. Tina is too, and she decides to have some fun.

"Since you really liked my nails, you can have beauties like mine too."

She starts painting them before you can respond, and a few minutes later your nails are all colorful.
1553221112111111.title: Hanging out with Tina

"I talked to your dad, who said he was fine with us hanging out for a bit. You in?"

You nod your head, wave your dad off, and go away.

You and Tina walk back to her house, as her parents both had to leave the house. Once you get there, Tina wants to bring something up.

"You seem like good people, Alice. Stay here while I get you something."

You wait for what seems like ages when she returns with...
15532211121111111.title: Going down the girly ladder

Alice arrives with hair dye.

"...Pink."

And that's how you died your hair pink at Tina's house.

You leave peacefully, unaware of what tomorrow brings.
155322111211111111.title: Hair Dye

choices: Bring Your Daughter to Work Day Ends
1553221112111112.content:
You and Tina arrive back at work, she's the coolest, she's so easy to talk to you practically forget that you're pretending to be a girl, but you're still careful about what you say, but it kind of sucks that after today you won't be able to talk to her again.

You and Tina hang out in the Lobby for a while and before long, Your Dad comes out.

"Hey Princess" Your Dad is having too much fun with this. "Everything's fixed and we can get on with the tour."

"Awesome!" you'd almost forgotten that the whole reason you were pretending to be Alice was to Tour Dad's office.

"Christina? You want to come to?"

"No Thanks" Tina answered, her phone ringing, "I've got to call my Mom anyways. Oh Alice let me get Your Number, we should hang out some time."

You agreed and without even thinking about it you did so, and said Goodbye and followed Dad into the office eager to see the tech they had.

"So You and Christina hit it off? And you are going to hang out again...?"

"Yeah she's actually pretty cool...." You trailed off realizing he meant the whole "Alice" thing. "Shit"
1553221112111112.title: Crisis averted, Dad's free again.

choices: You turn her down, pretending to be busy
unsure what to do you just ignore the text for now.
15532211121111121.content:
A few hours later, the work day ends, one that started off pretty rocky, but ended amazing, you finally got to see Dad's workplace, you got to see all their equipment and fawned over it all day, you were almost drooling when you saw the size of the server room.

You met up with Tina again as Dad and you were preparing to leave, and chatted for a few minutes.

"We definitely need to hang out sometime, I hardly ever get out, My Mom is a slave-driver with the whole pageant thing, You're like the first person my age I've met that isn't through pageants."

You pause but agree non-committal. "Absolutely, it was fun meeting you." which was true after all, but you just wish you had met her as Alan, not Alice.

=================================================================

The drive home was half awkward, as you un-clipped your earrings and tried to un-style your hair and half you non-stop talking, asking questions about the computers and devices Dad used for work, which he answered happily.

You got a text from Tina "We didn't exactly make plans, but I just remembered my Mom is busy this Saturday so you should totally come over!"

You find yourself tempted, this whole disguise isn't the hardest thing to do... but the idea of it, continueing this charade of being a girl, to hang out with a girl... you don't know if its a good idea.
15532211121111121.title: Bring Your Daughter to Work Day Ends

choices: Weeks go by and you keep dodging Tina's invites
You run into Tina somewhere unexpected
155322111211111211.content:
You think its better not to, and respond "Sorry I've got a"... you pause thinking of an excuse, "Family thing that day" you finish texting and hit send.

"No worries, but you definitely should come over, it was fun hanging out with you."

"Totally agree, still can't picture you at a beauty pageant, you're way too cool."

You continued texting Tina until you arrived home, where you quickly changed clothes and took a shower getting the hairspray out of your hair.

A bit later, still texting Tina you had dinner, and got some notes from school from a friend and did your homework before going to bed.
155322111211111211.title: You turn her down, pretending to be busy

choices: You need a more serious makeover this time.
Screw this Tell Tina the Truth.
1553221112111112111.content:
You'd been Texting Tina back and Forth nearly every day since, and from Time to time Tina would invite you out, and you'd have to come up with an excuse, first you mentioned you had a big project at school, but after a while you had to let that one go and start changing your story to for the situation.

You were torn, part of you knew you should tell her the truth, but you worried she'd hate you and you'd never see or hear from her again, and you really liked her.

You were getting out of school Friday. and get a text from Tina

"Ughh Pageant this Sunday, My Mom's putting my through a whole regiment this weekend."

"My Thoughts are with you, what's the regiment?"

"eh the usual Corset, Hair in curlers a beauty mask and eating nothing but like 0 calorie health food."

"I'll think of you while i lay around and eat junk food all weekend" You reply

"so no big plans this weekend?" she asked, you were yet unaware of the trap she'd set.

"Nope, nothing as fun as your plans."

"My Mom's running errands all day Saturday, you can come keep me company!" she texted.

You froze, you'd made it pretty clear you had no plans, and Tina sounded like she could really use somebody else's company, if you bailed she'd know you were lying, or atleast avoiding her...

You sighed, what had you done to yourself.

"Sounds great! It'll be great to see you again!"

"Really? You don't suddenly have plans or anything :P"

She clearly believes you've been ducking her invites.

"IVE BEEN BUSY" you respond with mock anger.

"Sure sure, see you tomorrow, so excited, but gotta go, my mom needs to do another layer on my nails."

"See you tomorrow"

You stood still for a second, it had gotten hot in the past few weeks, last time you'd seen Tina, you'd worn a loose hoodie, it was way too hot. Anything Bulky would make you stick out and would be something Tina obviously would ask about, looks like you needed a few more items for tomorrow.
1553221112111112111.title: Weeks go by and you keep dodging Tina's inv...

choices: "Because I think you measured wrong, this won't fit."
"Because... I went through the same thing as you" she whispers
15532211121111121111.content:
while driving to the mall, you'd periodically google how to measure yourself for a bra, while at stoplights, luckily you knew your chest size, from ordering a suit a few months ago for a Cousin's Wedding.

You figured you'd get a 36 A cup, wear it under a T-shirt and it should do a passable job, along with your earrings and girly hair, you should be fine, Tina hadn't seen through it last time.

Heading into the mall, you wandered down through it, until coming to a store selling Women's underwear, To Your dismay, A Victoria's Secret.

A bit embarrassed, you headed inside.

Mostly unnoticed you find a table with some size's you expect to be in your range, it takes an annoying long time until you find what you're looking for. and the color was plain and simple style if there was a masculine style for bra's this was it. you try to keep it out of sight as you head to the register.

luckily to your surprise the line at the register is clear you head up and and a lady in her late 20's or early 30's begins checking you out.

She scans the tag and pauses, glancing at you.

"No judgements... she says quietly, but is this for you?"

You attempt not to stutter nervously as you reply.

"No its a gag gift for a friend"
15532211121111121111.title: Bra shopping

choices: Make your way out of the mall
You're here, might as well get a few more things...
Maybe you should stop by a Salon and have them help...
155322111211111211112.content:
"Because hypothetically..." she lowers her voice. "There's no way you're a 36 band size, I'd guess you measured your chest at your shoulders... not around the torso."

You pause, you just want to be out of here... but she's right, you remember getting sized for your suit, and they definitely did shoulders.

You decide to be honest, "so what size would you think."

"Well" she said cancelling the purchase, "its hard to say but I can discretely measure you in the back and even find something that would fit."

You just wanted this over with but it was probably for the best.

"Sure, will it take long?"

"I can do it in 2 or 3 minutes tops."

She closes down her register and leads you into a back room with a private changing room.

"Ok shirt off, Ill find your size."

You do as she says, wanting this to be over quickly.

"I'm Ashley, by the way." she says wrapping a tape measure around your chest."

"Alan" you say giving her, your name"

"What about a girl name? Oh Looks like I was right, You're somewhere between a 30 and a 32, that 36 would've hung really poorly"

"Umm... Alice" you say, letting Ashley think you're a crossdresser, that's better than telling her this is all to hang out with a girl, that'll only get you in trouble.

"Well its nice to meet you Alice, I'll be right back with something to try on."

In the blink of an eye, she's back.

"So Just Yesterday we wrapped on a sale in Juniors so we're a bit short of smaller band sizes but try this on, do you need some help?" she asks handing you a decidedly girlier bra than the one you'd picked out for yourself earlier.

https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/...

"No thanks, I'll manage.

Ashley closes the curtain and you slip the bra on over your head like a T-shirt and adjusted it. It felt snug but not uncomfortably tight"

"How's it fit?"

"I think pretty good" you said adjusting the shoulder straps and feeling a bit silly."

"Do you want me to find a few more to try on while you're in there."

"No that's alright I'll just take this one." Desperate to end all this, you'd happily just buy this one and be done with it."

"Are you sure? we've got a sale on panties..."

"no, no, le me just get his off and I'll pay."

"If You'd like to be discrete, I could just scan it and ring it up, you could wear it so you won't need to carry it out."

"That... would actually be great. good idea." the bra should hardly be noticeable and that way you wouldn't need to carry it, or a bag out of here.

Ashley peaks in and checks the tag and heads out, "Meet me at the Register... Alice."

You hurriedly put on your shirt and check that the bra is totally hidden, and it seems to be.

You head to the register and pay for your purchase, thanking Ashley on your way out. You take your receipt glancing at it as you leave.

Wait... the bra you bought is labeled as a 32 B-cup wonderbra... damnit, You had just assumed Ashley had gotten you another a-cup, but she'd gone a cup size up and it was padded on top of that.
155322111211111211112.title: You need to get sized.

1553221112111112111121.content:
You quickly head for the exit, feeling like everybody is staring at you though you know that's silly, though when you pass by a particularly reflective surface you could see the slight bumps under your shirt, which made you more self conscious, but this was better than carrying it out or lugging a bright pink Victoria's secret bag.

Remembering Tina pointed out your earrings last week you realized it might be a good idea to wear different ones this week, so you quickly popped into a "Claire's" and bought some

https://cf.ltkcdn.net/jewelry/images/std...

With that you headed home, Your parents were in other rooms so you were able to head up to your room unseen and remove the bra.

The rest of the Evening went on as usual you did most of your homework, had dinner with your family and later were going to bed when you got another Text from Tina.

"Still coming over tomorrow? haven't come up with an excuse yet."

"i'VE BEEN BUSY" You reply copying your earlier text. then send another

"but srsly, yeah totes free all day tomorrow, when should I head over?"

"Maybe around 10:30 or 11:00, My Mom's gonna help me with my beauty regiment then has errands all day."

"Alright see you tomorrow So excited!" you texted, you had to be careful you had started texting like a girl when you talked to Tina, and you'd accidentally do it to other people too.
1553221112111112111121.title: Make your way out of the mall

choices: Tina wants to lounge out by the pool.
15532211121111121111211.content:
You rolled out of bed around 9:30 and got in the shower, and afterwards got some breakfast, Your Mom went to work in her Garden in the backyard, and Dad was about to start mowing the lawn, so you shouldn't have a problem doing yourself like a girl and getting out unseen.

You went upstairs and stripped, after attempting to clip the bra on behind your back for nearly 5 minutes and giving up, you took it off clipped it and put it on like a shirt, like you had yesterday.

You put on a T-shirt and shorts that were the best fit for unisex you had, afterwards you did your hair and clipped on the new earrings.

Satisfied that you looked as much like a girl as you did last time. You checked that the coast was clear and got in your car and headed to the address Tina sent you.

"Heading over" You texted.

"Great My Mom just left, See ya in a bit."

It took about 30 minutes but you finally got onto Tina's street, all the Houses were Massive, not like big houses, but like big even for a Mansion.

You found the house number and headed down the nearly mile long Driveway you parked near some other cars.

You marvelled at the place as you headed to the front door, you'd nearly forgotten that you presently looked, mostly like a girl, you were too caught up in the size of this place.

Moments later you knocked and suddenly the door Burst open and a blue face Yelled "Boo!"

You jumped backward but then saw what had scared you.

https://previews.123rf.com/images/sevalv...

Tina had some sort of mud mask on, and had her hair in curlers.

"Sorry I just had to, I knew you wouldn't expect to see me like this so..." she laughed

"I don't know what to ask about first, about all this..." you gesture to her face. "Or all of this!" you gesture to the massive house.

"Yeah we're pretty well off, I mean my Dad owns the whole Company, and My mom does a good amount of Model work... as for this, I told you I'd be doing this all weekend, the curlers are going to be in all day and the mud mask just went on so it needs about 2 hours then it comes off.

"Well I hope its worth it, cuz you look like a monster."

"Bitch! she laughed. "Let me guess You've never done a Mudmask before? and you've definitely never curled your hair, How do you even call yourself a girl."

"I Don't like all that girl stuff." You say Truthfully.

"Oh and I mentioned the Corset right, she says undoing her robe.

You avert your eyes, quickly.

"Relax prude, you can look, even if I was naked we're both girls.

You felt sort of bad but looked anyways, under her robe Tina wore a beige corset."

http://www.mfrannie.com/media/catalog/pr...

"It helps with posture too, its uncomfortable to slouch so it keeps me standing upright and you beauty queen-like."

"That looks so uncomfortable!" you said with surprise.

You've probably never worn a corset, I probably had one on for about 30% of my life, that's so unfair, but anyways, I've got Netflix, there's a pool outback, and about a thousand other things to do, I'll show you around.

They get to work, waxing your legs, putting in hair extensions, giving you breast forms, and a bigger bra, a DD cup!

they slid it over your body, your new breast forms giving you an hourglass figure. you look in the mirror.
