You couldn't wait to see Tina tomorrow, lets see if she'll still call you a Tomboy, maybe you should compete in the beauty pageant she was in too
1553221112111112111123.title: Maybe you should stop by a Salon and have them ...

155322111212.content:
On the way to the office they stopped at a Gas 'n' Sip so Alan's dad can get a coffee. Alan was getting himself a large fountain soda when his dad noticed.

"Are you certain you want that? They won't let you in past the lobby with it so you'll either have to drink it or throw it away."

"Ya, no problem. I will have it gone before we get there." Alan replied.

His dad just shrugged his shoulders and paid for the drinks.

A short while later they were in the main lobby, Alan was noisily slurping the last bit of his drink. Mary, the HR assistant, was gathering them all together. Besides Alan, there were seven other girls, ranging in age from 14 to 17. Alan did not recognize any of them as being from his school.

"Greetings and welcome to the first 'Bring Your Daughter to Work Day' here at Thompson Technologies." Mary said with a big smile and her hands waving in the air.

The girls were excited, whispering to their parents, as they gathered closer together. Alan looked them over as he deposited his now empty cup in a waste bin.

Alan thought there were two or three girls about his age, the one with the medium length black hair (she said her name was Lucy and she made it clear she was the boss's daughter), the one with long stringy light brown hair (she said her name was Patti), and maybe the brown haired one with the braids (who said her name was Tammy). The other four girls were younger than him with Sally, the cute curly blonde haired girl, looking to be the youngest of them all. He was lost in thought and did not catch the other three girls names.

He snapped out of his daze as Mary cleared her throat, "Hello, it's your turn to introduce yourself..." she said while everyone was now waiting expectantly for Alan.

Now feeling the pressure, "Oh, uhh, my name is, is uh-Alice. I'm sorry." he finally squeaked out.

"It's OK Alice, you don't need to apologize," Sally says to him as she and Patti moved over to calm him down.

Some of the others also came over and quickly he found out the last three girls were named Margaret, Valerie, and April Grant.

Margaret's hair was the longest he had ever seen and it was very curly and very red. Her glasses did nothing to detract from her beauty. He found out she was Mary's daughter and he could see where the hair came from. Valerie looked mousy, apparently unaware that her beauty was hidden under her long messy blonde hair.

April Grant was bouncing on her toes with her wavy strawberry blonde hair flying about, "Come on, we have to hear the rest of the introduction" she says, urging them all to pay attention to Mary.

"...will be getting real government photo IDs and then we will start the enrollment paperwork," Mary was saying, "so say a short goodbye to the parents as we'll be catching up with them just before lunch."
155322111212.title: There aren't many.

1553221112121.content:
Alan was a bit stunned trying to comprehend what Mary had said. He didn't know what he was supposed to be doing. His dad gave him a friendly shoulder squeeze and told him to follow the group, not cause any problems, and he would see him again for lunch.

All the parents soon left to get their day started, except for Mary of course who was in charge of getting the girls processed.

"OK, we'll be seeing them all again for lunch, " she said to the girls, "now please follow me."
1553221112121.title: A short goodbye

15532211121211.content:
Mary led the girls into the HR department where she had them all take a seat in the lounge. She explained that they will each be taken in one at a time to have their ID made and in the meantime they can read some of the pamphlets about the company.

Alan was the third one to be called in,

Inside the small office Mary was sitting at a desk with a high counter. Next to her was a large camera system connected to a computer. The camera was facing a blank green wall with an X taped on the floor in front of it.

"Alice please stand on the X and look at the camera," Mary says as she is typing away on the computer. "That's it, now smile." And the camera flashed so brightly that Alan was dazed a bit, blinking his eyes and trying to get the spots to go away. There were more flashes in the meantime as Mary took several pics.

"OK, now come over here tot he higher counter and give me your right hand please," Mary said.

Still stunned by the flashes Alan moved to the counter and did as Mary requested. She was placing his fingers into a small scanner device and she then asked for and got his left hand to do the same thing.

After a few more moments of Mary typing away, Alan's eyes were finally starting to clear up. There was some processing sounds coming from the computer and Mary took the ID card as it popped out and handed it to Alan.

"Please wait out in the waiting room and send in Valerie."

Alan was trying to get a clear view of the card as he stepped out into the waiting room and told Valerie she was next.

When his eyes finally came into focus he saw the card had a picture of him with his eyes partially shut and his mouth agape. He looked down right pathetic in the picture. The card had his full name as A. G. Krebs, his gender as F and his date of birth was missing a number and was smudged. His height and weight were correct though as well as his hair and eye color. Even his SSN was correct. But this card needs to be fixed.

When Valerie came back into the waiting room she said it was Tammy's turn. Alan quickly got up though and told her that he had a problem with his ID so could he go in first. Not waiting for an answer he went into the room to voice his concern.
15532211121211.title: A photo ID

choices: There's still a problem with the ID
155322111212111.content:
"Excuse me Mary," Alan says as he enters the room handing the ID to Mary, "there is a problem with the ID."

Mary looks the card over and sees the date is missing a number and is partially blurred out. "OK dear. We can fix it. What is your date of birth? It looks like the info on the computer got corrupted."

"Can I ask what this ID card is for?" Alan asks, as he thinks this is so unnecessary for one day.

"It is for your temporary security clearance here. It is a registered government photo ID, as good as a driver's license. And with your finger prints and SSN on file the government will be able to protect you, in case anything might happen. Now what is your date of birth?"

Somewhat shocked upon hearing that this card is real and it is identifying him as a girl, Alan mumbles his birth date to Mary. Mary thinks Alice is trying to get one over on her when she mumbles her date of birth, these girls are always trying to make themselves older than they really are. Mary proceeds to set her 'real' DoB for her 'real' age of 14.

When the card was done processing she handed it to Alan and told him to go and quickly send in Tammy as they are running out of time.
155322111212111.title: A problem with the ID

1553221112121111.content:
As Alan enters the waiting room he is looking at the card as he tells Tammy it is her turn. She quickly moves into the next room as Alan takes a seat.

Looking the card over Alan thinks to himself, "this card now has his date of birth printed clearly but it is the wrong date! It says I am only 14 instead of my real age of 17! I need to get Mary to fix this."

He jumps up out of his seat and bursts into the room, interrupting Mary as she is finger scanning Tammy.

"Where's your manners young lady?" she asks Alan. "What's so urgent you have to interrupt?"

"There is an error on the card still...look, here's my driver's license," he tries to say but Mary cuts him off.

Mary is impatient with these girls that have to be perfect all the time, "just place them on the counter and go back into the waiting room please. Tammy will send you in when she is done."

Feeling a bit intimidated Alan put the cards on the counter and then quickly went back to his seat.

As Mary finishes up with Tammy they look at Alan's ID card to see what error there might be with it. They both notice the picture is atrocious, she was making a terrible face and her features were all washed out.

Tammy leans over the counter to get a better look and accidentally knocks Alan's driver's license down behind the computer. It falls through a crack between the counter and the desk, lost amongst the wiring and other debris lying down there in the dark.

"Oh no," she says as she tried to grab it before it fell.

They both look and realize it will be a time consuming job for the service guys to move everything to get to the fallen license.

"I will call somebody up to retrieve it," Mary explains to Tammy. "Go get Margaret and Lucy and help Alice with her makeup and hair, fast, so she can take another picture. While you are doing that send in Sally so I can process her ID please."
1553221112121111.title: There's still a problem with the ID

15532211121211111.content:
Tammy comes into the waiting room and tells Sally it is her turn.

"What about me?" Alan asks as Sally goes into the other room. He fidgets in his seat. The fiasco of this ID card thing along with that large drink he had earlier has built pressure on his bladder. He really needed to go but he needed this card fixed too.

"Margaret, Lucy, can you two help me with Alice please? She needs to freshen up so she can take a better picture." Tammy says as she rummages for some makeup and a brush in her purse.

"Yes, she looks like she needs it a lot. My daddy says one should always look their best," Lucy says coming over, grabbing Alan by the chin and turning his face this way and that.

Margaret gets some makeup out of her purse and quietly comes over to lend a hand, "Uhh, OK. I guess I can help a bit."

"Wait," Alan exclaims as he stands up, forcing his way up through them. "I need to go to the bathroom!"

"That's a great idea," all three reply in unison.

"There will be better lighting and the mirror will be useful," Tammy follows up as the four of them go into the women's room.

Alan does his business, remembering to sit down. When he exits the stall he immediately feels the three girls studying him like a lab specimen.

The three pounced on him and got right to work. Tammy was good with his hair and Lucy was good all around doing the foundation and lips, but it was Margaret who was truly the one to make him shine when she was done with his eyes.

The girls stood back looking at him and Tammy says, "she couldn't take a bad picture now, that is if she looks at the camera and doesn't make any funny faces like last time."

They return to the waiting area just as Sally does. Alice is told to go in so she can retake her picture quickly.
15532211121211111.title: Alice needs to freshen up

155322111212111111.content:
Alan goes into the room where Mary is and starts to plead that the picture was not the problem but Mary doesn't have time to hear it.

"Just stand on the X and look at the camera, no funny faces this time please!"

Alan stands slumped on the X with a forlorn look.

"Come on dear, stand up straight and smile. We don't really have time for all this."

Alan makes an effort with a forced smile after which he tries again to plead that the information needs to be corrected.

"Oh, yes, I see it now, we need your full name, not your initials," Mary says, "what is your full name Alice dear?"

Disheartened now Alan responds. "Alice Gilligan Krebs", he mumbles, remembering to use Alice but forgetting to feminize his middle name.

Mary however hears Alice Gillian Krebs and tells her, "you need more confidence dear, that is a pretty name." She processes the new card and hands it to him.

Totally defeated now Alan takes the card as he goes back into the waiting room. He examines it, noting all the wrong data (Full Name: Alice Gillian Krebs; Gender: F; DoB: 7/11/2003; Ht.: 5' 4"; Wt.: 120; Hair: blonde; Eyes: brown; SSN: 555-55-5555). He thinks, "the latter two are the only things correct on it. If he tries to get it fixed they will most likely be the next things changed..."

And the picture! "What am I going to do," he groans out to himself as the girls come up to see his card.

"Shake it off kid." Patti says, "she got my weight wrong too."

"You look great in that picture Alice, with some practice you can do your makeup well." Tammy joins in as she examines the picture.

"Oh, that is an awesome picture." April Grant chirps in. "I like your smile."

"Wow, you'd look great with..." Sally starts to say.

But the rest of her statement is cut off as Valerie's interjects, "You know, right? She definitely would."

Alan groaned again. His picture was that of a cute girl, with the makeup looking to be his 17 year age but the hair, with the small flowered barrette, yet somehow making him look no older than 14.

"It's a start kid," Lucy says as she studies the ID card, comparing it with her own.

All Margaret says is "Nice" as she looks over his shoulder.

He doesn't have too much more time to wallow over it when Mary comes out with a stack of papers in her hand. Due to his distress he has totally forgotten about his driver's license.

"OK. Now everyone follow me as we have to go into the conference room to fill out the enrollment paperwork." she says leading them all into the said room.
155322111212111111.title: Fixing another mistake

choices: Chat with the girls while filling out the forms.
1553221112121111111.content:
As they sat around the large conference table Mary handed them each a packet of papers. Alan saw that many of the fields were pre-filled with the information Mary gathered for the ID cards.

The forms were enrollment into a two week summer camp and a grant for a full scholarship through graduation to the HWS Institute of Science and Technology for Young Women. A private preparatory high school dedicated to young women getting a robust education in the fields of science and technology. Each of the forms have been already signed by the company and both of his parents!

Also included were transcripts for all the class credits she has accrued at her current school. There was a note that says even though she was in advanced 12th grade classes at her current school she will be registered in to the proper 9th grade for her age. The classes at HWS were significantly challenging for all students and should provide a challenge for her.

After handing all the forms out Mary instructs, "Please fill out the blank fields listing your desired subject major (you can pick more than one), extra-curricular activities, interests, and hobbies and also use the blank page to write a short essay on why you would love to graduate from HWS. I'll leave you some time to work on these." She then leaves the room and the girls explode into excited chatter. They cannot believe how great this is.
1553221112121111111.title: Enrollment to what?

15532211121211111111.content:
"I am thrilled. My daddy set this up," Lucy was saying as Alan sat staring at the forms in front of him. Lucy continued, "I told him I wanted to go to HWS Institute for my senior year. It will be an automatic acceptance to the HWS University after I graduate."

The chatter from the excited girls was almost drowning out his thoughts. 'This cannot be real. My parents wouldn't sign me up for a girls summer camp let alone send me to a private school for girls.'

"They have a great indoor swimming pool and their sports program is one of the best," exclaimed April Grant.

Alan's mind was still racing. 'It doesn't make any sense. My school transcripts have my name as Krebs, A. G. but do not show my age, gender or what grade I am in. How is that possible?'

The girls were sharing information and filling out the forms in a free-for-all.

Even Margaret added some insight. "My mom says the summer camp will be so much fun. They have access to an aeronautics lab and we get to simulate zero-G!"

"There will be so many things to do at HWS: theatre, chorus, mathletics, robot-wars, I can't wait!" Valerie exclaimed.

Nearly fifteen minutes passed when Alan was snapped out of his thoughts.

"Hello. Earth to Alice. Come in Alice," Tammy was waving her hand in front of Alan's face. "Alice, snap out of your daydream. You haven't even started on your forms."

"Oh, look," Sally says as she grabs Alan's forms, "it's true. We need to help her or she will be in trouble again."

"Here, let me help." Patti took the forms from Sally and started filling in the empty fields, assuming Alice was here because, like all of them, they liked the same things.

The others chimed in, asking Alan questions even as they offered up their own suggestions. In short order they had his form filled out like all of theirs.

Subject major: Computers, Math, Bio-Chemistry, Cosmetic/Prosthetics
Extra-curricular activities: Swimming, Theatre, Athletics
Interests: Hockey, Music
Hobbies: Computer games, Reading, Dancing, Sunbathing

For the short essay, Patti copied word for word what was written on all of their forms. The words that Lucy had put on her form and said it was good enough for all of them.

"I so want to go to the HWS Institute of Science and Technology for Young Women so I can get a great education. To learn state of the art technologies, maths and sciences. To obtain a robust knowledge of the world of computers. To access both the academic and athletic programs provided by the school. Graduating from HWS Institute is the best step to continue studies at HWS University."
15532211121211111111.title: Chat with the girls while filling out the forms.

1553222.content:
Birthday Wishes: A birthday wish goes wrong when a lonely guy wishes for the perfect girlfriend. Unfortunately for his best friend, he is going to find himself taking on that role.

The Package: Jordan finds a package of women's clothes that have a mind of their own. No matter how much he tries to get rid of them, they keep coming back.
1553222.title: More Options

choices: The next day, Jamie does some errands
The next week, Jamie encounters some strange events
15532221.content:
Jamie looked down at the candles as he set them into the cake before lighting it. Jamie had never been the best at cooking growing up but he had really put the effort in since moving out. He was pretty proud of this cake and he hoped Brad would like it. They had been his closest friends since they were young, so Jamie was pretty sure Brad would tell him it was good either way.

The two of them moved pretty far, both having their own reasons for wanting to leave their small town. Brad had a job opportunity and Jamie just couldn't stand still living with his own parents. They decided to take the leap and just do it. They don't normally do anything for each other's birthdays but Brad had been getting fairly homesick so Jamie just wanted to put a little effort in for him. Jamie quickly flicked the light in their living room where Brad was sitting on the couch and then brought out the cake. Brad smiled wide and shook his head as Jamie sung.

“You didn't have to do this. Thank you,” Brad smiled.

“Don't thank me yet, dude. You haven't tried it yet,” Jamie said, pulling a strand of hair that escaped his ponytail behind his ear.

“Either way, I really appreciate it,” Brad told him.

“You're welcome, now make a wish.”

Brad looked at Jamie and thought hard before blowing out the candles.
15532221.title: Birthday Wishes

15532222.content:
You were walking down the street one day, when you noticed an unmarked poly-mailer lying on the ground in front of you. You picked it up, it was obviously full of something. You looked around the sidewalk, seeing that no one else was around, and you looked up, not seeing any windows from which the package might have fallen from.

"Well, I'm only a block off from home. I can make some posters or put an ad online to let the owner know I found this." you sighed and carried the bag home.

You walked inside your house and dropped the bag off onto a table, planning to go about trying to find the owner when you stopped and walked back over to the mailer.

"Well, just saying that it's a plastic mailer might not be specific enough... I should know the contents." you reasoned.

You opened up the mailer, carefully, so it could be re-sealed later and turned it on it's side, letting the contents fall onto the table. The contents were...
15532222.title: The Package

choices: After dinner, the dress is out again
The next day, a new mailer comes to your door
155322222.content:
The contents from the mailer appeared to be a few feminine items. You separated the clothing to get a good idea of what you were dealing with. The biggest item was a light blue sundress, which took up most of the available space of the mailer. You folded it back up and placed it on the table before picking up the underwear set. It was a simple white bra with matching panties which you guessed might be expensive. Lastly was a set of light blue heels, that matched the dress. You looked in the mailer but couldn't find a receipt or anything that might give you clues on who you might be able to contact about the package. Shrugging, you put everything back into the mailer and leave it on the table. You figured you would deal with it later after you handled some chores.

You handled your laundry, tossed dinner into a crock pot, then headed back to take some pictures of the mailer. You didn't want to mention the contents just yet, figuring that you might dissuade any potential dishonest people from taking it if you quiz them later. You hop online and make a post on a forum for locals and wait to see if you get any replies.

It was when you came back to eat some soup you prepared when you saw the dress. It was folded on the table along with the underwear and shoes.

“Weird,” you think to yourself. You were pretty sure you put them away but obviously you didn't. You tossed them all back into the mailer then grabbed your dinner.
155322222.title: Feminine Woman's Outfit

choices: The outfit has been put away with your other clothes
1553222221.content:
You finished dinner and left the mailer on the table, when you went to put your bowl in the sink. When you got back, the dress, underwear and shoes were back on the table like it had been before you started dinner.

"Okay, I KNOW I didn't leave it like that... But maybe I did. I could just be distracted." you shook your head.

You picked up the dress, underwear and shoes and went to put it into the mailer. You thought back to something you had read somewhere, that in order to make sure you remember that you locked a door, you should do something peculiar when you do it. So you took the mailer straight to your room, and plopped it down on your dresser. That way, you knew that it wasn't open on the table.

"There!" you thought. "No questions here."

You went to watch TV, and when you returned to your room to go to bed, the mailer was again opened, and the dress, underwear and shoes were lying on your bed, as if you were getting ready to put them on.

"No!" you shouted, frustrated and grabbed everything and shoved it back into the mailer.

You shoved the mailer into a drawer and closed it, before sighing and getting ready for bed. You lay down, thinking about how strange that mailer was and wondering what was going on with those clothes...

The next morning you awoke to find...
1553222221.title: After dinner, the dress is out again

choices: The next day, the clothes are back
You take a drive to take your mind off of things
15532222212.content:
You wake up the next morning, almost forgetting the events of the previous day. It was so strange that it had to have been a dream, you thought. You got up and headed to the bathroom and did your morning routine. It was after your shower when you realized that the previous day's events did happen. You opened the drawer to find a pair of white panties and a bra folded on top of your underwear.

“What the fuck?” you asked, slamming the drawer closed.

After calming down, you slowly slide the drawer open again, only to find the feminine under garments still there. You grabbed them and tossed them onto your bed and then grabbed a pair of boxers before putting them on followed by a pair of socks. You opened another drawer and grabbed a pair of jeans, putting them on immediately. You quickly ran to your closet to grab a shirt but the first thing you see is the light blue dress hanging there, almost begging you to put it on. You take it down and toss it on the bed as well before grabbing a random t-shirt and throwing it on. Now dressed, you turn back to the bed to see the dress and underwear set out neatly as if placed with care.

“Noooope,” you say to no one as you grab them and run to the front door. There, next to your sneakers, you spot the heels. You put on your shoes and then scoop up the heels. You take them out of your house and toss them in the trash, slamming the lid a bit too hard.

“That is enough of that,” you say.

You head back to the house and attempt to pretend like none of this ever happened.
15532222212.title: The outfit has been put away with your other cl...

choices: The clothes were back in your house
155322222121.content:
After calming yourself down, and checking several times to make sure that those clothes didn't leave that trashcan, the rest of the day went rather normally, and thankfully, no one had claimed the package from the forum posts yet, so you didn't have to think about them any more. Although your mind did drift to the dress, occasionally a stray thought about what would have happened if you did wear it cropped up, but you extinguished it pretty quickly.

"Why am I thinking about it so much?" you thought to yourself. "I mean, it was a nice dress and all but...

You mentally smacked yourself and concentrated.

"You do not like the clothes." you said quietly to yourself.

Before bed that night, your thoughts were on the package and worrying about whether or not you had seen the last of it, though you had a feeling that you hadn't.

Because of that, you had a rather restless night and by the time your alarm went off in the morning, you felt you were more tired than you had been before you went to sleep, and you went about your routine on autopilot, not really paying attention to what you were doing. Because of that, you didn't even notice that the bra and panties were back in your underwear drawer, and the dress was back in your closet. You picked out your clothes and got into the shower. When you emerged from the shower you got ready to run some errands, pulling on your shoes.

Before you get to the door, you realize that....
155322222121.title: The next day, the clothes are back

choices: You're compelled to put on the dress
1553222221211.content:
You look down at your body. Your shirt, your pants, presumably your underwear seeing as nothing felt strange... and then you got to your shoes. Instead of sneakers, you had pulled on the blue heels. Strange that they were just your size but...

"What the hell?" you asked as you kneeled down to pull the heels off.

They wouldn't budge.

"Come on!" you pulled on the heel, moving to your other foot, but it also was stuck.

You sighed and stood up, preparing to go into the garage to find a toolbox to help you remove the shoes. Instead, you found your feet were disobeying your body and started to walk back to the bedroom.

"What's going on?" you asked. "Why can't I move my feet?"

You could feel them, you were wiggling your toes, but the actual movement was out of your control. Almost as if the shoes were piloting you...

You walked into the room and the heels stopped, making a clicking sound as they planted in place. You started to try to move, but your feet refused to move. It's as if you were glued to the spot! You look around the room as you struggle to find...
1553222221211.title: You're wearing the clothes

15532222212111.content:
The heels started to move, and you started to lose your balance and you fell forward, bracing yourself on the ground with your hands. You ended up in a weird, not-quite a push-up position with your ass held high. As you did, your shirt slipped over your head. You pushed yourself up, causing the shirt to fall over your neck and onto the floor, and immediately fell the opposite direction backwards, landing on your ass, and you could see how your shirt slipped over your head. The bra had hooked onto it with it's hooks and dragged the shirt off, just like it was doing with your pants right now.

"What the...!?" you asked as you reached forward and tried to keep your pants from being pulled off. "Give... those... back!"

As you struggled, your vision was suddenly obscured by... blue fabric? The panties! You immediately grabbed at your head, allowing the bra to pull down your pants and underwear and move them over your legs, before pulling them off. You grabbed at the panties and were able to pull them off your head and toss them onto the ground, but as you recovered, the bra leapt at you and secured itself around your chest, before the panties did the same to your legs.

The heels started to attempt to lift you up, and as they struggled, you were content to stay put, but the bra had other ideas, and you found your shoulders pivoting, and one catch allowed the heels to force your body into a standing position. You started walking again... but where to?
15532222212111.title: The lingerie attacks you

choices: Outside and  to the mall (Force you to get a professional makeover)
155322222121111.content:
Being moved along without Being able to control yourself, the undergarments guide you to your closet.

"Oh no. No. No No no." you say as the blue hundreds swivels on its hanger towards you.

The bra, however, seems to care nothing for your objections and lifts your arms up.

The dress snakes its way off the hanger and slides itself over You, hugging your body as it falls into place.

You gasp as the clothes turn and force you to look in the mirror.

What was happening right now? These clothes...had come to life?

And they were dressing you like a girl!

Suddenly your body was abruptly forced to walk. Wait, was it displeased with how you looked?

You did look more like a boy in a dress than a girl after all...

Wait a minute! Where were they taking you?!
155322222121111.title: The closet

1553222221211111.content:
Suddenly, the doorbell rang. The heels forced you to walk, practically mincing, towards your front door. You hoped that whoever was behind the door could help you, but when you got to the door and pulled it open, you found nothing. You looked down, and saw another blank mailer envelope.

"Oh no." you groaned.

The dress forced you to bend down and despite your attempts at not picking it up, forced you to pick up the mailer envelope. You carried it into the house and threw it to the ground. It split open when it landed and a few items of jewelry tumbled out. Once they did, they started floating and first, a bracelet forced itself onto your left wrist, as a women's watch forced itself onto your other. Following those, two rings forced themselves onto your left hand, and three onto your right.

You tried to flex your fingers, but you had lost the ability to. They forced you to pick up the envelope and you were brought to the bathroom, where you dumped out the bag onto the counter-top, revealing cosmetics and a wig.

"Please, stop." you pleaded as your hand started reaching down towards the various items, picking up...
1553222221211111.title: To the bathroom

choices: You are forced to put pn the wig
A pair of earring and a necklace come from the mailer
15532222212111111.content:
Your hands moved any way except how you wanted, starting with the foundation. You sat helplessly as you applied the makeup like it was second nature, adding contour and powder to give your face a softer shape before moving on to eye shadow, which faded from brown to black, giving your eyes a mature, subtle look when combined with the eyeliner.

However, the clothes seemed to think you could stand a bit of flirtiness to go with that and used mascara to make your eyelashes long and alluring.

By the time you brought the lipstick to your lips and filled them out red, you looked like a short haired girl more than a boy.

Your feminine eyes are wide, unable to take your eyes off your reflection.
15532222212111111.title: The cosmetics

155322222121111111.content:
You watch helplessly, unable to even close your eyes or speak anymore, now that your eyes and lips are being controlled, and the wig, auburn and curly, is picked up by your traitorous hands, and the wig is adjusted onto your head. Your body is turned back towards the mirror and your lips involuntarily curl into a smile.

"Stop this!" you pleaded in your mind as your body admired it's new appearance and touched itself up.

But your body refused to cooperate. Even the parts of your body that were still partially in your control, like your toes, still encased in the heels, were starting to disobey your orders.

In fact, the only part of your body that you were still in complete control of was your breathing, but you had a feeling that it wasn't long before you were just a passenger.

Once they were satisfied, the clothes started to lead you out of the house, as your heels clicked across the floor until you got to the front door. Once you were outside, they headed towards...
155322222121111111.title: You are forced to put pn the wig

1553222221211111111.content:
You slide into your driver's seat, keeping your skirt smooth as you primp before sliding your key in the ignition and pulling out of the driveway.

"Where are you taking me?" you demand silently, even though there will be no answer.

After a few moments, and an embarrassing moment where you blew a guy in another car a kiss, you pulled into a parking lot.

Hey...you had heard of this place... It was a...
1553222221211111111.title: Your car

15532223.content:
Wish Upon a Star: Riley wishes his life was different but he didn't expect this.

Hiding Out: A thief on the run needs to lay low but things don't go how he plans.
15532223.title: Something Else

choices: There is a flash and he is somewhere else
The Blue star was really a fairy that heard his wish
155322231.content:
Riley cursed as he scrubbed the floor, unable to get the grime out of the tiles. His stepmother and step sisters had left him home again to clean up while they went to some fancy party. He didn't know the details, nor did he care. As far as he was concerned, he was glad they were out of his hair.

Giving up on the floor for a moment, Riley leaned back and rubbed his arm. He wanted to get out of this place but money was hard to come by. He didn't have any marketable skills and couldn't keep the low paying jobs he found. He brushed his long blond hair out of his eyes as he looked up to the open window and saw a single blue star shining in the sky.

“I wish I had a different life,” he said to himself.
155322231.title: Wish Upon a Star

choices: She casts a spell to make Riley behave like a proper lady, for her own good.
1553222312.content:
Riley was about to get back to work when the blue star moved. He shook his head and looked again expecting it to be stationary but it was still moving around sporadically. On top of that, it was getting bigger.

“What in the world is that?” Riley said getting off the floor.

He ran to the window to get a better look and couldn't believe his eyes. It got bigger and bigger until Riley finally realized that it wasn't growing, like he thought. Instead, it was getting closer. Everything outside began to light up with the blue glow of this “star”.

“Oh shit!” he yelled diving to the floor as the “star” crashed through his window.

Riley remained still on the floor, covering his head. Slowly he lifted his head and looked around and was shocked at what he found. There, against the wall and on the floor, was an old woman wearing blue. It was clear to him that she had knocked herself a bit silly.

“Another perfect landing...”she said with a wavering voice

She got up on to her feet and swayed a bit, putting her hand on the wall to help keep her balance. Riley remained still, unable to understand what he was seeing. Maybe he was asleep and this was just a weird dream.

“Now, where is she?” said the woman after brushing some dust off herself.

“Uh...excuse me?” Riley said, finding his voice.

“Oh, there you are,” She smiled, kindly.

“Who are you?”

“I'm your Fairy Godmother, sweetheart.”

“What?”

“I heard your wish and have come to make it come true and give you your happily ever after,” She said, still wobbling.

“Are you okay? You look like you landed pretty hard...What am I even saying? This is crazy.”

“Oh, I'm used to it,” she giggled.

“I don't think you can get used to head injuries...”

She didn't address his comment, instead, she took stock of the kitchen. She glanced around and then her eyes fell on him.

“What is your name dear?” she asked.

“Riley.”

“Oh, what a pretty name. It suits you.”

“Uh...thanks?”

“Now, lets get to work, shall we?” she told him while cracking her knuckles.

“Get to work? I don't understand.”

“You made a wish on a star so now I'm here to help you make it come true,” she told him.

“You said that but that is kind of a tall order. How are you going to give me a different life?” he asked dismissively.

“With magic, of course,” she giggled again.

“Uh huh, fine. How about you start by “magic”-ing that floor clean?” he said rolling his eyes.

He knew that he should be a bit more open minded after what he just saw but it was all still a bit too much for him. His new Fairy Godmother, however, wasn't daunted by his skepticism. Instead, she reached into her sleeve and pulled out a long wand. With a little flourish, she pointed at the floor and a light blue light shot out of it, hitting the floor. It glowed blue for a moment and then it was suddenly clean.

“Holy shit!” Riley said.

“Oh, such language. That simply won't do,” she said offended.
1553222312.title: The Blue star was really a fairy that heard his...

choices: She casts a spell to transform his clothes
She casts a spell to transform Riley
15532223121.content:
The fairy godmother quickly flicked her wand and the blue light shot straight into Riley's throat. Riley stumbled back for a moment, before regaining his balance.

"What the hell was that?" Riley wanted to shout. However it didn't come out like that. Instead, what Riley said was:

"Oh my... what was that?" Riley softly asked. "My voice! Why the heck can't I speak normally? Darn! Darn darn darn! Shoot!"

"Much better... and so is your posture." she noted. "This will make things much smoother."

Riley quickly realized what she meant. He was involuntarily standing straight, with his hands clasped in front of his waist. Any time he removed them and tried to slouch, he quickly reverted back to the fixed posture.

"You believe me about the magic now, dear?" she asked.

"Yes!" Riley sighed. "Can we please get to the wish part?"

"Right! I nearly forgot!" she exclaimed. "You wanted a different life, right?"

"More than anything in the world." Riley replied.

"Then let's get to work!" she pulled out her wand again and prepared to cast a spell. "Now, how should I do this?"
15532223121.title: She casts a spell to make Riley behave like a p...

155322231211.content:
Riley watched as his godmother tapped her wand against her chin while she thought to herself. As he watched, he was becoming nervous. She had already done something to his throat and it seemed to have done more than just that.

“I don't know if I'm comfortable with this anymore,” He said, more gently than he would have liked.

“Oh, I've got it! First, a change of clothes,” she said ignoring his comment.

“I don't see how that gives me a new life,” Riley said, annoyance hiding behind his pleasant voice.

“Oh, you'll see,” She beamed.

The godmother rolls up her sleaves before pointing her wand at Riley and launching another blue stream in his direction. Riley felt his clothes crawling over himself as they changed in color and shape. Again, blue was the color of the night, perhaps that was the godmother's favorite? He tried to see what was happening but the glow was too bright.

“Don't worry dear, when the magic settles you will look lovely,” his godmother said.

As the magic crawled up to his head, Riley closed his eyes to protect them form the glow. He felt his face tingle pleasantly. He also felt his hair beginning to snake around his shoulder on it's own. He must be dreaming, this was not possible...

“There we are, I must say, you clean up wonderfully,” his godmother said with joy.

Riley looked down at himself and nearly screamed when he saw what he was wearing.
155322231211.title: She casts a spell to transform his clothes

choices: His godmother goes straight to accessories
1553222312111.content:
He was wearing a ballgown! It was blue, naturally, and had a large, flowing skirt that billowed out around him. Riley was speechless and stammered out a response.

"This... this can't be possible!" Riley exclaimed.

"Oh, but it is." his godmother beamed.

She quickly waved her wand again and a mirror appeared in front of him, letting him get a good view of his entire body. Riley's hair had grown much longer, and had been pulled into a long braid that was draped over his shoulder. His face was even accentuated with... he couldn't even tell if it was makeup or just magic that had made his face seem more feminine.

"I... I..." he sputtered.

"Look gorgeous?" his godmother asked. "You sure do."

Words failed him as his godmother began thinking again.

"Oh! I know what else you need!" she exclaimed.
1553222312111.title: An elegant ball gown

choices: They are interrupted by an evil green fairy
15532223121112.content:
Riley couldn't find the words but he could think of a very simple plan. Run. He lifted his skirts with a dainty gesture and began to move as quickly as his glass heeled feet could take him.

“Oh, excited to get going, are we? I understand but we must practice patience,” She giggled.

Riley ignored her and ran out the door, followed by his godmother who was taking her time. She lifted her arms and shook her sleeves before letting loose with another blast of magic. Riley held his breath and closed his eyes, waiting for another curse to befall him. Instead, he felt himself tumble onto something hard. He opened his eyes to see the floor of a stagecoach.

“Upsy daisy,” he heared the voice of his godmother say as he is forced into the stagecoach the rest of the way. Riley found himself siting next to the blue fairy as the coach took off down the road. Riley attempted to open the door but it was sealed shut tight.

“Don't worry, dear. You won't be falling out any time soon,” she said with a smile.

“Where are we going?” he asked with a sweet feminine voice.

“We are going to a party that is going to change your destiny!” she said, clasping her hands.

“How can a party do that?” he questioned bubbling with fear and rage under the surface.

1553322.content:
All Inclusive Resort: Tracy Miller had been saving up all year for his vacation to Cancun. Unfortunately, everything that could go wrong, did. His was stopped several time at the airport, his plane was delayed, his luggage was lost, and his driver couldn't find his Resort. After an eternity, Tracy arrived, checked in and is ready to finally relax.

Unbeknownst to Tracy, there was a mix up in which he and a woman of the same name were delivered to each others resorts by accident. Tracy is about to experience everything the woman signed up for but hey, at least its all inclusive, right?
1553322.title: Other

choices: Tracy picks up a swimsuit and hits the pool
15533221.content:
Tracy fell back onto the bed, finally able to rest after his ordeal. He worked in an office and he dearly needed a break from the monotony of it all. He worked with a travel agent and got a package to his liking and saved what he could for the trip. Cancun would be his escape from his life.

The airport was a nightmare he thought would never end. He was stopped by security several times, he was in the wrong line and barely made it on the plane in time. Just when he was supposed to take off, they had everyone get off the plane because of some kind of failure. He was delayed two hours and in that time he called transport. He argued with someone at the company but he guessed they handled it because they were there when he arrived.

The men were in blue shirts that had bright flowers on them. Tracey gave them his name and they called over some women in red shirts that matched theirs and they checked there list. The women escorted Tracey into their van and he was delivered to his destination.

At the resort, he asked about his luggage. Apparently, his luggage was lost but they would let him know when it was found. He was told not to worry, since his package was all inclusive and they would handle everything from then on.

He was happy to finally be done with everything and just enjoyed the bed. Before he knew it, he drifted to sleep.

It looked to be a light red speedo, kind of like the kind he saw other men wearing around the resort. He took a breath and took it into the bathroom, decided to put it on. Sunbathing looked nice, Tracy thought to himself. He found himself an empty chair he could use to place his towel and shoes as well as a place to do his own sunbathing after a bit of swimming.

Tracy walked toward the pool, the ground was hot on his feet. It was actually pretty painful to walk without some kind of foot protection. His embarrassment of his suit as well as the pain on his feet encouraged him to move quickly to the water. Tracy slipped into the refreshing water and finally started to relax. Once back at the chair, he dried himself off and sat down. Though his body ached, it was nice to get some physical activity going. Tracy looked up at the bag and frowned. he had no idea what they were giving him. What did she mean by "levels" anyway?

"You will be fine soon but I will get you something for your head," she said with a smile.

"Thank you so much," He told her.

With that, she left the room to go get Tracy some pills. Tracy looked back to the man who had started to stir.

"Good morning," Tracy said smiling.

"Oh, hi...how are you doing?" he asked setting up straight.

"I'm doing alright. Did you stay here all night?" Tracy asked.

"Well, I thought someone should in case you woke up," he told Tracy.

"You really didn't have to do that. You've already done so much," he told him.

"It no trouble at all," he said with a stretch.

"Is this guy for real?" Tracy wondered. He could have just left him with the staff there but chose to spend the night in a cramped chair. He stretched and as he did, Tracy couldn't help notice how well built this guy was. He wasn't huge but he clearly takes good care of himself. That said, a night in a chair would be rough on anyone.

"Oh, man. I'm sorry about all this. I didn't mean to ruin your vacation," Tracy said feeling guilty.

"Woah, hold on. First, I didn't do anything I didn't want to do. Second, anything that happened is not your fault," he said with deep singularity.

"Well, that proves it," Tracy said with a grin.

"Proves what?" he asked confused.

"You are too good to be real," He said with a smirk.

The guy blushed and looked away as the nurse came back wheeling a tray over with a glass water, two light blue pills, a small bottle with a label he couldn't read and a pile of clothes.

"The pills are for your head, the bottle is for everything else," She told him.

He took the pills and chased them down with the water before looking at the bottle. It rattled as he looked at it and popped the lid off revealing light red colored pills. He closed it then looked and saw the label was hand written in Spanish but that was all he could figure out. Figuring they were vitamins to "balance his levels", he turned his attention to the clothes.

"And these?" he gestured.

"You got sick, these are clean," she said rather succinctly before heading out again.

"I'll get out of your hair," the man said getting ready to leave.

"Hold on there, Superman. You don't get to fly off after saving me like some damsel and disappear," he said tossing his hair striking a feminine pose as a joke, not realizing how cute he looked doing so. The man noticed, however, and stayed put.

"How about we meet up at the Dinning center tonight around 5:30 tonight?" Tracy told him.

"Works for me, I'll see you then..." he said then paused.

"Tracy. My name is Tracy," he said.

"I'm Rodger," he told Tracy.

"Alright Rodger, you are dismissed. I need to get changed," Tracy told him with a grin.

"See you tonight," was all he said as he left grinning ear to ear.

15533221111121111212111211212111111.content:
Tracy walked, hearing the unfamiliar clacking of his shoes while doing his best to remain upright. It wasn't easy and he was having a great deal of trouble doing so. On top of all of that, he was feeling embarrassed by being out in public without pants but after walking buy a few people, they didn't seem to mind. In fact, plenty of guys were really friendly.

It wasn't long before Tracy decided that he needed to sit for a while and get off his feet. Lucky for him he saw that there were plenty of people sitting in a pavilion of some kind. He approached and saw that there was some kind of show getting ready to start.

“Oh, fun. I didn't miss anything.” he said while making his way close to the front of the stage.

Tracy sat down, now more clear headed than he had been. He sat, crossing his legs and waited for the shoe to begin, looking down at his feet. He looked at his smooth legs and his heeled shoes. It was then that he started to piece together that something was wrong.

“Wait...” he started to say but was startled by an amplified voice.

“Welcome ladies and gentlemen. I hope you are all enjoying yourselves. I am Drake Bloodstone and today we are all explorers. Not explorers of strange jungles or dark tombs but of something much more frightening: the human mind,” said the voice.

Stepping on stage was an odd looking man dressed in black. He had way too much eye makeup on and his bald head shinned. Tracy smiled, deciding that this was going to be a fun time. The over the top nature of his performance was the perfect amount of cheese for Tracy.

"There is still much to be discovered about the mind and tonight we will plunge deep into the unknown, past the veil of consciousness into eternity. To start, I will need a volunteer," he said to the audience.

One by one, the stage filled with people from the audience. There were the normal things: people singing, people pretending to be animals, and other mildly embarrassing actions and Tracy just sat there grinning.

155332211111211112121112112121111113.content:
Tracy was having a great time watching everyone pretend to be to be hypnotized, his dawning attention to his clothes was completely averted. Instead, he smiled and clapped as he watched until it was time to call someone else up onto the stage.

“You there, would you please come up here,” Bloodstone said pointing at Tracy.

Before he even realized he was doing it, Tracy was up on his feet and walking up, right next to the Hypnotist.

“What is your name?” He asked.

“I...uh...um...”Tracy tried to answer but he was too nervous to say anything in front of all these people. He covered his face from embarrassment.

“Don't worry, everything is fine. Let's just get started,” Bloodstone said with a smile.

He got to work in putting Tracy under right away. To his own surprise, Tracy was incredibly easy to hypnotize.

“Now, let's start with that confidence first. You stand here, with all over these people looking at you and instead of discomfort, you find yourself feeling calm. You like it when you have the attention because you are worth paying attention to. Tell us, what is your name?” he commanded.

“My name is Tracy,” Tracy announced.

“Hello Tracy. Why did you chose this resort?”

“I've been wanting to relax and be taken care of,” Tracy told him.

“What plans do you have for your stay?” Bloodstone asked.

“I've only signed up for a singles mixer and dinner with a man I met,” Tracy stated.

“Now, I don't want to presume, if you don't mind sharing, what is your orientation?” He questioned.

“I'm straight,” Tracy said.

“And how often to you go on dates with men?” he asked.

“I...I never have...” Tracy said, feeling confused.

Bloodstone took that information in without understanding that the shy girl he was leading was in fact a man. He considered what to do next and had this deep need to help her out of her shell.

1553322111112111121211121121211111131.content:
Bloodstone turned toward the audience and began to address them.

“I think this is a good opportunity to switch gears from the humor and have a helpful intervention. What do you say?” he asks.

Bloodstone turns back to Tracy, who remains entranced and ready to take in anything Bloodstone suggested. Bloodstone thought about where they should begin and concluded they would start with getting a sense of Tracy's self image.

“Tracy, I'm going to ask you some questions. Please respond honestly. Do you understand?” he commanded.

“I understand. I will answer your questions honestly,” Tracy responded.

“Do you think you are an attractive woman?” he asked.

“No, I am not an attractive woman,” Tracy replied with a slight bit of guff in his voice

“Now, Tracy, I'm going to inform you of some truths. When you hear these truths, you will take them and make them your own. Do you understand?” he directed.

“I understand. I will take your truths and make them my own,” Tracy said.

“Tracy, you are an attractive woman. This is the truth,” he stated.

“I...no...” Tracy said, rejecting the command.

Bloodstone was surprised by that. Someone that so easily fell into a trance should easily accept his suggestions. This resistance was interesting if a bit sad. She was going to need more help than he could give in a single session but for now, he was going to need to be gentler with his truths.

“Tracy, when you think about yourself, you are going to notice traits that you share with other women that you understand are attractive. When you recognize those similarities, you will not reject them. Instead, you will accept them and you will be given a sense of happiness and peace. Do you understand?” he urged.

“I understand. I will accept the similarities I share with attractive women. This will make me happy,” Tracy stated with hesitation.

“When you are complemented, you will not reject them as untrue, instead, you will accept them as truth,” he informed Tracy.

“I will accept complements and not reject them as being untrue,” Tracy said.

“Tracy, I think you are a beautiful young lady,” Bloodstone admitted.

“...Thank you,” Tracy said with hesitation.

“Tracy, I'd like to see you again. In the future, you will search me out and allow me to help you,” he commanded.

“I will let you help me in the future,” Tracy stated.

With that, Bloodstone released his hold on Tracy and gestured to him.

“Tracy, ladies and gentlemen. Didn't she do wonderfully? You may take your seat,” he said to applause.

Tracy went back to his seat, his head buzzing with strange idea's hidden in his subconscious.

155332212.content:
Tracy woke early. He had a hard time getting rest on a bed that wasn't his own, though it was comfortable. The stress of the previous day? Perhaps. No matter the cause, he got up and readied himself for the day. Today he considered trying one of the many swimming pools that he had access to. For now, he headed to the main lobby.

Connecting to the main lobby was a nice dining room filled with people and food. He was greeted by a man that lead him to a table and asked Tracy if he would like coffee. At least, that's what he assumed. The man's accent was fairly thick so he had a hard time understanding but it didn't bother Tracy. "I'm in another country," he thought. "I'm the guest here, I need to be aware that I'm not unintentionally being a rude guest." Once the man returned with coffee as well as a mojito, he knew he was going to enjoy this trip. The breakfast was buffet style which encouraged Tracy to indulge in a little over eating. He piled food onto his plate and had his fill.

As he ate, he couldn't help but notice the conversations of other people near him. The family to his left had English accents and the two gentlemen to his right where speaking french. He was surprised at that, though he felt silly for feeling like that. "This is a vacation spot for many people, not just Americans," he thought to himself. One thing that was new for him was seeing the different styles of swimwear. Multiple times he saw men walking around in speedos. He admitted to himself that he found it weird but even in his limited experience, he knew that the swim trunk style was not a universal one. Tracy never traveled before, so there were bound to be some learning opportunities and personal growth.

As he finished off his pancakes, Tracy made plans for the rest of his day.

I then planted my feet on the ground and stood up. Luckily the heels were low enough that I wouldn't be stumbling around. I walked around the house a little bit and figured out how to move in a way that felt natural enough.

"Maaan, today sucks," I tell myself.

"Maybe I should do something nice fore myself?" I consider.

I arrived at the stand and got my cherry ice. I started to eat it, and didn't realize it at the time, but it was slowly but surely staining my lips a reddish color.

"Man, these boots aren't that bad." I mused as I walked home.

"Uh...what?" he smiles back confused.

"I'm looking for work, I was just wondering if you might have a position I could take," I explain.

"Oh, I'm sorry but we can't afford to take on anymore people right now. Maybe in the future," he apologizes while blushing.

"Would you like my number?" I ask.

"Sure," he says with a grin.

That was simple. Too bad he didn't have an opening but maybe later? I gave the guy my number and he actually gave me a free pretzel. That was pretty awesome of him! I thanked him before heading back home. I jumped into my car and drove all over town looking for help wanted signs and stepping in to just ask. I was going to need to write up a resume to send off eventually but this was fine for now. It took all day but I felt good that I had started to set things right in my life.

"The hell?" I asked no one in particular. My eyelids started to get very heavy. I opened my eyes wide and tried to keep myself focused.

I grabbed the bag and noticed that the bottle that was open was not the multi-vitamin as I had thought, but the cold medicine.

What happens next?

"How can I help you, miss?" the guy working asked?

I was too busy looking at the options to here what he called me.

"Just...give me the strongest thing you have. I really need something to keep me awake," I told him in a hushed voice.

My voice sounded odd thanks to that spray but the guy didn't seem to notice or he just didn't care.

"Does it fit alright?" I heard the girl ask, interrupting my thoughts.

I pulled and pulled but my feet stayed in the fabric. It was really confusing, so I switched to the shirt.

It was a button up so I started at the top and worked my way down. The size was all wrong as I buttoned the shirt down to my thighs. I'd have to bring it up to Susan later along with the faulty pants.

I was cleaning a spill when one of the guys came over to me.

"Hey there, mind if I ask your name?" he asked.

"Sure you can. My name is Jesse. Is there anything I can do for you?" I tell him with a big, customer pleasing smile.

"Hi Jessie. I like your outfit," He says smiling back.

"Thank you," I tell him, figuring that he was being sarcastic.

I stopped myself before I began complaining about how messed up it is. Even though it was obviously faulty, I had to stay professional.

"Ah, cool. I'm Justin, by the way," he said.

"It's nice to meet you, Justin," I tell him offering him my hand.

He takes my fingers into his hands and shakes it. It's a poorly executed handshake on his part but I don't point it out. I just smile at him.

"Oh, your hands are cold," he says bringing his other hand up and covering mine.

He rubbed my hand with his. It felt nice to be warmed up so I gave him the other one, too. I found it funny how this guy was being so helpful that I couldn't help but giggle a little. I hoped he wasn't embarrassed that I laughed at him but he didn't seem to mind.

"Don't you want to go celebrate with your friend?" I ask him.

"I should...would you like to do something after you get off work?" he asked.

I thought about it. This guy seemed nice enough and it might be fun.

I kept working, going between cleaning and carrying food. The uniform pants were a little uncomfortable at some points, and I was still fending off my cold symptoms, but I was feeling a lot better after talking to that guy.

I came back and found Susan and told her what happened. She had to calm me down as I was pretty upset. He had my keys and my ID! I was going to have to report my card stolen or something. The night was almost over already so Susan said i could relax for the rest of my shift, which wasn't long. I didn't even think about complaining about the outfit anymore, which I was going to be forced to wear out.

I walked outside and Justin walked up to me.

"I figured that was just a uniform." Justin joked.

"It was." I said. "Some guy stole all the stuff from my locker, even my clothes."

"That's terrible!" Justin said. "I know what'll make you feel better. I've know this place that has the best pizza in the city. How about we go there? My treat."

"Oh, I couldn't ask you to pay for me." I said.

"Come on, you're having a bad day. Let me make it a little better." Justin said.

"Fine. Let's go." I said.

Justin offered to drive, and considering I didn't have car keys anymore, I accepted. I'd have to find a way back into my house to find the spare and catch a bus back here tomorrow. We arrived at the pizzeria and Justin ordered a few slices. We sat down and I started eating.

"Do you have any way back into your house?" he asked.

"I could break a window, but I don't keep any spare keys around. The only person who would is my ex..." I started.

"Ex?" Justin asked.

"I just went through a pretty bad breakup. My ex met someone at school and ran away with them. I haven't seen them since." I replied.

"You could come back to my place and crash on my couch, and maybe tomorrow I can help you get back into your house and get your car." Justin said.

"That would be great. You're really nice, you know that?" I asked, as I brushed my hair out of my face. "But I can't impose."

"It's not imposing! You're down on your luck, and I want to help." Justin said, taking my hand and smiling at me.

I ran over the idea in my mind. Justin's offer was tempting. I'd get to sleep at his place, maybe borrow a shirt or a pair of pants or something, so I could get out of the uniform. And then get back into the house, find a spare key and cancel my cards... But then again he was already too nice... What to do, what to do...

It was then that the dizziness came back and Justin must have noticed. He placed his hand on the small of my back and helped me walk to his car. Once in his car, we drive off. He kept his hand in mine and I found it very comforting.

"Not really. I like my hair short... but I might have something that could work." Justin rushed out and came back holding a pink scrunchie. "My sister forgot this here last time she visited."

"I suppose this'll work. Thanks." I said and pulled my hair into it, putting my hair into a low ponytail. With that, even though I didn't realize it, I looked like a girl dressed in her boyfriend's clothes.

"So, wanna play a video game?" Justin asked. "I've got the new fighting game. Unless that's not your style."

"Sure, but I warn you, I'm pretty good." I replied.

"Well, we'll see about that..." Justin said.
1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.title: A change of clothes at Justin's

choices: The wine plays with Jesse's head.
1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.content:
He fired up the game and it wasn't long before I was kicking his butt. I couldn't help but smile at him after yet another win. I was afraid that maybe he might take the loses poorly, but he was a really good sport about it.

"You weren't kidding, you are really good," he said.

"I've had a lot of practice, you aren't so bad yourself," I lied.

I placed a friendly hand on his shoulder and gave it a little rub. I didn't want him to feel bad after he had went out of his way to help me out.

"You thirsty? I've got tea, beer, wine or just water," he asked me.

"You know, if you are offering, I haven't had wine in a while," I admitted.

"Wine it is," he said heading to his kitchen.

Soon enough I had a glass of wine near by that I would drink from between rounds of the game. Justin stopped playing against me, instead he watched as I took the fight online. I was having a good time but then my neck started to hurt. I started rubbing it but Justin, being the good guy that he is, started rubbing it for me. He was pretty good at it, too.

Moans slipped out of my mouth as he made me feel really good. I soon forgot about the game and just enjoyed his strong hands and the strong wine.
1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.title: Playing the game

1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.content:
You lay back on the couch as Justin took a break from the massage. You could swear that he was looking at you the way that you've looked at girls, but you shrugged it off. You turned back to Justin and smiled.

"You know, I really appreciate all you're doing for me." you said.

"Don't mention it." Justin said.

You suddenly felt the alcohol hit you and you leaned on Justin for support, before resting your head on his shoulder. He smiled at you.

"I think the wine is starting to get to me." you giggled.

"I'm sure, you've had a pretty rough day." Justin said. "I think it's time..."
1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.title: The wine plays with Jesse's head.

1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.content:
"I think it's time to go to bed." Justin said.

And that was the last thing I remember. I woke up suddenly and looked around, before recalling the events of yesterday.

"Morning, sleepyhead." Justin said from the door.

"Oh, uh, hi..." I said. "Did we..."

"Oh, no. I slept on the couch, I figured you'd need the bed more than I did." Justin said.

"Cool. So we can head out and see about getting into your place and reporting all your stuff stolen after breakfast. I made eggs."

My stomach rumbled. I didn't want to impose yet again but... hunger beats politeness.

I got up and went to his kitchen where a plate was waiting. I sat down and started eating as Justin sat across from me, smiling for some reason. He probably didn't think he was a good cook and was excited that I liked the food.
1553322211211121111111211111111111111111.title: To go to bed

155332222.content: The Dragon's Horde: On a quest for riches, a man unknowingly becomes more feminine after each completed challenge
155332222.title: Other

1553322221.content:
The forest was thick with plant life but William was undaunted as his blade cut through the overgrowth. He had only a single day of this journey under his belt so far and was uncertain of how long it would be. He used the last of his coin to buy supplies for the coming days and he hoped it would see him to the end of this quest. The old man that told him of the treasure may have been off his rocker but Will didn't have much choice.

He paused a moment to drink from his water skin when he heard the sound of voices. They were loud and gravelly. Will put his water skin away and went to investigate.
1553322221.title: The Dragon's Horde

15533222211.content:
Will got as close as he could without alerting the beings that were attached to the voices. He crept in and finally saw them.

Stone giants.

He never expected to see them here, they live farther up north. He moved in closer, curiosity getting the best of him.

“We are not returning. The risk is too great,” the largest of them said.

“But...it is our home. With all due respect, we can't just run away,” another spoke.

“It is just a place. It is our people that are important. We can not loose sight of that,” the large one said gently.

“Are we to simply crumble at the first sign of opposition?” the smaller one said getting a bit louder.

“More than our egos will crumble if we face a dragon,” She said, still gentle.

Those two seem to be the only ones speaking, the others simply watching. The largest of the giants remained calm as she spoke. Will assumed that she must be their leader seeing the respect the other was showing.
15533222211.title: Will finds Stone Giants

choices: Will lies and says he plans to kill the dragon
155332222111.content:
Will had forgotten himself, being one of the few humans to be this close to stone giants. He took a step forward to get a better look and a branch snapped under his foot. More than one head turned his way and he know they spotted him.

Will ran as fast as he could but it was no use. The giants had a longer stride than him and soon he was in their grasp. They easily dragged him back to the clearing where he was sure they were going to rip his arms off for the enjoyment of the others.

He was brought before the leader. He hung by his arm as strands of his hair danced around his face, having gotten free from his ponytail. He waited for her to attack but she never did.

“Human, what do they call you?” she asked.

Her voice rang his ears with each word.

“Uh...Will,” he said.

“Why are you spying on us, Uh'Will?”

“I wasn't spying on you. I'm traveling,” he said trying to explain.

The giant points to the spot he had been standing.

“That didn't look like traveling, Uh'Will,” she said sternly.

“You guys were in the way! You shouldn't be here!” Will yelled, filled with fear.

He winced, afraid that he had just sealed his own fate. Instead, he was lowered to the ground.

“You are correct, we should not be here and neither should you. The path ahead holds only danger and your frail body will not survive,” she said as if it was obvious.

“What do you mean?” he asked a bit offended.

“Along that way we have seen a wall of thorns. We have seen spiders. We have seen many things and they all lead to a terrible dragon,” she said grimly.
155332222111.title: The stone giants find Will

1553322221111.content:
Will heard a voice speak behind him.

"He knows too much, he will surly tell the other human's. We can't let him leave," a frighten giant said.

He saw the leader considering those words and he did what he does best. Lie his pants off.

"Ma'am, please. I'm not going to return to the other humans. I'm on a quest to slay that dragon. I'll either be dead or you will return home," Wil said, trying not to sound frightened.

"I don't see how you could. You are frail, as we have said," She eyed him.

"You have heard of human ingenuity right? If we humans can do anything, it is to outwit our enemies," Will hoped he wasn't saying too much.

She rolled his words in his head for a while and it wasn't looking good for him.

"Very well. You may go face the dragon but you will need help," she said.

She whispers to another giant and the other giant leaves to return with what looks to be a huge belt. The giant wraped it around Will's waist and pulled tight. The belt was obviously not built for human's, as it covered his entire stomach which was crushed inward. Will thought that he was going to be cut in two but the giant stopped before that happened.

"This belt has old magics. It should keep you safe from many things. Do not expect it to keep you safe from a dragon, however."

With that, Will was released.
1553322221111.title: Will lies and says he plans to kill the dragon

choices: Will tries to get through the wall.
Will leaves the path and enters the forest to try to find a way around.
15533222211111.content:
Will passed on beyond the Giants, relieved to escape with his life. Their mention of a dragon had him nervous, but he was confident he could nick enough treasure to make this trip worthwhile without dealing with that lizard.

The Giants' gift was a little uncomfortable, but Will could find no way to remove it. Besides, if it did have some sort of magical protection, he'd be a fool to discard such an advantage.

After a time, he came across what first seemed to be a great wall. But as he got closer, he saw that it was an immense hedge that seemed to be a single rose bush. Sunlight seemed to inflame the vibrant red flowers and also glinted off the myriad thorns. They were at least an inch long and seemed almost to sway towards him as he approached. But surely that was just his imagination?

The Rose Wall was at least 10 feet high and stretched into the darkness of the forest that surrounded the path. But it seemed only a few inches thick; he could see glimpses of the trail beyond it.
15533222211111.title: Will finds the Rose Wall

155332222111111.content:
Faced with the near impossible task of finding the edge of the the thorn wall, Will decided to see out good the belt was at protecting him. Rather than just leap in, he reached out to touch a single thorn. He braced himself for the pain but the pain didn't come. He touched the thorn and was able to feel it's detail but the thorn did not cut nor pierce.

He took a deep breath and stepped forward, cutting a hole with his sword. The thorns ripped and pulled at his clothes but he remained unharmed. Nearly free, he felt his hair getting caught. He tried to untangle himself but it was too much. He took another breath and put all of his weight toward moving forward, ripping himself free.

On the other side of the wall, his long hair fell to his shoulders, his hair tie now torn apart. His hair hand been curled some from the combing of the plants and a single rose had stayed lodged behind his ear. He attempted to remove it but it was no use. Now smelling of roses, he marched on.
155332222111111.title: Will tries to get through the wall.

choices: Will tries to talk his way out.
1553322221111111.content:
It seemed like hours later that Will's path was arrested by great, white strands crossing the path. He looked into the trees and saw the webs all around him. Before he could think of turning around, a horrible hissing voce behind him crooned: "Well, well, well... what have we here? A far tastier looking morsel than those stone lummoxes from before."

Will turned and saw a tremendous spider, nearly ten feet long and as tall as he was blocking the path back. Would the Giants' belt protect him from this?
1553322221111111.title: He finds huge spiders

choices: Manages to kick the spider in the eye, escaping but still mostly wrapped in silk
Gets completely trapped, rescued by someone else later.
15533222211111111.content:
Will took a few steps back... Giant spiders weren't known to be friendly to humans. and slowly reached for his blade.

Before he could make a move the spider jumped into action spraying a web at his blade arm, sticking his arm to his side, covering his blade.

"Shit" he couldn't get to his weapon, he'd have to run, Will took of sprinting in the opposite direction, just needed to get out of the tree line, there was no way the spider would follow into an open area.

He was getting close when he saw a web blocking the path, his only option was to try and break through... and he did, slowly, the spider managed to catch up and grabbed each of his arms and legs with its long gangling arms.

The Spider began rotating him, slowly wrapping him in, if he wasn't in a life or death situation, he might've thought how surprisingly beautiful the webbing was, like white silk.

He struggled as he got closer and closer to being completely ensnared
15533222211111111.title: Will fights the spider

155332222111111111.content:
Will was being pulled higher and higher and he knew he wasn't long for this world. With one final desperate act, he kicked at the spider with all of his might. Luck would see his heel land true, right in the eye of the spider.

The creature shrieked out in pain and dropped will. Luckily, spider had freed his arms while trying to cocoon him, which allowed him to slow his descent. When he landed, he knew it would have at least broken a leg but the magic of the belt kept him from serious harm.

"If I didn't think they would take it back, I thank those giants," he thought.

He went for his sword, but the while webbing was still covering it, he was unable to find it at all. With nothing else he could do, he ran. The webs kept him from making his full stride but he was able to make it out of the dark place.
155332222111111111.title: Manages to kick the spider in the eye, escaping...

1553322221111111111.content:
Will cursed how strong this damn spider silk was, it was tightly wrapped around 80% of his body, he'd managed to unstick his arms but the silk had wrapped his arms individually, and wrapped down most of his legs causing him to take small steps, he tried tearing at it to no avail, and his blade was in its sheathe bound tightly to his side underneath the indestructible silk wrap.

He walked slowly up the road for a good hour or two, before he realized how hungry he was... He'd need to find a town fast... though that might not help, it was a bit embarrassing to be seen entering a town, still covering in the spider's webbing, though they would most likely have some tools to help cut him free.

But until then he took a rest by a stream and picked at some berries, they were shimmery and seemed to change from blue to pink in different lightings... If he'd remembered correctly they were gooseberries, bitter, but not poisonous.

He began eating them, fighting them not all that appetizing but food was food.
1553322221111111111.title: Hungry, will finds strange berries

choices: Will's arrival draws a lot of attention.
15533222211111111111.content:
Finishing the berries, Will attempted to stand in the tight, white confines of the spider's silk. But quickly his head spun and he fell back to his knees. Crawling to the stream, he barely made it before the contents of his stomach came up with a burning sensation. Horribly, he even choked as some of the noxious brew tried to get down his windpipe. The fit passed and he lay gasping. He managed to get a few handfuls of water to wash the taste from his mouth. He coughed and his throat felt weird as he did so. He tried clearing it, but only a whisper of sound escaped. Somehow the poison in the berries had paralyzed his vocal cords! He was completely unable to speak!

Now feeling a desperate need to get to the town, he picked himself up and began slowly making his way there, his legs still bound in the spider's webbing. He had no idea the picture he presented. The giants' belt still pulled in his waist, making his hips seem curvier under the close-fitting wrapping of the web. The need to walk carefully was forcing him to wiggle his butt from side to side with each step. His dark hair fell in curly waves to his shoulders and swayed tantalizingly with each step, a single rose still entangled in it and the smell of flowers clinging to him. Lastly, unbeknownst to him, the berries had had one other effect: his lips were swollen to an inviting plumpness and stained a bright red. Any man seeing them would be aching to kiss them... or do other things with them.
