He decides to go to the mall.
155332222222221211122.content:
The cashier finishes ringing up the groceries and hands the check to David. David then grabs his groceries and leaves the supermarket. For a moment he almost expected the cashier to say something, but he didn't. David assumed that the cashier was only thinking about when he was going to take his next break.

David loaded the groceries into his car and drove home. He was able to get home reasonably quickly. As he took his groceries from the car, he realized that Sarah was going to be gone for the next couple of days at least. She was running out to meet some of her friends to go camping. She said that they would only be gone for a couple of day, but he knew she would soon call and try to extend that. And like a sap he would give in. What can he say, he just wanted her to be happy.

He finished putting away the groceries and sat down on the couch. He was feeling tried for some reason. He wasn't on the couch for long before nodding himself to sleep.

Suddenly, he found himself in the bedroom of his old house. He looked around and saw Valerie sitting in front of your vanity, brushing her hair. She looked like she was dressed for a casual day out. She was wearing a nice denim dress:

{link:http://www.chicos.com/Product_Images/570177066_657_large.jpg?resize=10 00px:*&output-quality=85}

paired with flat metallic sandals:

{link:http://s7.jjill.com/is/image/JJill/062991_900?$pdp_main$}

As he glazed at the wonderful form of his beloved, David was suddenly hit by a blinding flash of light. Suddenly, he was sitting at Valerie's vanity. He looked around the room for her, but she had vanished. Then he looked in the mirror and was shocked. His beard was gone and his eyebrows where now thin and slightly arched. His hair was now almost shoulder length, with bangs and light brown curls. He had on hoop earnings and had light makeup applied to his face.

He saw that the hairbrush was in his hand, and his fingernails now sported light pink acrylic tips. He looked down and saw that he was now wearing the dress that Valerie had on, and he was able to fee the sensation of a bra and panties underneath. He looked at the ground and saw his now pink toenails peeking out of the sandals his wife was just wearing.

Suddenly he woke up with a jolt. He looked around and was still on the couch, and was still wearing what he had fallen asleep in. What a weird dream, he thought. What was strange was that for some reason, the dream felt kinda nice.

What next?
155332222222221211122.title: He doesn't notice a thing

choices: Decides to go check out a new strip mall.
Decides to buy some new underwear.
1553322222222212111221.content:
As nice as he felt in the dream he knew it was still something peculiar to dream about. It must mean something, but what? He tried to think why he would have a dream like that, but couldn't think of anything. It must just be one of those dreams that don't make any sense.

Well, no use spending the whole day worrying about it. He knew he needed to get some errands done. He had been putting off cleaning the attic for some time now, and he might as well do it know rather than put it off forever.

David went upstairs to the attic and turned on the light. A mess greeted him. Boxes where littered all around the attic along with miscellaneous loose items sprinkled all over. He remembered how he was so tried moving that he basically threw all of this stuff up here with no sense of organization. He really wasn't thinking ahead when he did that. He decided not to look in any of the boxes that day and just try to get all the loose crap of the ground and try to give the place some sense of order.

He spent the rest of the afternoon cleaning up the attic: Rearranging the boxes, throwing all of the loose items into a new box, throwing away any trash, and sweeping and dusting the place. It was more work than he thought, but he did feel some pride as he was doing it.

As he was finishing up, he suddenly noticed something thin and small underneath one of the boxes. He bent down to pick it up and was astonished at what he saw.

In his hand was Valerie's old drivers license. He couldn't believe it was up here, he just assumed he had thrown it away. According to the front, it was still good for a couple of years before it had to be renewed. He grimaced at the photo. It was a typical drivers license photo that was quite blurry. Her face wasn't completely clear, but that was good enough as an ID.

He realized that it was probably still active. When she died he kept putting off calling the DMV to cancel the card because he just couldn't bring himself to tell them. Since it wasn't being used he figured it didn't matter. Well, might as well keep this for now, he thought. He opened his wallet and put it in one of the empty pockets.

He finished his cleaning and went downstairs, wondering what else there was to do.
1553322222222212111221.title: He decides to clean the attic.

15533222222222121112211.content:
As he left the attic, he wondered what he should do for the rest of the day. He had heard that a new strip mall was opening not too far from here, so he decided to check it out. He never knew if he would need something from there in the future, and it was closer than the enclosed mall in town.

He hopped in his car and drove down to its location. He was surprised to see that he was the only person there at the moment. After he parked and got out, he found out why. Most of the stores at the strip mall where not even open yet. The only ones that appeared open where a beauty salon and a jewelry shop.

Well since he was already here he might as well look around anyway. He decided to go to
15533222222222121112211.title: Decides to go check out a new strip mall.

155332222222221211122111.content:
David decided to check out the salon. After all, Sarah might want to go to one in the future, so he owed it to her to see what they offered. Anyway, he had plenty of time to kill. He walked down to the salon. As he approached it, he realized that it was much larger than he had thought when he first saw it. I was easily at least four regular strip mall stores long. As he approached the entrance he saw that the name of the place was called "Chateau Indulge" and that it was actually a spa and a salon.

He entered the place and felt a sense of calm and relaxation. He was in the lobby, and soft music was playing that made him instantly at ease. A woman entered from the back and stood behind the reception desk. Her name tag read Amber. "Can I help you Sir?"

"Oh, yes," David replied. "I heard that this strip mall just opened, and I decided to come in to see what you offered. I have a teenage daughter so I decided find out for her."

"Oh, I see," said Amber. "Is your wife with you?"

"Oh no, I'm a single father."

"Oh so you raise your daughter by yourself. Hmmmm, I guess in a way that makes you both a father and a mother, huh?"

"Well I never thought of it like that, but I guess so."

Amber spent the next several minutes explaining to David the various spa and salon services offered at Chateau Indulge. There were quite a few. Apparently this quite a large area.

Amber sighed."You know, we just opened today. In fact, you are the first person whose been in here."

"Oh, wow." David replied. "What are the odds."

A smile appeared on Amber's face. "Listen David, do you have the next hour or so free?"

"Sure. I'm in no hurry."

"OK," Amber explained. "I think its important that you experience our services first hand. Since you are a new customer, we're going to offer you a free service for today. How would you like...
155332222222221211122111.title: The salon

choices: David pick up something for himself at the mall.
155332222222221211122112.content:
David saw the jewelry shop and thought that maybe he should buy his daughter a present for when she came home. He figured that she would probably be a little sad coming back after seeing her friends so a nice surprise would be nice for her to come home to.

He began walking toward the shop when he felt something snap in his hair. He kept his hair long but when out he would keep it tied in a professional business ponytail. He felt the back of his head and sure enough, the hair-tie he was using finally broke. He shrugged inwardly and tossed the broken hair-tie into a near by trash can.

He walked in the jewelry shop and started looking around not really knowing what his daughter would like. He felt another wave of sadness hit him as he realized his wife would know what to get if she were there.

"Hello, can I help you?" A man asked.

"Eeep," David squeaked not hearing the man approach. He quickly turned, scattering his hair all about.

"Sorry, didn't mean to startle you. I work here. Can I help you with anything?" The man asked again.

"Yes, please. I'm looking for a gift for my daughter," He said quickly trying to fix his naturally wavy hair.

"What is the occasion?" he said brightly.

"Well, I lost my spouse a few years ago and we just moved into town. It's a big adjustment and I just wanted to do something nice for her," David said, unconsciously playing with his wife's wedding ring.

The man saw the ring and David immediately became flustered having been caught wearing a woman's ring.

"I...I don't know why I'm wearing this-" He stared to explain.

"You should wear it as long at it feels right to and not a moment before. I'm sorry for your loss," The man told him.

"Thank you," David said, his head down and his wavy hair obscuring his face.

The man helped him pick out a a locket that he though David's daughter might like. At the cash register he asked for some ID to have David on record in case he wasn't to return it. David accidentally handed him Valerie's ID and the man looked it over. He handed it back, and finished the transaction.

"Have a nice day, Mrs. Johnson," He told him.

"You too," David said, not catching what the man just said.
155332222222221211122112.title: The jewelry shop

1553322222222212111221121.content:
David left the jewelry store, locket in hand. That salesman was sure a nice guy, he thought. He could definitely see himself doing some more business with that place in the future.

He was about to head back to his car when he noticed something. One of the stores that he thought was closed was now apparently open. It must have opened while he was in the jewelry store, he reasoned. He decided to go and have a closer look.

Looking through the window, he saw that it was a women's shoe store. The shelves were full of all types of women's shows, from sneakers to boots, from heels to sandals. He also saw that they were having a grand opening sale. Wow, they must be having some good deals now with that sale. Too bad they didn't sell any men's shoes, he thought. He had been needing a new pair of sneakers for a while now.

Then he suddenly thought of something. He new that thanks to him trying on Valerie's heels that he had her shoe size in women's. He knew what size of shoes to get. Yes, it was a women's shoe store, but there really isn't much difference between men's and women's sneakers. He decided that while he was here, he might as well take advantage of the sale.

He walked into the store and was greeted by a young saleslady named Megan. "Good afternoon, can I help you?"

"Why yes," David replied, feeling comfortable with this young girl. "I noticed that you are having an opening sale, and I wanted to buy a new pair of sneakers."

"Why of course. Do you have any particular pair in mind?'

"Uhhh, not really. Can you just bring out a pair that you would think is nice."

"Sure thing. What's your size?"

David told her Valerie's shoe size and Megan went to the back. A few moments later she returned with a pair of white sneakers. I think these are really nice. They are Reebok Princess sneakers.

{linkhttp://www.reebok.com/dwstatic/sits_pod2...}

Despite the name they were plain white sneakers and they fit David pretty well. They were also very comfortable to walk in. David decided to buy them.

He went to the counter and Megan rang up the shoes for him. She then asked if she could get his ID to put in their system to notify them of future promotions. Once again he accidentally gave Valerie's ID, which Megan entered into the system. "Have a good day." she said as David left the store.

Wow, that was nice, David thought. I might have to come back to this place as well in the future. He got back into his car and drove off.
1553322222222212111221121.title: David pick up something for himself at the mall.

15533222222222121112211211.content:
David made it back home without a problem. He walked back into his house. Well, he couldn't say that today wasn't productive. He got some comfortable new sneakers for himself and a locket for his daugher. In didn't matter what gender they were for, they were the most comfortable shoes he had worn for some time.

He opened up the jewelry box and took out the locket. It was a gold heart shaped locket that twinkled in the light. It looked so beautiful to him. He was sure Sarah would like it.

As he walked up to her room to leave it there, he felt kind of cheated that only a few stores were open at that strip mall. He had hoped to spend several hours there, but he barely stayed one. It wasn't the worst thing in the world, but he had nothing to do for the next few hours.

He entered Sarah's room and placed the locket box on her desk. He was about to leave when he looked in her closet. Suddenly a thought came in his head. He didn't know where it came from, but for some reason it intrigued him.

Him and Sarah were about the same height and the same build. He had nothing to do for the next few hours. Sarah wouldn't be back for some time. Since he had nothing better to do, why not try something new? Why not dress up in some of Sarah's clothes and pretend to be her for the rest of the day.

He couldn't believe he was thinking about this, but for some reason the idea of spending the day as a teenage girl sounded like fun. Could he do it?
15533222222222121112211211.title: Arrives back home

choices: David wakes up as they pull up to his house
15533222222222121112211212.content:
David was driving along when the storm came in. The sky darkened as as he drove and the sound of thunder was becoming more frequent. It was when the rain started to fall that he felt his car jerk. He didn't have to look to know that something hand gone horribly wrong. He quickly pulled over and got out to see the damage. As water streaked his face he popped open the hood. A crack of thunder made him flinch, putting an exclamation point on the scene in his mind.

David looked at the engine while the rain chilled him to the bone. His wet clothes lay close to his skin, soaked and left him uncomfortable. He did his best but he just couldn't seem to manage figuring out what was wrong. He was bent over the car, his pants tight from the water, when he heard a truck pull up behind him. He looked over his shoulder and saw a large man get out of a tow truck and rush over.

"Would you like some help?" He said in a rich baritone.

"Yes, please. That would be-" He started to say but found himself stunned.

The man's eyes were a deep blue that pierced into him. He never seen a blue like that and it took him a moment to recover. The man asked where he was headed and David told him.

"I actually live in that neighborhood. How about I give you a tow?" the man offered.

"Thank you so much, I really appreciate it," David said in relief.

"Go ahead and dry off in the truck, I'll join you in a second," He told David.

David got in the passenger side and was immediately thankful for the heater. David leaned back, completely exhausted. He rested there as his clothes dried out and the man hooked up his car. His eyes grew heavy as he waited for the man to come back and was hardly aware what was happening to his clothes. As they dried, they grew tighter on him at different angles causing a feminine effect on his frame.

By the time the man came back, David was asleep. The man smiled at the sleep form of the woman he thought he rescued.
15533222222222121112211212.title: Something happens along the way

155332222222221211122112121.content:
Paul Jenkins, the tow truck driver, looked down at the young woman as she slept. He always enjoyed being able to help a lady out in her time of need. He drove to the address she had given him. It wasn't too far away from where he lived. Strange, though, he thought he heard something saying that a man and his teen daughter had just moved here. But he didn't see any other cars in the driveway, nor was there any lights on in the house. Maybe the neighbor just saw the man and his daughter just looking at the house, but ultimately deciding to look elsewhere.

As Paul pulled to a complete stop, David suddenly woke. He noticed that they were at his house. "I must of fallen asleep" he said out loud.

"Don't worry about it," Paul replied, "I told you I knew the place, it was no problem to find it."

Paul parked the car in David's driveway and give him the number of a repair shop to call to talk about repairing it.

"Once you make an appointment with the repair shop, call me and I'll take it down there for you", he said handing David a business card.

"Thank you, I most definitely will. How much for the tow?"

"Don't worry about it, its on me for this once. I just don't like to see someone like you in distress."

"Wow, thank you. I'm glad to have met you."

"It was nice you meet you too. Be careful for the rest of the night, okay?", he said as he drove off. It was only after he left that Paul realized that he never got the young lady's name. Oh well, he thought, he'll just have to wait till she called tomorrow. He was already looking forward to it.

Back at the house, David was walking to the front door. Wow, Paul was sure a nice guy, he thought. He seems like someone he could easily become good friends with. Maybe he'd ask him later if they wanted to watch the football game on Sunday.

As he entered his house, he drew his attention to his damp clothes. He wanted to do nothing but to get out of them and put on something clean and fresh. He remembered that before he left he had out a load of clothes in the dryer. He ran over to it and without really looking, he reached inside and pulled out a hooded sweatshirt and pair of sweatpants. He didn't care what they looked like, he just wanted to get out of those damp clothes ASAP.

He stripped off the clothes he was wearing and quickly put on the sweatshirt and sweatpants. It wasn't until he fully had the sweatshirt over his had that he realized exactly what he was wearing. Both the shirt and pants were completely pink. Well, actually, not completely- the sweatpants had the word "PINK" written on the butt in gold lettering:

http://d2ydh70d4b5xgv.cloudfront.net/images/f/b/victoria-s-secret-pink-bling-swe...

"Oh for crying out loud!" David muttered to himself. He knew what had happened. Sometimes when Sarah knew David was going to be doing laundry, she would mix her dirty clothes with his so she wouldn't have to wash it herself. She must have done that before she left for the trip. It always annoyed David when she would do that. He wanted her to wash her own clothes so that she wouldn't be helpless whenever she was on her own.

Well, he already had them on, so he might as well just wear them for the rest of the night. He headed over to the couch to watch some TV. Well, he, thought, at least these clothes are comfortable. Luckily, just like him and Valerie, him and Sarah were at the moment both at the same height, and had similar body builds.
155332222222221211122112121.title: David wakes up as they pull up to his house

choices: The next day, getting ready to go out
1553322222222212111221121211.content:
After chilling out for a while he decided to call the place Paul had told him about. David always found it easier to walk when talking on the phone so he started wandering the house. He called up the repair shop and told them what happened with the car and that Paul said to call them. Telling them Paul's name ended up giving him David a discount. What luck!

While on the phone he found his hair was getting a little annoying without his hair tie. He tossing to to the side when he stopped in front of his daughter's room. From where he was standing he had a clear view of her vanity. He walked into her room as they put him on hold.

He could clearly see a pink scrunchy that his daughter would use some time. He thought, what the hell, he was already wearing pink and it would do the job. He put down the phone and picked up the scrunchy. He was about to put it in his hair like normal but then he heard a voice on the receiver again. Quickly he put his hair back and picked up the phone, walking out of the room. In his haste, his hair was tied back much higher than he would normally have it, It swayed bac and forth as he walked like it would on Valerie or Sarah but he didn't notice.

After he set up the time he called back Paul.

"Hi Paul, it's the person you helped out today," David told him.

"Hey there, Did you get a hold of Earl?" Paul asked.

"Sure did. He said for me to come in at 3:30 tomorrow," David explained.

"That's good. I'll swing by tomorrow and I can take you and your car over there," he said with a smile in his voice.

"You are too nice, Paul. Say, are you free Sunday? I'd love to have you over," David told him.

"That sounds great. I'll clear my schedule," He said in surprise.

"Alright, good. I'll let you go for now. You have a nice night," David said.

"You too," Paul said hanging up.

"Wow. She asked me out on a date. Wow," he said to himself.

Paul forgot ask what her name was so for now just put her in his phone as "Pretty lady."
1553322222222212111221121211.title: Later that night

choices: They take David's car to the mechanic
Something happens along the way to the mechanic
15533222222222121112211212111.content:
David woke up the next day on his couch. Wow, I must have fallen asleep on the couch while watching TV, he realized. He guess the Victoria's Secret sweatshirt and sweatpants were more comfortable than he had thought. Well, at least I had a good night's sleep. he thought. Thank goodness there were no more strange dreams about Valerie this time.

He went to the kitchen to make himself some breakfast. Sarah hadn't called, but he knew she was to busy having fun with her friends. She probably wouldn't call until tomorrow, and would most likely ask for permission to stay a few more days. Well, as long as she is having a good time, he thought. He couldn't wait for her to find the locket.

As he ate, he noticed that the mailman had come and delivered the mail. He was about to go outside to the mailbox when he remembered that the ground was still wet from all the rain last night. He didn't want to go outside in his bare feet, but he also didn't want to put on his shoes just to have to take them off a moment later. He wished he still had his trusty filp-flops. but they had finally fallen apart after years of use, and he hadn't bought a new pair yet.

Suddenly, he had a thought. Sarah had a couple pairs of flip-flops. He went to her room, hoping she didn't take all of them with her. He looked in her closet and was able to find a pair. They were black and had a pretty thick sole:

http://img.auctiva.com/imgdata/1/4/0/0/5/5/0/webimg/485731438_tp.jpg

They were obviously for women, but he didn't care. He slipped into them and found that they were a perfect fit. He shouldn't have been surprised, seeing as her father and mother had the same shoe size as well. It was strange at first to walk in them, but he became used to the feeling quickly. He walked to the mailbox and retrieved the mail. He saw that the jewelry store and shoe store were already sending himself.

Since he couldn't go anywhere due to the condition of his car, he spent the next couple of hours just lounging around at home and not really doing anything. He saw that the World Series of Poker was on and began watching it. However, once again the softness of Sarah's clothes overtook him and he once again feel asleep.

David woke to the sound of his cell phone ringing. Realizing he feel asleep again, he saw that Paul was calling him. He answered and said, "Hey what's up?"

"Hey, where are you? I've been waiting out here for 10 minutes. We gotta go. Believe me, Earl doesn't like to be kept waiting.

David looked at his clock and saw that his appointment was coming up quick. "Oh, crap! I'm sorry Paul. Let me just get dressed and I'll be out there."

"Please make it quick," Paul urged. "We need to go now."

David jumped off the couch and headed to the laundry room. He went to the dryer again, reached in a scavenged around until he found a pair of underwear, a pair of jeans and a shirt. He pulled them out and once again saw that they belonged to Sarah. Oh well, he thought, I don't have time to look for anything else. I'll just have to wear this.

He looked at her pink panties. They were from Victoria's Secret as well, and he remembered Sarah called them boyshorts. Boyshorts, he thought, well I guess that doesn't make it too girly:

http://cdn1.thehunt.com/app/public/system/zine_images/10581698/original/026b2a99...

He pulled them up his legs. They were comfortable but snug, and they pulled his genitals back, giving the appearance of a flat front. Next, he pulled on Sarah's skinny jeans:

http://www.fashionvip.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Dark-blue-skinny-jeans-for-...

They felt completely different from his regular jeans, much tighter around his hips and butt. Finally, he pulled on Sarah's striped top:

http://www.forever21.com/images/default_750/00220783-04.jpg

Paul began to honk his horn. With no other shoes near him, David slipped the thick-soled flip-flops back on. He then grabbed his wallet and phone, and went outside to meet Paul.
15533222222222121112211212111.title: The next day, getting ready to go out

155332222222221211122112121111.content:
David stepped out of the door and quickly minced over to the truck. The shape of the thick soles threw off his balance some so it caused his hips to sway in a motion he wasn't used to. Hopefully Paul won't make fun of it, he thought. He got in and buckled up.

"Hi, sorry I'm late, I really appreciate you doing this for me," David said.

David pulled a stand of wavy hair that escaped the scrunchy he had forgotten he was wearing behind his ear. Paul's frustration of having been left him when he saw the perceived flirty gesture.

"It's no trouble. I just want to make sure Earl treats you right," he told David.

"Thank you," he told him.

Earl was a little mad at first but Paul decided to take the blame for this one. David wanted to smile at him to convey his thanks but as he was smiling, some dust particle hit his eyes. He batted his eyes to clear them out and Paul began to blush. Earl saw the exchange and thought it was about time Paul started seeing someone again. He wondered if he could help out somehow. Maybe Earl's wife would have an idea?

Paul had to go but David said he was excited to see him Sunday. Earl looked over the engine to inspect the damage while thinking how he could help Paul land this girl.
155332222222221211122112121111.title: They take David's car to the mechanic

choices: "No thanks, I really wanna get home."
1553322222222212111221121211111.content:
After Paul left, David said to Earl, "Man, that Paul sure is a nice guy."

"You got that right," Earl replied, "Guy would give the shirt off his back to help out a friend." It was then that Earl noticed the wedding ring on the young girl's finger. Damn it, he thought. I hope Paul isn't trying to get with a married woman. He had to find out her status before anything crazy happened.

"Excuse me for asking, but are you married?" Earl asked.

Clearly caught off guard by the question, David stammered, "Well yes, I mean, I was, but there was an accident, and well..."

"Say no more, I'm sorry to hear about your loss." Earl replied. He felt bad for inadvertently bringing up the loss of this poor girl's husband. "Believe, me, Paul knows what you are going through. He lost his wife to cancer last year."

"Oh my god, I'm so sorry to hear that." David said. David was sorry that another man had to go through losing a wife. Maybe they would be able to comfort one another through it.

"Don't worry, I'm sure he'll meet someone new soon," winking at David.

Earl went back to looking at the engine. It only required minor repair and shouldn't take more than a couple of hours to get the job done. Then he remembered how Paul had to drive the girl over to him. Maybe that could be a way for Paul to land her. Suddenly a plan formed in his mind.

He looked up at David. "Sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but the entire engine is shot. I'm going to have to go in and replace most of the major components. This is going to be a day job at least, most likely two." He felt bad about lying to a customer, but this would be a way to help Paul move on from his grief. If he had to drive around this girl some more, maybe something could develop between them. Anyway, he would give her another discount when the job was done.

David groaned when he heard that. "Oh just great! So I'm going to be without a car during all that time."

Earl shrugged. "Sorry, these things just happened sometimes. But don't worry. As I said, Paul is one hell of a guy, and I'm sure he won't mind driving you around wherever you need to go."

David felt a little better. It sucked being without a car, but he did want to spend some more time with Paul as he believed Paul could be a good friend.

"Let me call him to pick you up." Earl said as he went to his office. He called Paul and told him that the car would need to be in the shop for one or two days, and that he should pick up the girl to take her home. He didn't tell him that he made up the stuff about the engine. Didn't want Paul to think that Earl thought he wasn't good with women.

After a while Paul arrive back at the garage to pick David up. "So we meet again," Paul said as David climbed in.

"Thanks again man," replied David, you've been a big help."

"Don't mention it. Listen, I never got your name. If I'm going to keep being your chauffeur, it would help to know it." said Paul.

David laughed a little. "Oh, you can just call me Davy," David replied, giving his nickname. Having Paul call him by his real name just sounded too formal, not like something two best buds would do.

"Cool, thanks." Davie, thought Paul. He remembered that his sister once had a friend with that name. He remembered that it was short for Davina.
Well, now that he know her name, it was time to make the first move.

"Hey listen Davie," he said turning to David, "how bout before I take you home, we go somewhere at get a bite to eat?"

David replied.
1553322222222212111221121211111.title: A plan is hatched

15533222222222121112211212111111.content:
"Sure, that would be great," David said.

"Great, I know the perfect place," Paul smiled.

"I'm paying, though. You have been so kind to me and I'm going to be very kind to you," David placed a friendly hand on Paul's shoulder which sent a shiver down Paul's spine.

Paul noticed how suggestive that sounded but he would play it safe. She probably didn't mean anything by it but it should as hell gave Paul some interesting thoughts. He could only nod in response to that.

Davie was the first woman he had met in a long time that interested him. She was a little rough around the edges, true, but something about her just makes her stand out. He just found her pretty in an unorthodox kind of way.

They pulled up to the diner and could themselves a booth. Business was slow so a waitress was quickly.

"Hey Paul, whose your friend?" She said with a smirk.

"Hi Betty, this is Davie," he introduced them.

"Hello, My daughter and I moved in recently," He told Betty.

"Well it's nice to meet you and I would love to meet her. For now, what can I get you both?" she grinned.

They placed their orders and got to talking.

"Shame about your car. I want you to know that I'm available...that is, if you need help getting around," He told David.

"Now, I appreciate that. I mean a lot. That said, I don't want to take advantage of your kindness," David said.

"It's really know trouble, Davie. I like helping when I can," he said

"Well, it is a good way for me to get to know you. I'm starting to think my car breaking down was actually good luck," David told him

That made Paul very happy to hear.
15533222222222121112211212111111.title: "Sure, that would be great."

155332222222222.content: Internet Celebrity: Eric is trying to become an internet star but hasn't had much luck. How far will he go to get noticed?
155332222222222.title: Your choice

1553322222222221.content:
Eric slumped in his chair after ending his stream for the day. He loved gaming and he loved the idea of sharing that love with others as an entertainer. He named his online persona "EricKaBoom!" which he was pretty proud of. He knew that he had something special to share with the world but he just wasn't getting and traction. No one was giving him the time of day to see what he had to offer the world and it was really bothering him.

That said, nothing worth having is easy and he wasn't going to give up without a fight. He was slowly but surely boosting his computer and its accessories. His equipment was producing better quality video and he was excited to for his next purchase to come in.

Eric had ordered a new Camera and Microphone. He hoped that the better vocal audio would help and with a camera, maybe it would help catch the eyes of people.
He hoped it would pay off because he had to cut corners where he could to save up money to be able to afford everything. His hair had gotten longer than he normally would have it and his clothes were functional at best.
1553322222222221.title: Internet Celebrity

choices: It takes a while to gain any more.
15533222222222211.content:
"There!" Eric said wiping sweat from his Brow. finishing up everything his new rig was done, new capture card, new Mic set up, new recording device.

He set up his Twitch, signed on and began playing Overwatch silently, there was nobody viewing at the time so there wasn't anything worth saying,

He must've played for about an hour or so before his Viewers swtiched from a 0 to a 1, not uncommon, he'd even had 3 at once at one point, usually just people checking out new channels, most of the time they left after a few minutes, but now with all his new gear they might stick around.

Eric began chatting a bit, talking about the character he was playing and talking out his strategy while playing... And to his excitement and surprise, the viewer stayed around... and halfway through the counter went up to 2, before dropping down to one a few minutes later.

After the second Match Eric was getting more comfortable just chatting to effectively nobody, since the Viewer hadn't commented or anything.

After losing a match there was finally a Comment.

ELITEGAMERXX: Close one you're great, team held you back.

"Ha, Thanks dude, thanks for watching."

His Viewer Count went up and down for a while, getting up to 4 but all but one always left soon after.

After that things went well Erik kept on chatting with a comment here and there from Elite Gamer and as Eric was closing the game and ending the stream.

As he was saying his Goodbye's he got one last comment

ELITEGAMERXX: You're good at this game, Cute too.

Then to his surprise Eric had Gained a subscriber

Eric closed the Stream.

"Cute? must've been a gay dude, not that he minded, a compliment was a compliment. But the best part was he'd gained a subscriber! He was now officiallly making money off Streaming... sure, only like 1-2 dollars a month, but it was technically free Money, he'd have been playing that whole time regardless.
15533222222222211.title: His new equipment arrived

155332222222222112.content:
Eric was pretty jazzed about finally getting a subscriber and it was just what he needed.

"If one person was into this, then others will be," he thought to himself as he loaded his laundry into his washer.

He found himself distracted, his mind occupied with what he might do with his next stream. He toyed with starting up a new minecraft world since that was always a popular game to stream. He could do more Overwatch since he was still enjoying that game as well.

"Maybe I could work on my Mercy skills," he thought.

He hadn't been this excited to play for a while, he was almost bubbly. He probably should have been paying more attention to his wash because he made an upsetting discovery.

"Oh, crap." he said holding up a t-shirt.

He had accidentally mixed his whites with one of his red shirts. All of his whites had turned pink and he mentally kicked himself for it.

"Well, I can't wear these anymore," he said tossing them down.

Days go by and he doesn't have much of an increase in his views than usual. He was really hoping the new equipment would help but the impact was negligible. Still, seeing ELITEGAMERXX pop in was a good reminder that he could do this.

It's a few minutes until stream and he just got out of his shower when he realizes that he ran out of usable clean clothes...well, there were his whites...

With little choice, he tossed on a baggy pink shirt and a pair of pink briefs and sat down.
155332222222222112.title: It takes a while to gain any more.

choices: No, not worth the trouble, just deal with this
1553322222222221121.content:
Another Session gets started, for the first 45 minutes his view counter stayed at 0, which was unsurprising, he couldn't expect his only subscriber to always be around to watch.

over the course of the Evening his viewership varied, one then two and three, back down to two but a bit later it hit four.

After one particularly close match Eric subconciously was biting his lip, and was too focused on the match to notice his viewers rise up to 8 and a few comments that got hidden behind other text after a minute or two.

"She's so cute, biting her lip."

There was also a rude comment as well

"Just playing it up for subs, trying to look cute, typical :P"

Eric missed both comments as viewers came in and out of his chat room.

"Holy Shit, I've got 8 people watching right now? Hi Guys, I'm ErickaBoom, Thanks for watching the stream!"

Eric continued streaming for few more hours checking his logs at the end of the night.

"Three subscribers! Yes!" He'd gained two just in today's stream, though he was reminded about his pink clothes, he didn't have any Savings really to go shopping, Maybe he could call up his family for a bit of a loan for some new stuff.
1553322222222221121.title: more people subscribe

15533222222222211212.content:
Eric picked up his phone and called his sister.

"Hey Becky, its your favorite brother."

"Hello Ryan," Becky replied.

"Ouch, Becky. Ouch."

"I'm just messing with you, Eric. What is my "favorite" brother need?" she asked.

"Well, I was hoping you might be able to spot me a few bucks." he explained.

"What do you need it for and why don't you ask Mom?" asked a little annoyed.

"Well, I need clothes. I'm strapped for cash and my stuff is basically falling apart. Also, I can't call mom. She will just you it as another reason to quit my streaming," he told Becky.

"Well, maybe she has a point? She is only going to be paying your rent until June. Once that time is up, new clothes are going to be the least of your problems. You need something stable," she tells him.

"Look, this is going to work out. I've already got 3 Subscribers and more are going to be happening soon, I know if. This is my dream," he said.

"I know it's your dream but I don't want you homeless because of it," she said patiently.

"Are you going to help?" he asked.

"Fine," she sighed.

"Awesome, thanks. You are he best," he told Becky.

"I know. I'm pretty great," she said rolling her eye, though Eric wouldn't see it.

A few hours later Becky arrived at Eric's with a box. He looked at it confused.

"What is this?" He asked.

"It's some of my old clothes," she said flatly.

"What?" he said even more confused than before.

"You aren't the only one strapped for cash. It's the best I can do," she shrugged.

"Well, thanks...I guess. You want to come in?" he asked.

"Can't. I have to head out. I'll catch you later," she old Eric.

"Okay, later." He said looking at the box.
15533222222222211212.title: Call A Family Member

choices: Change into Becky's hand me downs.
155332222222222112121.content:
Looking through the box made him realize he might be better off with his pink clothes.

He took out his phone to text Becky

"I don't need your old bras thank you very much." He said holding out a pair of bras like they were snakes and tossing them on to the side.

"Ha, sorry, First of all I'd already packed up that Box, was going to take it to Good Will but figured you could wear some of it, and secondly, they're not old, they're brand new, tag still on them, they were the wrong size, don't know how I did that, Blond moment I guess."

Eric blew a particularly long tuft of hair out of his face, the whole family had extremely blond hair, His came close to being white.

"Well thanks for all this, I asked you a favor because I needed clothes, theres even some of your skirts and dresses in here."

"Correction Little Brother, Your skirts and dresses, everything in that box is yours to with as you please."

"Thanks a bunch :P"

"Well that was a bust." sure there was a few things in here he could get away with wearing, but 75% of it was definitely girly clothes.

He Decided it was getting to be time to stream again, but he wanted out of these pink clothes...
155332222222222112121.title: He goes through the box

choices: There was a bumb in subscribers!
1553322222222221121211.content:
Eric figured he might as well try something on and see if it fit. He grabbed a powder blue T-shirt and tossed it on. It fit okay, though it was obviously cut for a girl and was loose in the front.

"That isn't too big of a deal. I doubt anyone would notice," he told himself.

Of course it was super noticeable to the people that started to watch his stream. They didn't notice anything out of the ordinary, as Eric played hunched over. The fabric hanging loosely from his chest was enough to convince most that there was flesh just behind it. Something else that helped with that idea was the bra Eric had tossed clearly in frame.

Some folks pointed it out but Eric didn't notice as he was too into the game. He did look over to check in and he noticed something in the chat.

"ErickaBoom, your face is pretty washed out. You should put on some make up."

Another person chimed in after.

"Don't listen to him, you look great."

Eric was about to reply but another round started and took his attention away but he didn't forget it. He had don't a little acting in high school so the concept of stage makeup wasn't new to him. He wondered if it was worth doing as he check his subs.
1553322222222221121211.title: Change into Becky's hand me downs.

choices: "Actually... yeah, exactly... but let me explain!"
"Uh, Never Mind, talk to you later."
15533222222222211212112.content:
Still 3, 5 concurrent viewers though, his view count was constantly above 2-3 which was nice... he had steady views... not many but it was a start....

As he wrapped up the stream, he remembered something.

"Oh, one last thing, I've set up a P.O Box, The address is in my Bio, feel free to send me games you want me to play or anything else, I'll definitely give you a shoutout."

He quickly got a comment from someone who went by 420BanginSluts6969, which made Eric roll his eyes

"I'll send you a game that's perfect for you."

"Thanks, I'll give you a shoutout when I get it.

As he wrapped up his stream he hopped over to watch a few minutes of a popular streamer, they had both tons of subs and view... and The WebCam was definitely good, Eric wondered if the guy was wearing makeup... he doubted it... but began to wonder, Actors in Movies always did, maybe all the popular streamers had the same problem with washed out faces... Maybe Becky could help out again, though she'd never let him live it down.

He got up and stretched, Becky's T-shirt rising up exposing a bit of his waist.

"Damn girl's shirt." he said tugging it down.

Eric made himself a microwave Dinner, he didn't cook much after all.

While eating he grabbed his phone.

"Hey Becky, Mind If I come over tomorrow, I've got a favor to ask you."

"What's up Favorite Little Brother? You've got clothes now? what's next makeup lessons? :D :P"

Eric paused, damnit... He was already embarrassed enough just thinking about asking her... but her joke had been spot on, not to mention he'd need a few starter supplies, Becky would never stop teasing him about this.
15533222222222211212112.title: Something Else.

155332222222222112121121.content:
"Actually...yeah, exactly...but let me explain!" Eric said in embarrassment.

"Oh? Really? Please tell me why you want to know how to put on makeup," she said amused.

"It's for the stream. They say that my face is washed out and they thought that makeup could help...you know...like an actor," Eric said feeling kind of silly.

"So you want me to make you all pretty for the boys?" she asked.

"Nevermind," Eric said about to hang up.

"Wait, wait, wait. I'm sorry. I'm just messing around. I would be happy to teach you what I know. Though I don't approve of this gaming thing as a career, I do respect that you are putting so much work and effort into it," She told him.

There is a pause before she spoke again.

"Please come over tomorrow?" she said.

"Okay. 7.30 tomorrow night?" he told her.

"That works for me. See you then," She told him.

"Bye," Eric said before hanging up.

He knew that she wasn't done poking fun at him but he needed the help. Eric took the box of cloths he knew he would not be wearing and placed it in his closet and he put the ones he would be away. He spent the rest of the night cleaning up and do chores that needed getting done.
155332222222222112121121.title: "Actually... yeah, exactly... but let me ex...

choices: Later on, Streaming with Makeup and girl's clothes, what could go wrong.
1553322222222221121211211.content:
Eric knocked out Becky's Door.

"Why if it isn't my Favorite little sister." Becky says cheerfully.

Eric rolls his eyes, "Can we not, I'm already embarrassed enough that I'm even thinking about doing this."

"Alright alright, Sorry kiddo, thought honestly I am impressed... I've never seen you try so hard for something, maybe you might just be able to make this whole streaming thing work, Though I still think you should get atleast a part time job somewhere, I could put in a good word at work."

"I think I just want to focus on this for now."

"Alright... well come in, come in." Becky says waving Eric in, leading him into her bedroom.

"Alright, take a seat there and First I'll do your face, explaining what I'm doing as I go... afterwards we'll wash it off, And I'll do it again, while quizzing you, then again... and on the fourth maybe fifth go through, I'll have you do it yourself while I give advice, finally, I'll leave you to do it by yourself and We'll see how you did."

"Ok... guess that makes sense." Eric agreed.

"Alright, so You shaved really close this morning like I asked, which is good, stubble would show through, We're going to start with Foundation, it'll give you a base to work from, since skin is generally kind of flawed and varies in color." Becky used some Foundation and you watched how she put some in areas and then would spread it out from there, something she called Contouring.

"Next we'll do some blush and bronzer, this should help add some color to your pale face, probably why you're getting "Washed out"."

Next Becky did a little bit of eye makeup, showing Eric how to do eye-shadow and eyeliner, then Mascara afterwards, the eyeliner was really hard not to twitch or blink.

Eric tried to tell her he probably didn't need some of this stuff, but Becky was insistent that he learn all this stuff.

Lastly was Lipstick, which against Eric's insistence that he really didn't need Becky showed him.

"You need to add color to your face otherwise the Foundation is only going to make you look more Washed out, that's why this will help... probably, the colors accentuate your face so it shows up better on camera, now purse your lips like this..." she made a kissing face.

"Alright, guess I'll trust your judgement." Becky coated his lips with a light pink Lipstick, while noticeable it wasn't too bright or noticeable.

"Wow, wth makeup on, we look even more like family... sisters" she said with a slight cough.

"Shut up... haven't you made enough girl's jokes?" Eric sighed.

"Not even close, I mean I still need to teach you how to walk in heels, and how to sit while wearing a skirt, oh how to put a bra on..."

"Ugghhh"

"Alright alright, I'll stop, I'm only giving you a hard time Baby Bro."

"Also, I only wanted to look good on Camera, not look like a girl" Eric complained.

"Sorry Kiddo, but like I said, I'm no Makeup expert, I don't know how to do Actor Makeup, I do know how to do... "girl" makeup

Becky slowly washed it off and began again.

The next several hours were spent in front of Becky's Makeup table, until Finally Becky left him to do it himself., while she made dinner.

After 20 minutes of doing all his own makeup himself.

Happy with how it looked he came out to the Kitchen just as Becky Finished cooking.

"Smells good" He told her.

"Oh, Wow, look at you, not bad at all, You're a quick learner."

"Hardly, I've been sitting in that chair for hours."

"Yeah, and I spent much of my young life getting my techniques, you're pretty good in an Afternoon."

"Oh, guess that's true. Guess I had a good teacher."

You sat down to eat, and while eating could notice a few things, every time you're lips moved you could feel the lipstick on your lips, and once you wiped your mouth, and noticed some pink smear on your napkin, Another time you wiped your eyes for a moment only to get eyeliner in your eyes.

"Damn, this stuff will take some getting used to."

After Dinner Becky packed up a few makeup supplies to get you started.

"What about the stuff You taught me with?" noticing its all different.

"That's my good Makeup, I use all that for work and Socializing, I'm giving you the stuff I don't use, times are tight for me to you know, I can't keep giving you all my stuff... though I do have a few pairs of shoes I don't wear anymore."

"Alright alright, that's fair, and no I don't need your shoes."

With that Eric got in his car, and took a look through his makeup supplies. Before heading home, realizing half way that he hadn't washed the makeup off.
1553322222222221121211211.title: Lessons with Becky

15533222222222211212112111.content:
Once home, Eric put the makeup bag down and got ready to stream again. He booted up his computer and started up his streaming. He smiled seeing two people jump in.

"Hello everyone, EricKaBoom here! You guys ready for some action?!" He said with a smirk.

ReinhardtAttack: "Kick their asses!"

"You got it!" Eric said pointing to the camera.

It was actually a pretty easy match. The other team had a poor composition, which was fine by Eric.

"That was for you, ReinhardtAttack," he said with a wink.

ReinhardtAttack: "You are adorable."

"Haha, uh...thanks?" Eric said.

Eric checked his stream and was pleasantly surprised. 10 people were watching!

"Hey everyone. I'm EricKaBoom. Welcome to my stream. Any suggestions on who I should play?"

Winningston: Keep playing Mercy, she suits you.

"Your wish is my command," he said selecting Mercy again.

He went back to to playing and didn't see the followup.

Winningston: I've got a few commands in mind O_o.

ReinhardtAttack: Dude, don't make it weird. You will scare her off.

Eric was energized by the sudden surge in watchers. They didn't all stay but by the end of the night he was up to 6 subscribers! This was great. He was so happy.
15533222222222211212112111.title: Later on, Streaming with Makeup and girl's ...

choices: Later on, ending the stream for the night.
155332222222222112121121112.content:
A Few days later things had been going well, His Subscriber count had gone up by about 1 every day, He broke 10 last night.

He stopped by the post office and to his surprise found he had something in The P.O box.

"someone sent me something!"

He rushed back home and set up a stream, before doing a rush job of his makeup.

He titled the Stream "First Gift UnBoxing and possible gameplay."

Quickly he had a few viewers in, as he livestreamed himself opening up the package, He recalled that guy with the douchey screen name promised to send him something, he wondered what it was.

To his surprise and Dismay it was a Steam Code for Barbie's High School Adventures. and also in the Box was Shirt with a big picture of Barbie on it.

"O...k... Not what I was expecting... Thanks for the Gift Fans, and like I said, If You send me something, I'll definitely play it or show it off, so I guess the first game I'll be playing is Barbie's High School Adventures..." He said with a laugh shaking his head.

Eric renamed the Stream "ErickaBoom Playing Barbie's High Cchool Adventures by Fan Request." He hadn't noticed he hadn't capitalized the K, but it didn't particularly matter did it?

He booted up the game and decided against putting the shirt on, instead draping it over a nearby chair to it could be seen.

The Game seemed to be a typical RPG more or less with a barbie setting, and instead of battles their was arguments between different Cliques, his stats were in, Cuteness, Kindness, and Style...

After getting through the tutorial Eric had to admit, while the game was not great, it wasn't the worst game ever, it seemed like a lot of effort was put into it.

After an hour or so he defeated a boss, the head cheerleader, gaining the ability to change "classes" and be a cheerleader himself, Eric decided to stop.

"That's enough of that I think..." he paused when he noticed his view count was in the 30s...

"Woah... There's a lot of you today... Did you guys want to see More of Barbie game?"

Most of the comments seem to be on the positive side.

"Alright, guess maybe I'll make it a series, but for now i'm switching over to OverWatch, I think I'm getting pretty good at Mercy." He said taking some of his long-ish hair and parting it behind his ear."
155332222222222112121121112.title: Something Else.

choices: He gets some unexpected attention while out.
1553322222222221121211211121.content:
"That's all for tonight guys. Be sure to subscribe if you want to make sure you can catcch my next part of my Barbie series...Good night!" he said before signing off.

The makeup must have really helped because things were really starting to kick up. Not fast enough for him to make any kind of money yet, but still. What Becky had said about part time work did stick with him. She worked at a salon, so he didn't know what he would end up doing there if he did try. Maybe manning the register or cleaning the place? He pushed the thought aside for now. He did want to focus on the real work after all.

He took the Barbie shirt and looked it over.

"I guess you get what you ask for," he smirked.

He thought about it. It might be funny to wear it next time. That way people know he can take a joke with grace. Of course, does he really want to encourage the internet? He'd think it over and come back to it another time.

The next day he got ready to go out and get some groceries. He tossed on one of his sister's shirts and tried putting on his last pair of jeans. He was just out side when he heard a *rip*.

"Seriously?" he said feeling the split between his legs.

He stepped back inside and tossed the jeans into the trash. With little other choice he went back to his sister's clothes. He tried on a pair of "his" new jeans that Becky gave him. They fit, though the cut was odd at first. They hugged his thighs and his butt more than his normal pair. He felt his butt and could feel his briefs through the material.

"I doubt anyone would notice," He told himself.
1553322222222221121211211121.title: Later on, ending the stream for the night.

choices: Go Home or find something else to do in town.
15533222222222211212112111211.content:
As he walked through the Grocery store Eric could swear that people were looking at him, not like constantly staring or anything, but just glances here and there, or he'd catch people looking at him out of the corner of his eye... though maybe he was just being paranoid for some reason.

He picked up several Easy to make dishes, mostly microwavable, or one Pan dishes.

As he's standing in line with his grocery's he decides to get one of the impulse buy candy bars at the check out aisle, but as he turns and leans down he clances to his side seeing the guy in line behind him staring... straight at his ass.

Eric quickly jolts back to a standing position and tosses the candy on the belt.

Then suddenly it clicked, people had been staring, that guy, and the way the pants had felt odd all day, they weren't just regular jeans, or even skinny jeans.

He recalled years ago, around the time that Becky was a senior in high school and early College... Becky was a late bloomer, she had not developed at all, she looked like a boy, and it really embarrassed her, so She and Mom went out and bought her lots of clothes that would help.

Since then Becky had of course developed and she put all that past her.

The pants he was wearing had padded hips and ass, From the back he probably looked like a chick!

That guy behind him must be so embarrassed after seeing Eric was a guy, but he let it drop, though he vowed not to wear these pants again.

After loading the car, he figured he had no other plans that day... and Becky's work was close, maybe he could swing by... just to say Hi.
15533222222222211212112111211.title: He gets some unexpected attention while out.

155332222222222112121121112111.content:
"Why not?" he asked himself.

He drove down to the Salon just to stop by and say hi. He pulled into a parking spot and headed inside. The place looked pretty empty, which was good, since he didn't want a repeat of what happened earlier.

"Hi, do you have an appointment?" asked an older woman behind the counter.

"Oh, no. I'm actually her to say hi to my sister, if that is okay," he said.

"That's quiet alright. What is your name, hun?" She asked him.

"Eric uh..." he trailed off seeing Becky.

Eric waved to his sister as she came walking up.

"Oh, yes. The board game player," the woman recalled.

"Well, video games but yes," he said.

"So, you here for those cute highlights you've been talking about?" Becky asks.

Eric rolls his eyes as the woman turns.

"I'll let you talk with your sister," she says to Becky, though they both register it as a message for Eric.

The two of them step outside for a few moments to talk.

"So what's up? Wait...are those...?" she said looking at his padded jeans.

"Don't start. I didn't notice until I was already out. Don't make me regret coming to say hi," he side putting his hands on his hips.

"I was just asking," she said trying to hold back a laugh.

Eric blew his hair out of his eyes in frustrated manner.

"Well, you are here. Do you want a haircut?" she asked.

"No money or I would have," he points out.

"You could always work it off. Just today. What do you think?" she asks.
155332222222222112121121112111.title: Visiting Becky.

choices: During the Stream, someone mentions He looks like Mercy
1553322222222221121211211121112.content:
"Ughh. Fine, If that will cure you of all your girl jokes."

"I spent an afternoon teaching you how to use makeup and now you're wearing those jeans... Trust me, i'm never gonna stop." Becky Giggled.

"Yeah, that kind of what I figured."

Becky nuzzled His hair laughing.

"Hey, Connie, Mind if I take my break and use it to give Eric a haircut?" Becky started but was cut off.

"yeah, yeah, its fine, But you've only got 30 minutes until your next appointment." The Woman from Before replied dismissively, clearly only half paying attention.

"She's a busy woman, That's the owner, one of the managers is out today and She's all over the place today, Alright, follow me to the Sinks and I'll wash your hair first."

"Why do we need to wash it? just cut it short and lets be done with it."

"You can't just cut long hair, You've got to wash it out, so that it all lays flat so when its cut its the same length... Sheesh how can you have hair that nice, and not know anything about it." She said having Eric sit down.

"It's only long because I'm broke and don't get it cut. I don't do any research on the topic." Eric answered laying his head into the sink and Letting Becky get started.

After about 15 minutes she finished up, wrapped his hair in a towel and escorting him to her set up. and began brushing it out, a pretty arduous task as Eric didn't take very good care of it, and had several knots and split ends, and before she knew it, 30 minutes had passed.

The Door chimed and a customer walked in.

"Oh, shoot is it already 1:30... Ummm We're gonna have to finish another time Eric Sorry."

Connie appeared from around the Corner.

"If Neither of you Mind I can finish for you, while you take care of the customer."

"Aren't you busy?" Becky asked.

"Yeah, but my mind's going a Mile a minute, I could use a breather, you go take care of your appointment, I'll finish her up."

Eric was busy just browsing the Web on his phone and didn't catch the use of her, and Becky had missed it greeting the customer.

"Just clean that mop up, it doesn't get taken care of at home." Becky said before disappearing to the front.

Eric was paying enough attention to know that Connie would be finishing off the haircut, but didn't particularly Mind, he was reading a Forum on Mercy Strategies, feeling like he always got eliminated too quickly.

Connie on the flipside was at first just trimming Eric's hair before noticing an image of a blond woman appearing over and over on Eric's phone.

"Oh... for reference pictures of the style she wants." she thought silently and began cutting.

After 30 minutes or so, Eric began to wonder why Connie hadn't began cutting it short yet, she seemed to just be trimming it in several spots, but after Becky asked him about hair stuff earlier he remembered that he didn't know all the tricks to this and just Trusted that's how it needed to be done.

Becky suddenly remembered she hadn't completely detailed what Eric wanted done before Glancing over to See Connie styling Eric's Hair.... Oh My God, She'd given him bangs... She must've thought he was a girl... and all Becky told her was to Clean it up.

As A few more customers Filed in Connie began blow drying Eric's hair, needing to finish up and get back to work, as Eric was turned around to see his hair, still long, though, more on the right side then the left, the right draped over his face while the left was tucked behind his ear.

Becky joined him just as Connie asked what he thought of it.

"We love it... Don't we?" Becky said giving him a knowing look.

Eric wasn't sure what was going on, or why Becky had jumped in, but wasn't about to argue... "Yeah, I love it..."

"Well You'd better hurry home, You've got to stream soon right?" Becky said nearly pushing him towards the front door.

"i'll explain in a bit, i'll text you." Becky whispered, as Eric left.

A Few minutes later Eric got a text explaining what Becky assumes happened.

"She thought you were a girl... and I guess I wasn't clear that you wanted it cut short... And She's really stressed at home and work right now, So I don't want to tell her and stress her out more... just please, You can come in on her day off next Wednesday and I'll fix it for free, I promise, Thanks, I owe you one, Favorite little brother."

"Damn pants." Eric fumed, his hair was long before but now he had these bangs that hung in front of his face which only made it worse.
1553322222222221121211211121112.title: "Fine, fine."

15533222222222211212112111211121.content:
Eric washed up his face before applying his makeup in prep for the camera. He he looked at the barbie shirt for a moment thinking about if he should wear it or not.

"Whatever," he said before pulling it on. It was for the fans, after all.

He was in a sour mood but he knew he had to shake himself out of it before he started. He did his best to get mentally ready to entertain while he booted everything up. He named the stream "erickaboom playing barbie's high school adventures by fan request part 2." He didn't bother capitalize anything this time before launching it.

They seemed receptive so he loaded it up and changed the stream name. As he looked at the comments he saw one stick out.

SuperStarLord: Holy crap, you look like Mercy!

"Do I? Hold on a sec, I need a brake anyway. Two minutes," he said before getting up. His shirt lifted giving the audience a glimpse of some skin and a clear view of his padded butt as he stepped away.

"Woah, she does. I never noticed before."

"God, dat ass."

"fap fap fap fap"

"Grow up guys. Don't be gross and ruin this for her or us for that matter."

Eric didn't see the followup comments as he used the bathroom and then checked his reflection.

"Well, I'll be damned," he said noticing what superstarlord saw.

He came back after he was done and got back to playing.

"Yeah, about the hair. It's a long story but Wednesday I'm chopping it all off," he told them.

"Noooo!"

"It looks cool, you should keep it."

"Yeah, it looks great."

Eric was kind of flattered. He was still going to cut it off but at least they weren't making fun of him for it.

After a quick Morning Stream of Barbie again, he had just done part 5, and it seemed like he was getting close to the end, he'd be happy to be done with the game but it got surprisingly good views, Recently he'd been doing all the voices of the characters which had gotten some good responses from Fans.

Eric washed his face wiping away all the makeup he wore for the camera before getting in the car, and driving into town, dressed in one of his Pink-d T-shirts and a pair of Becky's old shorts, not like short shorts, but about knee length.

He couldn't wait to get rid of all this hair, the last few days, he'd Constantly get told how it looks just like Mercy's something he was excited to be done with, getting compared to a cute girl. He'd used a Rubber band to keep his hair back, thought the piece of hair near his face was just short enough not to reach and would still hand in front of his face.

1553322222222221121211211121112112.content:
"Oh She's here...to help out like I told you..."

Becky was clearly panicked and said the first thing she could think of. Eric's mouth dropped hearing what Becky said.

"Ah, good. It's good to have you on board Ericka. We can get started right away. Let me show you around," Connie said gesturing for him to follow.

Reluctantly, Eric followed his new boss that he apparently had now. He looked at his sister with as much displeasure as he could muster. She mouthed a "I'm sorry" as he was taken into the back room. Connie explained that Eric would be in charge of cleaning up the place. That included sweeping and taking out trash as well as any other odds and ends they needed done.

"There is no way I'm doing this," he thought to himself.

"When you are at the register, you are also going to try and sell some of the products we have. You are going to need to familiarize yourself with the lotions and gels we have. Don't worry you girls get free samples to try. Here, try this face cream. It's amazing, trust me," She said plopping some cream into his hand.

With little choice he rubbed it into his skin. He felt so embarrassed that it was apparently this easy to confuse him for a girl for this long. He wished he could just disappear. He would occasionally spot his sister looking over at him in worry.

"I should just tell Connie this was a mistake," he thought.

"Also, about your clothes-" she started before getting a call.

She apologized before stepping away to take the call.

155332222222222112121121112111211212.content:
Eric got to work cleaning up the the salon. It seemed they really did need the extra help because after a few hours, there was still work to do. All in all, I was actually pretty easy to do, he didn't even work up a sweat. By the time it was time for him to go, he had completely forgotten about what Connie had done to his hair. He and Becky were just about ready to escape when Connie spotted him.

"Ericka, I need a minute before you go," Connie called to him.

"Sure thing," he cringed, letting go of the door.

"I'll call you," Becky told him before leaving him with Connie.

"What is this?" he asked.

"It's your pay for today. I'm not going to be able to have you on the books officially," She told him.

"Oh, thank you," he said feeling the paper.

"Of course. See you tomorrow," she smiled.

"Fat chance," he thought.

"See you tomorrow," he lied.

He stepped out and headed to his car. He opened the envelope and nodded. It wasn't a lot but it was going to be enough to get him some new clothes, finally. He got into his car and turned the engine...but the engine didn't turn.

"No, come on, no," he said as he tried again but with no luck.

The auto-mechanic took pity on the apparent poor broke girl and towed her car into the shop to get it checked out, needing to charge her 40 dollars was the best he could do though.

Connie did expect him at work tomorrow, and he hadn't been planning on coming... but unless the car only needed 10 bucks in repairs he'd be out of luck, sure his Twitch subs would at the end of the month earn him about 15-20 dollars but at this rate it wouldn't even come close. expected to go

He'd forgot how girly his haircut made him look right now, how would mom take seeing her son looking like he did now.

15533222222222211212112111211121121211.content:
He decided against asking for money from his mom, not wanting yet another lecture about getting a "real career."

"I guess I'll need that ride. Thanks," he texted back.

Eric grumbled to himself as he walked to the bus stop, still unaware of how cute he looked with his hair done up by Connie. A few guys on the bus, however, were well aware. They would get on and give him a smile and Eric would reflexively smile back, despite his horrid mood. The bus left him with just a few dollars.

Once home, he noticed a small package waiting for him.

"Oh!" he squeaked, realizing it was from another fan.

Quickly he set up the stream and titled it. "Erickaboom's second ever gift unboxing!". He didn't bother putting on makeup yet, he was too excited to see what he got. He chatted for a bit, gaving the stream a little time to get a few people in before starting.

"This one is from ReinhardtAttack, Thanks Rein," he said to the camera.

As he struggled to open up the box, people started commenting.

"Awesome. I'm glad you didn't cut your hair. I like a girl with long hair."

"Her hair looks really cute like that "

The comments got buried as he eventually popped the box open.

"Wow, a Mercy fig. Thank you so much, man. I really appreciate it. This is really nice...I love it," he said looking at it.

He did his best to get the fig in frame before breaking to put on his makeup. Looking in the mirror, he saw his hair again. He mentally kicked himself as he ripped the barrette from his hair. He hoped no one noticed but the damage was already done. He put his makeup on and walked back to his computer to to get back to gaming.

"Ok.... clothes. You're probably not going to like any of them but... I've got a skirt and blouse combo that's fairly conservative," she told him.

"No," Eric said.

"What?" Becky said.

"No. I said no. I not wearing a damn skirt. Don't you have anything else?" he asked flustered.

"All either of us have are jeans, Eric. She specifically said no jeans. It's this or one of your dresses," she told him folding her arms.

"Don't call them 'my dresses'," he told her.

"Fine, whatever," she said packing up.

"What are you doing?" he asked.

"If you don't want my help, I'll leave," she said flatly.

"I just don't want to wear a skirt. This is embarrassing enough," he told her.

"Well, I have nothing else. You want to fix the car?" she asked.

"Of course I do," Eric.

She doesn't say anything else, she just holds out the stack of clothes. Eric hesitates before taking them from her.

"Good choice, now put on your panties and then I'll meet you in the bathroom," she said before pulling out a razor and a can of foam.

He looks at her with a blank expression but she ignores it and walks into the bathroom. He goes to his room and undresses and finds a pair of panties in the box. He shacks his head a few times before putting it on. Nervously and feeling naked he walks to the bathroom.

"He actually put on panties...I was joking," Becky thought trying to not smile too much.

She pats the side of the bathtub and he sits down.

"I'll do this for you the first time, but I will not be coming here to shave your legs all of the time," She told him as she lathered him up.

"And while I have sharp things, I'll take this opportunity to tell you that you will be wearing a bra as well," she half threatened.

She shaved off his hair and then had him add some cream to his legs. He was disturbed at how nice his legs felt to the touch. After that, Becky had him put on a bra and stuffed it for him. Not a lot, but enough that the blouse wouldn't sit weird on his chest. Next came that blouse and the skirt followed by some low heeled dress shoes.

"Wow...like...wow. Please don't take this the wrong way but-" she started to say.

"Don't you dare finish that sentence," he said, his face burning from embarrassment.

He kept trying to get comfortable the skirt had bunched up underneath him as he sat.

"Eric..." Becky started, giggling slightly "you have to smooth out the skirt before sitting"

"You keep telling me these like you expected me to know them." Eric complained, but lifted himself up and smoothing the skirt out so that it sat smoothly underneath him.

We're just lucky that conversation seemed to have slipped her mind when she first saw you.

Eric rolled his eyes, as they pulled into the parking lot.

"Alright... lets go..." Becky said getting out of the car, but Eric couldn't move... he was terrified, and Becky could tell.

"c'mon, you can do this... you look fine, great even..."

"That's the problem, I look like a girl... I can't go out in public like this"

"Never a skirt!" he moaned

"Ok fine, but that's only different because you're making it different, right now I think you'd rather people see you as a Ericka rather than as Eric in a skirt right, well they will and so there's no reason to be embarrassed. Come on out." Becky said taking his hand and giving him a bit of a pull.

The Pep talk didn't particularly help but Eric got up anyways.

One of the worst parts of the outfit was the low heels, there was nothing more decidedly girlish than hearing each footstep follow along with an audible click.

Once he got to work he was able to distract himself enough to almost forget how he was dressed. Until a couple of hours later he was cleaning up one of the stations, when Connie saw his hands.

"Oh Becky would you mind taking a short break to give your sister a Manicure, her nails could use some work"

Eric quietly groaned but was glad she couldn't see his toes or he'd end up with a pedicure as well.

A few minutes later Eric was sat down as Becky looked over his nails, filing them somewhat.

"Sorry, there's not a lot I can do since you're nails are short...

Eric sat there and endured yet another feminine item being a applied to him. This was insane. He pouted until she she was done, again unaware how cute the expression looked on his pretty face.

That didn't make himself feel any better as he hoped it would. In fact, it made it worse. How was he going to make it through this?

After his nails were done he was allowed to get back to work. Though he had been able to forget about his clothes before, the nails were a constant reminder of his girly look. He wondered if the nails were going to effect his stream...

"Shit!," he yelled in his head.

He was going to be wearing these things for a while. How was he going to hide them during the stream? Maybe if he just kept his hands out of sight...

And there was also a Note, which lucky for him he read silently before he would read it aloud.

"I love watching You stream, It's so refreshing to see a Girl who's confident and doesn't have to play up her Gender to get views, Keep Rocking it girlfriend.

Eric paused for a moment, realizing...

He just didn't have the heart to correct her and embarrass her in front of all these people. He figured, what is one more person that thinks he is a girl? If it made this one girl happy, he could live with it.

Of course everyone was on board with another full series. He just laughed to himself seeing the response.

This time the rpg system was expanded with a profession system. You could level up as a Teacher, Astronaut, Doctor, and a few other options and at any point you could start leveling up a different profession. He was surprised but the mechanics of the game were well done. This was actually a fun game even with the Barbe theme.

"Guys, even though It was fun playing the last one with you guys, I'm not ashamed to admit that this game is pretty good. I think we are going to enjoy this," he tells them.
