"So I already have the shoes done and I'm working on the headset. Keep your eyes out for a purple swimsuit," she tells him.

They rolled up to a goodwill store and headed inside. They looked around trying to find something that might work but they didn't find anything that was perfect. Elena explained that you get lucky sometimes but she mostly got what she needed online. It's always smart to check the local shops, though. She still ended up buying a one piece to use as practice for the eventual altering.

"I prefer to make test cuts to get an idea of how it might look on the final costume. You don't want to spend a lot of money on something doomed to fail," she explained.

"It totally makes sense. It sounds like it's expensive," he told her.

"It is but for me, its worth it," she said.

They spend time talking strategy and costumes. Eric really enjoyed hanging out, though he did wish he could have been Eric.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: I need to go shopping, I'm working on a Wid...

choices: Dressed in an enormous Reinhardt Armour
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
The drove around town stopping at Local thrift stores, not finding much to go with. Until Elena showed up pleased.

"Look what I found!" she held up some dark orange Leggings, and a long bright orange skirt.

"WidowMaker?" Eric asked not sure what the orange color would be for.

"What? oh no, of course not, but don't they seem perfect for a Mercy Cosplay."

"What for me... I'm not sure..." Eric said panicking

"Oh, no I wasn't trying to force you or anything, but its rare to see something so perfect, So If I ever want to put a Mercy Cosplay together I'll already be started for cheap." Elena said smiling, with her find going to ring it up.

Afterwards The two of them filed back into the car and started it up.

"Oh, You'd love my other Cosplays! Want to come over for a bit? My Roomate's out of town."

"Other Cosplays?" Eric asked.

"Of course, I said I was working on Widow-Maker, but I've been doing it for years."

"Wow" When had She become such a... geek... She seemed to stereotypical in high school... Or maybe she just acted that way in front of guys... that seemed like a distinct possibility now that he thought of it.

"I'd love to check them out." Eric said enthusiastically.

"Great! I love showing them off!" Elena said absolutely giddy with excitement.

Only a few minutes later they were pulling up to Elena's place.

"Sorry for the mess..." she said, though it really wasn't messy, just a bit cluttered in places, like any living room.

In Elena's room She pulled out a few different outfits, some OverWatch, some other games, or animes.

They chatted a while as Elena showed off her costumes, all almost entirely hand-made.

"Hey Do you work tomorrow?"

"What? oh uh no, only weekdays as Far as I know."

"Great me neither, so we can hang out all night If you want."

"Where do you work?"

"I'm Just a Barista at Starbucks, but I'm hoping I can make a career out of either just cosplaying or selling them"

It seemed The two of them were more Alike than Eric realized, She wanted to cosplay professionally and he wanted to Stream professionally.

"Oh, that reminds me, I wanted to show off my Best work, I wanna wear it to show it off in all its glory, Start up a game of OverWatch or something, I'll be back in 15 minutes.

Eric did so wondering what Cosplay she was so proud of, playing a few rounds of OverWatch while he waited, kicking off his heels as he did so, noting that he'd somehow avoided getting his toe nails painted somehow after everything else he'd been through.

Soon Enough Elena Returned
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Something Else.

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
"We shall prove ourselves in glorious combat!" Elena shouted.

Elena stepped in dressed as Reinhardt. She had somehow grown two feet taller and grew wider as well.

"Holy shit! That is amazing!" Eric said rushing over to her.

The costume was very detailed and Eric was dwarfed by it. Elena did a few poses before taking off the gloves and then the helmet.

"How did you make this?" Eric asked, still stunned.

"Over time and a lot of trial and error," she told him.

She explained the how she put everything together. She was basically on stilts to get the extra height and the gloved were extended. She holds onto a bar in the gloves to keep them in place.

"I still have a few tweaks to make but this is by far my favorite," she said proudly.

"I can see why. What else could you do?" he said in awe.

"For one, I want to hook up some LEDs for the glowing bits. I also want to rework the gloves. I want to figure out a way to get them to articulate," she told him.

"I'm super impressed. Seriously, I'm blown away," he said.

"I'm glad you like it," she said with a smile looking down at him.

She showed it off a little more before finally putting it away.

choices: Spend the day tomorrow with Elena
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
You play another round of Overwatch, As Elena takes off the Armor, stepping out of the boots seems to be difficult stepping down two feet out of the boots.

To Eric's surprise Elena wore nothing but a plain black bra and set of panties underneath the armor.

"It get's hot in there..." is all she said, before donning a long T-shirt and shorts.

"Hey, do you plan on staying over, like I said Roomate's out of town, and this place gets lonely."

It was hard to say no to this girl, she was so... Easy to be friends with... she seemed so different than years ago. "Sure... but I didn't bring anything to sleep in, should we head to my place really quick?"

"Nonsense, we're a similar size, Throw this on." she said tossing him a sort of night-dress thing."

"There aren't any other things like what you're wearing?" He asked pleadingly.

"Sorry, only got the two sets of PJs, I got the comfy set and the cute set, and I got dibs on the comfy ones." Eric couldn't help but laugh at elena's demeanor, she was terribly cute when she wanted to be.

He took the outfit to the bathroom letting Elena take over the game.

The night-gown as he decided it was, was semi-see through at parts, he was glad that it wasn't around his chest or Elena would be able to see his stuffed bra, which now he was glad he wore, had he tried to go braless he'd look very masculine in this thin sheer gown.

Returning slightly red-faced Elena only had kind words.

"I think you make that thing look better than I ever have... oh You've got plain nails... Let me return the favor for the pedicure earlier."

Eric tried to turn her down but Elena wouldn't have it.

"That's really alright, you payed the Salon, it was hardly a favor."

"Pretty please! I owe you for saving me from staying here all alone tonight"

Eric wanted to put his face in his hands... he couldn't believe he was agreeing, but he nodded his head.

"Sure go ahead."

Elena let him take over mid-game and began painting his toes, he got a bit absorbed into the game and when it was finished Elena had painted them hot pink and even apparently had time to adorn his big toes with little flower designs.

"Wow, That's really good" Eric said truthfully.

Eric was able to take his mind off of his new toe nails and the sheer dress he wore as He and Elena chatted for hours as the night became technically morning...

"You asleep?" He heard Elena say

"Wha? no... i don't think I was"

"Either way its probably time to get some shut eye, thanks for hanging out with me, I don't have a lot of geeky girl friends." she says shutting off the game and climbing into bed.

"Me neither, Eric replied truthfully, following Elena into her bed, too tired to think anything of it. and quickly falls asleep
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: They hang out all night

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
The light from outside danced over Eric's face from the cracks of the curtain urging him to wake up. He rolled over and brushed the sleep from his eyes and tried to clear his head from the post sleep fog. Elena was still asleep, her back to him. It had been a while since he shared a bed with a girl but it had never been like this. He stretched out his arms and yawned a little as he looked down at what he was wearing, and blushed. Never did he ever expect to be wearing anything like this to bed.

That wasn't the only thought to come to mind. One of his bra cups was completely flat. He realized that his packing job must have come loose as he slept. He lifted the blanket a little and felt around slowly, trying not to wake Elena as he searched for the missing toilet paper. He cold feel her start to stir as he started to panic. If she saw him as he was right then, she might start scrutinizing him. The last thing he needs is for her to realize that she invited a guy into her bed last night. He heard her yawn and begin to roll. His heart was in his throat as he finally found the missing toilet paper. He grabbed it and turned away from Elena just in time.

"Oh, did I wake you?" she asked.

"Guess so. Good morning," he said as he fixed his chest.

Elena got up and made the some coffee while Eric got changed back into the clothes he was wearing the night before. They picked up where they left of the night before and talked about everything and anything. Though they both wanted to keep hanging out, Eric had a stream planned. Once they were ready, Elena dropped Eric off at his apartment.

As Eric walked to his door, he was spotted by a local guy. The guy was walking his dogs and waved a good morning which Eric sheepishly waved back. He couldn't get into his apartment fast enough.

"God, I hope he thought I was a girl," he thought for the first time.

He hadn't thought about being spotted by neighbors until now. He never really talked to any of them but they knew a guy lived there. Fear hit him as he wondered if anyone else had seen him over the last few days.

He quickly stripped and got a shower. His makeup had smudged somewhat over night and he washed it all way but knew he was going to have to re apply it for the stream. He cleaned up and dried off then got dressed. He put on a pair of jeans and a blouse that he thought looked okay enough. The blouse's material was cut in a way that was supposed to help create a curved silhouette. It wasn't too bad, though, so it should be fine fore the stream. He redid his make up and tied back his hair and was ready for another night of gaming.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Stream Tomorrow

She found Eric's Stream name and shook her head at his name.... did he really not plan for this too happen "ErickaBoom"? It almost seemed deliberate, no wonder that girl made that mistake.

She watched Eric stream so Barbie game, he'd mentioned to her Yesterday morning how it had been sent to him as a joke but the fans seemed to like it, and Becky could sort of understand that, Eric was funny, doing the voices, just talking about nothing as her brother just played a video game.

"She...", "This Girl", "Her", "Ericka", "So Cute" That girl from before wasn't the only one making that mistake... in fact everyone that commented was... How did Eric not know... or maybe he did, he was playing a Barbie game after all, Had he lied to her about knowing they thought he was a girl...

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Becky closed the window not really knowing how to feel. Why would her brother lie to her like that? She felt insulted at first, thinking about how she had believed him when he told her that he didn't correct the girl out of the goodness of his heart.

"What a little weasel," she said out loud.

She was so flustered at his perceived behavior that she had to take a walk. After giving herself some time to think it over her mood softened. It was possible that he was intentionally being shady but a few things didn't add up. Why would he agree to the hair cut? She convinced him but he still agreed. Not to mention that he didn't tell Connie that he wanted it all cut off. No, instead he got a woman's hair cut that apparently very much looked like his favorite character. Still, he came back again and it would have all been gone if Connie wasn't there.

Becky was conflicted with this information. There was a small chance that he had told her the truth but was that seemed unlikely. Then a thought popped into her mind.

"What if he want's to be Ericka?" she pondered.

He had been easier to push than she expected. He even came to her for help with makeup. At work, he has been really learning how to a lot of things at the salon. Maybe he has been hiding this about himself? He has been a real natural.

She wondered if she should visit him and tell him that she knows. Then again, he might not take that well. Perhaps she should wait until he tells her?

After the walk she was still confused as to what Eric was up to.

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Becky sees Ericka "flirting" with some ...

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Eric started up the stream and sighed. The last couple weeks had been a pain in the ass but at least he had the stream. He could not wait for this all to be over but it looked like It wasn't going to be soon. He got the bill for his car and it was $200 more than he expected which meant more time stuck at the salon. At least his viewership when up since that was surely going to help.

Then there had been the matter of his sister. Becky was just loving humiliating him, it would seem. She always had this smug look every time she would pop over with something else he had to try or do. The "compliments" about how good he looked were getting old real fast. After she volunteered to sort through her old clothes for him, he swears there are less wearable items than there were before. He still can't believe he has been using the nightgown she found for him to wear to bed.

Eric didn't have to wait long before having an audience to play for. He relaxed as he played, happy to have the stream. Knowing that he was making progress on his dream kept him going strong. While getting ready to sign off, in a moment of seriousness, he turned to the camera and addressed the audience.

"Hey guys. I just want to thank you all for watching. The gifts and your support have been amazing and you guys mean a lot to me. Don't mean to get overly sentimental but you all mean a lot to me," he said.

CosplayGirl91: We love you Ericka! Your vids are the best!

Eric winced as he read her call him Ericka. He hoped this wasn't going to be the moment he lost a fan. But then he saw more comments follow that confused him at first.

"Ericka Boom is the best streamer out there right now."

"You are the funniest girl out there."

"You are as pretty as you are talented."

His confusion turned to panic as the messages kept coming. Over and over he read comments that mentioned that he was a girl and no one corrected them.

"Uh...goodnight," he said before quickly turning everything off.

He got up and paced the room, not believing what he read. How could this happen? How didn't he know?

He walked into the bathroom and really looked at himself and saw the girl he had been too blind to see looking back at him.

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Eric washed his face... attempted to put his hair flat parted down the middle like he used to, and stood in front of the mirror, not looking to see what he looked like, but trying to get an objective look at himself... in the mirror he saw... a... well someone who was dressed boy-ishly but looked to be a girl... even when he wasn't wearing makeup.

"Damnit damnit damnit... How long had he been missing this...

Then in a sudden terrible realization, he recalled his first subscriber and comment that one night almost two months ago

"You're good at this game, Cute too."

That guy hadn't been gay, he'd thought Eric was Ericka... his first subscriber thought he was a girl... which meant... everyone after that, or atleast most of them must've thought the same.

Eric collapsed into his chair and wanted to cry.

After Wallowing in self pity for a while he got up and went to bed.

============================================================================ ==========

The Next Morning. Eric needed to know, in an odd burst of Motivation he got up, showered, using the Salon Soap's and Shampoo's

He had to know what he'd been doing to himself, he had to see himself obvectively, He'd seen how Masculine he could look, now, as much as he was against it he had to see how much of a girl he could look like... He couldn't explain why he was doing it, other than devilish curiosity.

After drying his hair and using just a little of a curling Iron Becky decided that she didn't want anymore and Eric must need, he put a little curl in his hair giving it some lift and bounce. Next Makeup, then he picked out the dress he'd worn to work earlier that week.

First putting on his breast forms and bra, then the padded panties Becky had at some point brought over.

He'd never admit it, especially not to Becky but he hadn't minded wearing the dress, the material felt amazing against his skin, and it wasn't as short of low cut as some of the others.

After wards he stepped into heels and stood in front of the mirror, honestly shocked at seeing the person in the mirror.

"No wonder Becky always gives me a hard time..." Eric said to nobody... "It had literally taken less than twenty minutes and an outfit to transform him into a girl... an attractive one at that.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Eric Thinks things over.

"Then there would be no point in getting changed if, since you could have to put that dress back on at any moment, right?" she told him.

"Right..."Eric said walking into another trap.

He damned his morbid curiosity for dressing like this. He had to keep up the lie that he was going out so Becky wouldn't think he just dressed up on his own. Of course Becky had already seen through the lie but he didn't know that.

They pulled up to a store and parked the car. Eric hoped this would be over soon and made a point to tell Becky that he had to go home after this to wait for Elena. Any hope of picking up something for himself was dashed when he saw that it was a just women's fashions.

"Of course," he thought.

As he followed Becky around, she kept holding up to Eric things she thought would look cute on him. How was she not sick of this joke yet?

"So, what are you getting?" she asked.

"A headache," he told her.

She smiled but didn't push anymore. The real point of this trip was to get Ericka familiar with this store. It was a favorite of hers and she figured that once her sister was inside already, coming back would be less scary for her.

As they walked, Eric spotted something out of the corner of his eye. It was a purple-ish pink color and stood out in his mind. Becky wanted to try something on so she headed to the changing room which gave him time to investigate. His heels clacked loudly as he quickly minced to where he thought he saw the garment. He found it easily enough and pulled it out.

"Wow," he said out loud.

It was a one piece bathing suit and the color was perfect for widowmaker. He got out his phone and texted Elena.

"Did you buy anything for your widowmaker cosplay yet?" he asked.

"Not yet, why?" she texted back.

"I think I found something that would work,"

"Pics?" she asked.

He tried taking a picture but couldn't line it up. He held it up to his body like Becky had been doing to him earlier and took a selfie.

"That's perfect! Can you grab it for me. You look spectacular today, by the way," she told him.

"Sure," he said ignoring the comment about his looks.

"What did you find?" he heard Becky ask from behind.

Eric jumped not hearing her get so close and quickly pulled the one piece off his chest.

"Elena was looking for this, for her costume building. She makes costumes," he said quickly.

"So, you going to get it for her?" Becky asked in an odd tone.

"Yes," he said.

"Good. It's very nice," she said.

"It's not for me," he blurted out.

"I didn't say it was," she said walking off.

He followed her to go pay for the swimsuit.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: "Wanna go shopping? we've never gone as...

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
As he waited in line Elena texted back,

"Doing anything later? I could use some help on a cosplay."

"I'm free, happy to help"

"Need me to pick you up?"

"I can get a ride with Becky, see you in a few."

Eric finished and payed and went back to the car with Becky.

"Alright, I need to go To Elena's can you take me home so I..." Shit... he wanted to change before going over but he'd already said he was wearing this for the exact reason... "Never Mind can you just drop me off at Elena's?"

"Sure just show me where it is."

A few minutes later He was outside Elena's.

"See you on Monday,"

"Thanks for the ride."

He headed inside.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Elena wants to hang out

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Eric handed Elena the swimsuit and she took it with glee. It made him happy to see. She went to her purse and played him back for the item. Eric wouldn't have minded to just let her have it but he still couldn't afford it.

"So, what did you need help with exactly?" he asked her.

"I'm finishing some final touches on a Symmetra cosplay and I need someone to wear it. Lucky for us, we are about the same size," she said.

"Lucky us," he forced a smile.

She handed him a the dress she had made and he went into the bathroom to put it on. It was multiple pieces and he started with a modified unitard. He guessed that she had removed the legs and much of the sleeves herself. The fabric was tighter than anything he had ever put on at this point, hugging his middle and chest. It was...strange. Next was the outer dress. He carefully stepped into it and slid his arm into the sleeve.

He stepped out and she had him pose for her. She had a look of concentration on her face as she examined him. Eric suddenly felt nervous at the scrutiny but it he didn't need to worried. She was completely focused on the task at hand. Over the next hour, she pinned and pulled and cut while Eric played the part of her dressing doll. He actually didn't mind wearing the dress, as seeing Elena work was really interesting.

Once she was done, Eric put his own dress back on.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Elena needed someone to wear a costume while sh...

choices: Eric admits to the last few viewers that he's a guy.
Eric loses his nerve and just says "Bye" closing the stream.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Eric avoided streaming for a few days... He was, scared for lack of a better word, he wasn't sure what he should do,

"I've got to tell them... right..." he couldn't just keep letting people think he was a girl, he'd never be able to escape it, but when he told them... would they still subscribe... what if word spread, about the streamer who tricked all his viewers... He'd never be able to get any subscribers after something like that.

On the other hand, not telling them... he might continue to get new subs... but he could never let them know he was a guy, if it ever got out, without him saying it, people might even feel more betrayed.

It wasn't until nearly a week later, Friday night after a particularly exhausting day of work, He'd tried the waist Cincher Becky had brought over and had worn it under his dress, that along with a pair of heels that seemed to be a bit small left him phyically exhausted and sore by the end of the night.

he took off his dress and was about to take off his bra and panties... when he decided he really wanted to stream, he wanted to just sit back and play some Over Watch or even Finish off "Barbie's Big Girl on Campus" he kept the forms and underwear on, and put on a blouse and pair of padded jeans.

He touched up his makeup and sat down... He looked like a girl... and they thought he was a girl... but he couldn't keep doing this.

He started up the stream was pleased to see somehow over the week he'd gained subscribers... people must've been watching his archived streams... It made him feel really good, that people wanted to watch him.

Before long he got back into the groove and played an hour of Barbie before going over to Overwatch. He kept a closer eye on the chat, noticing for the first time live, all the use of feminine pronouns. But he'd gotten used to it over the past few weeks at the Salon or when out with Elena.

Nearing the end of the stream he did his sign off but left the stream running, watching the viewer number drop until it was getting lower and lower... If he was going to do it, he had to do it
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Eric's next time streaming

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
He almost didn't do it. He almost just signed off but he knew he had to do it.

"Hey, uh, guys? There is something I need to say," he said.

It took a a moment before he was able to find the words.

"I'm Eric. My name here is Eric KaBoom, not Ericka Boom," He looked at the 5 names in the chat but no one said anything.

"I didn't intend to deceive any of you. Things just got out of hand. I didn't realize that anyone thought I was a girl until last stream...it's why I haven't played in a while," he watched as the chat dropped to 3 names.

"I'm sorry if you feel like I've been lying but it was an accident," he said.

"But you are wearing makeup...how is that an accident?" someone asked.

"Someone said my face was washed out...I was going for, like, a stage makeup thing," he said as the list of names became 2.

"I'm still me! As soon as I can afford it, I'm going to be buying myself some more clothes and just off all this hair so there won't be any mix-ups," he said as the last name remained.

"Please. Please keep watching my stuff," he pleaded to the last name.

The name stayed a moment longer before leaving Eric by himself. Eric checked his subscribers and he saw the drop from what it was before. 5 people had unsubscribed

He shut down everything and went to bed but didn't sleep.

"What am I going to do?" he thought to himself.

His despair turned to anger as he tossed and turned.

"Screw'em. If they are only watching because they think I'm a girl, then they are the problem, not me," he said trying to find a way to make himself feel better.

It didn't help. He loved his fans and the anger felt empty. Eventually Eric fell asleep when exhaustion finally took him.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Eric admits to the last few viewers that he'...

choices: Eric decides to Stream completely femmed up.
Eric attempts to look like a guy to Stream.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Monday came soon enough and Eric, after showering, began getting dressed, annoyed at how routine it had gotten since a few weeks ago.

Nearly on autopilot he'd place the breast forms in the cups of his bra, then don his panties, then the padded panties on top of them, adjusting himself to best have a smooth front. then He'd pick an outfit, today, a medium length peasant skirt and purple top.

Afterwards he'd sit down to do his makeup, lately he'd been doing a bit more than his earlier subtle makeup meant to feminize, He'd learned new techniques working at the Salon and would subconsciously use them on himself.

He'd brush his hair, and used a claw clip to pin it back before using a barrette or two to clip his bangs back as well.

Eric looked at himself in the mirror.

"I'm getting to used to this... Well atleast I've almost saved up enough to fix the car and then I can get a hair cut..." Though he'd miss Elena... He'd have to find a way to run into her somehow and meet her again as a guy... He could really see himself dating her.

Soon enough Becky showed up, Eric slipped on a pair of low heels and went to work.

Today he began with cleaning and setting up, but before long he had an appointment, one gentleman that he'd cut hair for before asked for him again.

Eric cut the guys hair before work got busier, He even got to use something He'd learned how to do last week, apply highlights.

He was really nervous starting, terrified that he'd end up ruining this girl's hair, but after carefully foiling off the hair and letting it dry it came out looking amazing, The customer loved it and Eric was honestly incredibly proud of it.

The rest of the day went by well enough, he did some clean-up, Shadowed Becky as she did a Perm on an older customer, and before long he and Becky were heading home.

"You're really starting to take to this Eric."

"I'm still quitting when I've saved up enough" Becky could only roll her eyes.

"don't you think its not a bad idea to have some sort of Job... I mean a few weeks ago I was totally against the streaming thing... but now, honestly I kind of get it, you've got what, nearly 100 people that pay to watch you whenever you stream... You can actually make that work, and I'm the last person that would've said that, but until you can pay you're own rent with the Money you make What's wrong with having an actual job?"

Eric paused, Becky wasn't really wrong in any particular way, other than one.

"The Main problem is having to dress like this to do it!" he argued back.

"I saw how proud you looked of those highlights you did earlier" Becky said.

"So what? I've worked there for weeks, I'm getting good at it, that would happen anywhere." Eric sighed.

Becky was a bit saddened, she really only wanted the best for her Baby Sister, but Eric couldn't let up the charade that didn't enjoy this, so she let it drop for now. stopping front of Eric's place

"See you tomorrow."

"Yeah yeah, see you tomorrow." he said climbing out of the car
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Another Monday

choices: Becky was watching the Stream trying to think of something else to help Ericka
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Eric paced his room, ever so often looking at his computer. He wanted to stream but he didn't know what to do about how he should present himself. The memory of his confession replayed in his mind over and over again. The truth costed him five subscribers and that really hurt.

"Maybe I should just bite the bullet and tell them all?" he said to himself.

The problem was the money. Sooner than later he was going to have to start paying his own rent and the only skills he had at that point in his life was salon work and he did not want to have to keep going out in public as a girl. If he embraced pretending to be Ericka for the camera, then eventually he could quit the salon and never have to go out looking like a girl again.

"Is that right, though? Would it be wrong to lie like that? On the other hand if they are only watching because they think I'm a girl, that's not really okay," he told himself trying to figure out what the morally right thing to do was.

Eric felt unsure of himself as he sat down, still in the skirt and the purple top. He hesitated for a couple minutes before finally committing.

"Okay...lets do this," he said launching the Stream.

Quickly he had an audience and the first few comments were complements on his appearance, something that still really hard to take. He forced a smile and addressed them.

"You guys are sweet, thanks. I've been working at a salon and picked up a few things. I'd love to quit that eventually and do this kind of thing full time one day," he tells them.

He decided to mix it up and play something else. This time it was a survival game that had caught his eye. He made a new character and figured he might as well go all in and make a female named Ericka for his avatar.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Eric decides to Stream completely femmed up.

Becky Surprises Ericka with an impromptu Weekend Vacation.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Becky got a little alert that Eric was streaming, and decided to check it out, and to her surprise saw Eric still wearing his work clothes, an errant bra strap showing out of his top... H'e always claimed he was streaming as Eric and that girl had just made a mistake... well that settled that...

Eric was definitely streaming as Ericka Boom, not Eric Kaboom like she claimed.

It sort of hurt her feelings that she could be so open about herself and who she wanted to be with total strangers but not with her.

But maybe that was exactly why, maybe she was having a hard time "coming out" to someone she grew up with, someone she had known for so long as a boy, she felt a bit guilty for being mad at her, she really needs to be there for her Baby Sister in these probably very stressful times.

Becky watched a few more minutes as Ericka began playing some game where he played a female character named Ericka as she crafted supplies to survive.

She turned it off and went to bed.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Becky was watching the Stream trying to think o...

choices: Skip to Eric's trip the spa
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
The next morning, Becky quickly swung by somewhere on the way to pick Eric up for work. He had put together his own outfit, since Becky was running slightly behind, and it was a pretty decent outfit, another one of the dresses, this one striped, and a pair of low heels. His hair was styled the same as he had been doing lately.

Eric climbed into the car, smoothing the skirt as he sat.

"Good morning..." Becky said. "Looking nice today, aren't we?"

"I uh... ran out of the other stuff." Eric said.

"No need to explain yourself to me. I get it." Becky said.

"Can we just get to work?" Eric asked.

"Before that, I wanted to give you this." Becky handed an envelope to Eric.

After a few moments of fumbling with the envelope because of his nails, he pried it open and pulled out a slip of paper.

"A gift certificate for... a spa day?" Eric asked.

"Between the streaming, ,and working and hanging out Elena, you've been running yourself ragged. You need some relaxation time, and when I'm stressed, I like to do a spa day." Becky said.

"Yeah but... like this?" Eric asked.

"A spa day is relaxing regardless of what you wear." Becky said. "Trust me."

Becky hoped he took that to heart and would trust her in the future. She only wanted what was best for her sister, after all.

"Thank you." Eric said. "It was a very thoughtful gift."

"I try..." Becky laughed as she started driving.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Becky buys something Nice for her Sister

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Friday couldn't come soon enough for Eric but finally it had arrived. He was looking forward to getting home and relaxing. As they started closing up, he spotted Elena coming into the shop carrying as suitcase.

"Hey!" she said to Eric with a big smile.

"Hey, whats up?" he asked.

"Becky didn't tell you yet?" she said with a smirk.

"...tell me what?" he said with suspicion.

"Well, she called me a few nights ago and asked if I was up for a beach trip. She and I rented a place for the weekend," she grinned.

"Oh, cool. She didn't tell me but it sounds fun. I hope you guys enjoy it," He told her.

Eric was a tiny bit hurt that he wasn't going but a much bigger part of him understood that it wouldn't be possible. If he went, he would have to play along with the Ericka act since Elena would be there. Just as he finished rationalizing the situation and squishing his slight errant emotions, he felt Becky pull him in for a hug from behind.

"You girls ready for some sun and fun?" she said giving Eric a squeeze.

"I am, we were just talking about it," Elena said to Becky.

"Wait..." Eric said trying to catch up with what Becky said.

"Yep! That's right, baby sister, we are treating you," she said with another squeeze.

"Hold on, I'm coming?" he asked confused.

"Totally," Elena grinned.

"Let's get going," Becky said leading them both to the car.

"You...you should have asked me first," Eric stammered.

"If I did, you never would have agreed. I just wanted to do something nice for you," Becky told him.

"Of course I wouldn't have agreed!" he screamed in his head.

Becky helped get Elena packed into the car and soon they were off.

"I didn't pack anything..." Eric mumbled.

"Don't worry, I packed for two," Becky said squeezing his hand.

"Why has she gotten so touchy-feely recently?" he wondered.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Becky Surprises Ericka with an impromptu Weeken...

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Once they'd arrived Becky and Elena, wanted to check out the boardwalk, and began getting changed, just in case they wanted to go in the water.

"I brought you a suit too Ericka."

"Oh! uh, thanks..." He responded before pulling her close as she offered the white and blue one piece "I can't wear that!" he whisper yelled at her."

"I know I know, but trust me, I made sure to buy one specifically for you in mind... You can't not change we're at the beach... and we might not even swim, you can wear clothes over it."

Eric wouldn't argue further because Elena asked what they were whispering about.

Eric took it to a private area to change, and began looking it over while undressing, Becky was right... she'd bought something that appeared perfect for his situation... He'd still much rather be wearing a pair of board shorts, but as for girl's suits this was probably his best option.

Becky had changed already and was nervously waiting for Ericka, she hoped she looked ok in it, she was sure Ericka must be extra nervous.

She'd asked a saleswoman what would be the best. apparently the stripey pattern helped give the illusion of an hourglass body shape, white the padded crotch area and breast area gave helped with and bulges or flatness, and it even had just a little skirt at the bottom.

Eric finished putting it on feeling completely humiliated, atleast he could wear something over this.

Becky had packed him a pair of pink gym shorts he put on over it, along with a lightweight floral top.

He examined himself closely in the mirror, nervously but decided he looked good enough, and came out of the bathroom.

Becky was so proud of her little sister and gave her a hug

And with that the three of them headed out on the boardwalk, all wore Flip flops as well.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: changing for a night on the boardwalk.

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
"Before we do anything, I'm pretty hungry. You lady's up for some dinner?" Elena asked.

"Sounds good to me," Eric said as his stomach rumbled.

They walked along the boardwalk looking for a place that looked good and quickly came to a fairly sizable looking restaurant. They walked in and were seated. Their waitress walked up to them and Eric could tell that she wasn't experienced in the heels she was wearing. He hadn't had to wear heels as tall as high as the ones she was wearing and he was thankful for that. Her uniform was kind of skimpy and the the neckline was kind of low.

"She wears it well," he thought to himself.

"Hello, My name is Tina and I'll be your waitress for the night," she said in an uncertain voice.

The girl was obviously new to this but the look was cute on her. They each placed the other two placed their orders and Eric just finished placing his when Tina stopped him.

"Is your name Ericka?" the waitress asked out of the blue.

They all looked at each other in confusion before Eric responded.

"Uh, yeah..." Eric cautiously said.

"Are you Erica Boom?" she asked getting a little excited.

"...yes," he said forcing a smile trying not to look at Becky.

"Wow! I've seen your videos! I'm a subscriber," she told him.

"Oh, thank you for watching. That's great," Eric said with a genuine smile this time.

"I'll go get your order together and be right back," she smiled.

As the girl walked back to the kitchen, Eric turn back to the other two.

"Oh my god. That's amazing, Ericka!" Becky said.

He couldn't figure out Becky's reaction. She was definitely excited that they met a fan but it was a fan that thought he was Ericka Boom. Was she planning to make fun of him because apparently a second fan was confused, too?

"So, I need an explanation," Elena said with a grin.

"Ericka never told you?" Becky asked in what sounded like honest surprise.

"Tell me what?" she said looking at Eric.

"She is a big online star," Becky said proudly.

Eric didn't know what was going on. As far as Becky knew, he streamed as Eric so why was she telling Elena? He saw the joy in Becky and had to conclude that she had gotten carried away.

"I'm not a big star. I just have a few people subscribed. They watch me play video games," Eric said.

"That's so cool, Ericka. Why didn't you say anything?" she asked.

"She is too humble for that. She probably didn't want to brag," Becky said reaching over and squeezed Eric's hand.

"Well I have got to see this now," Elena told him.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Getting Dinner.

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
Tina came by a few more times always seemingly star struck, which really impressed both Elena and Becky...

"Seriously, I've only got like 100 subscribers... this happening was like a 1 in a million." he reassured them.

Dinner was great, and Tina even comped them a dessert to share.

Becky payed and they got up to leave.

It was beginning to get dark... and they were walking down the boardwalk away from the Hotel to Eric's dismay, he just wanted to go home and get out of this bathing suit... it wasn't entirely comfortable.

Elena and Becky dragged him into a surfshop and wanted to try on light beach dresses.

Eric got 'convinced' to try on a pink and green, light dress with palm trees on it, and with the other two wore them out of the store.

"Well it's probably our last chance today if we want to go to the beach... though there is a pool back at the Hotel...
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: After dinner

choices: The girls get some company at the pool
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
"Lets head back to the hotel," Eric said and they agreed.
There was no way he wanted to be seen any more than he had to be so the pool sounded like his best option. The light dress tickled his legs as he walked. It was kind of nice, in a way. He wasn't going to tell Becky that, though. She obviously doesn't need to be encouraged.

They headed back to their room to drop off their clothes and pick up some towels. While Elena got ready, Eric pulled Becky to the side.

"I'm going to stay here," he said.

"What? Why?" she asked.

"Come on, you know why," he said.

"You'll be fine. You look great in the suit, everyone sees a pretty girl when they see you," she comforted him.

"That's not what I want them to see," he explained.

Suddenly Becky was hugging him again, much to his own confusion. So, he didn't hate the affection but it was just new.

"I want you to come down with me. I'm so proud of you and I love you. Come down and swim with me," she said in a serious tone, still hugging Eric.

"...Okay...I love you too," he said still in shock.

He began to worry but this time not about himself. Was there something wrong with Becky?
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Back to the Hotel.

choices: Play around in the pool for a while
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
She had been acting weird the past few days... and then this whole vacation... It was like she wanted to spend as much time as possible with him... what had changed since a few days ago?

He couldn't think of anything... maybe she had something secret...

For a split second paranoia got the best of him... Maybe she was dying? Ok... that was probably a bit unlikely...

"OK maybe it was nothing... maybe there was something... either way Becky obviously was trying really hard to spend more time with him, he should atleast be a little grateful, He'd been a bit resentful so far this trip, he could at least try a little harder... the One Piece she'd picked out did actually do a good job of hiding his masculinity.

"Alright, lets go to the pool." he said grabbing a towel and following Elena and Becky Downstairs.

On the pool deck the three of them stripped off their dresses, Elena quickly hopped into the pool... Eric hesitated.

"Aren't you going in?"

"I... am... its just cold, give me a min-" Becky pushed him in.

"OOOhh" Eric gasped coming up for breathe. The water was cold after all, but before he could even get a breathe, Becky had canonballed next to him.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Eric worries about Becky

choices: Getting ready for bed and planning the next day.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
After a little time to get used to the water, Eric was able to relax. Luckily it was only the three of them, much to Eric's relief. He wasn't very keen on having anyone seeing him like this though the question in his mind at that point was "why not?".

He wasn't about to claim that he was liking being Ericka but his fear of people seeing Ericka was starting to feel hollow. The bathing suit was no different than the skirts and dresses he has been wearing more and more so, by that reasoning, this wasn't a big deal.

He splashed around and laughed it up with the rest of them, which made Becky smile. He dove down touching the bottom of the pool and shot back up, did lapse, and just some general horsing around.

Slicking he hear back did cause him some sudden anxiety as he looked at Becky. He was suddenly afraid again that with his hair back like that, Elena was surely going to tell that he was a guy. Becky must have knew what he was thinking. She swam over and whispered to him.

"Don't worry, you still look good," she told him.

He sighed and smiled before being dunked by his sister who laughed evilly. Eric soon surfaced and Becky was soon dunked as well. Not wanting to be left out, Elena soon joined the struggle.
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Play around in the pool for a while

1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.content:
The girls stayed in the pool for about an hour or so before getting out and drying off.

"cold cold cold." Elena complained shivering, as they ran back up to the room.

Elena called Dibs on using the hairdryer first so Eric and Becky had a few minutes to themselves.

"Thanks." Eric said.

"for what?" Becky asked confused.

"For dragging me out here... I've been kind of a shut in for a while now, and the pool was fun."

"Aww, i'm glad you're having fun, It has been a long time since we were on a Vacation together, probably when I was in High school while you were in Elementary school, It's been nice hanging out with you as an Adult, You know as Sisters."

Eric decided against griping about being called her sister in Private this time, not wanting to Ruin the Moment.

"Thanks... I've been enjoying spending more time with you too."

Before any more bonding could happen Elena finished drying her hair and returned to the room.

"Bathroom's Free she said in just a bra and panties, Eric averted his eyes embarrassed and took the bathroom next.

He spent a few minutes with the hairdryer while brushing his hair out... Man it had really gotten long, The 'Haircut' He'd gotten a few weeks ago hadn't shortened it much and it seemed to be much longer since then.

After getting his hair dried he returned to find the other two in matching nightgowns of similar color.

"Elena brought them aren't they cute?"

"Oh yeah... cute thanks..." he said taking the yellow one Elena offered him.

Becky went to dry her hair and Elena offered some suggestions for Tomorrow.

"We can get Henna Tattoos tomorrow, and we should definitely spend a few hours at the beach, you know... work on our tans, we're both totally pale. Too much overwatch."

Eric laughed, while he wasn't completely into the idea of tanning on the beach he couldn't deny that he was fairly pale, He agreed against his better judgement while slipping into the Nightgown.

Becly returned quickly.

"Did I hear talk of tanning? I'm so in! Though I only brought Ericka a one Piece... We'll need to get her a Bikini." Becky gave Eric a look as if to say, "We'll figure something out"
1553322222222221121211211121112112121111.title: Getting ready for bed and planning the next day.
