Kyle thought for just a second.... he’d been invited up to a girl’s room! How on earth could he pass this opportunity up?

The girls gathered their belongings and set them just inside the patio doors.grabbing only their phones, as they ran upstairs to Melissa’s room. Kyle was watching (and enjoying) the view as he came up behind them with his phone as well.

Melissa’s room wasn’t overly girly, at least not to Kyle. Tan walls, some band posters up, not all of them boy bands, either. A rather unremarkable twin bed sat in the corner of the room. A dresser, a vanity strewn with all kinds of makeup and hair products, a full length mirror, some book shelves, and what Kyle guessed was a closet door completed the room. Robin pulled her phone out and put on some pop music. Kyle watched as she began to gyrate to the music.

“God, I love this song,” Robin said, dancing in her bikini.

The discomfort in his bikini bottoms made Kyle look away. He studied Melissa’s book shelves, for a bit. When he glanced back towards Robin, Melissa was standing topless, as she got into a drawer and grabbed a bra. He swallowed hard watching her change into a matching bra and panty set.

Melissa caught him staring at her and smiled wickedly. “Are you gay, Kylie?”

Startled at being called out, and without really thinking about it, Kyle stammered, “No! Of course not!” He then silently cursed himself for not copping to being a lesbian...

“I’m sure Rob will be glad to know that,” Melissa said, laughing, as she pulled a tight tee shirt on.

Kyle was fuming. He couldn’t look at the hot girls as they danced and changed, so he went back to looking at Melissa’s bookshelf to distract himself.

He found some yearbooks and pulled them out, starting to flip through them. Apparently, Melissa attended the school her mother was in charge of admissions for. Of course, that made sense. Melissa probably got a free ride there.

He started reading some of the things other girls had written in the yearbook. Simple things like “have a great summer!” To longer essays about things that happened in the school year. He felt a hand on his shoulder.

“Oh! Yeah! That’s last year’s yearbook,” Melissa said, peering over Kyle’s shoulder. “Here.”

She took the book from Kyle, who was only semi relieved to see she was now in some short denim shorts to go with her tight tee. She started flipping through it.

Darla and Robin came over as Melissa started pointing out who was a bitch and who she was friendly with, which teachers were awful, and which ones were nice. And most of the nuns at the school were mean, according to Melissa.

Kyle tuned out the droning, just looking at all the teenage beauties in their almost fetish-like school girl uniforms. “Wow,” he said softly, “Do you guys all have to wear the uniforms?” He started feeling discomfort again as he thought of Melissa bouncing around in her school girl outfit.

“Yeah,” Melissa said, kind of sadly. “It sucks. Darla and Robin go to public school and get to wear whatever they want.”

“Well, ALMOST whatever,” Darla said with a laugh. “Robin did get sent home because her skirt was too short!”

“My fingertips were just past the hem!” Robin said defensively. “It should have been OK!”

“Must be nice to attend that school,” Kyle said, thinking of all the girls in their uniforms. “I mean,” he said, catching himself from falling into another trap. “I mean, I guess you go for free cause of your mom, and I imagine it’s a better preparation for college.”

“Hey!” Darla said, giving Kyle’s shoulder a nudge. “Public schools aren’t all bad! Do you attend a private girls school?”

“Me? No,” Kyle said. “But that may be kinda fun.”

“Don’t let Mom hear that,” Melissa said. She’s always looking for good candidates.”

“And by ‘good’ she means ‘girls with wealthy parents’.” Robin said.

“Truth,” said Melissa with a laugh.

She put away the yearbook and the girls sat around the bedroom, playing music and talking about everything.

Eventually, Kyle looked at his phone. It was getting late.

“I should get going,” he said, honestly kind of enjoying the time with the girls just hanging out.

“You could sleep over...” Melissa said

1553322222222222121111112122212121111111.content:
Kyle ran into Sam’s room, his bare feet slapping on the floor. “Tell me you’ve got this thing worked out!”

Sam was hunched over his laptop, looking at a command prompt. Lines of code were on the screen.

“Well, not exactly,” Sam said, not really looking up. “MARCI’s subroutines are pretty well protected. And it looks like there are a lot of traps in place that could really screw things up if they’re not dealt with correctly. But...”

Kyle smiled widely. “But? That’s a good but, right?”

“I don’t know yet. I mean, I found out that MARCI is a lot more advanced than I originally thought. It’s got a lot of subroutines. She.... it has an adaptive AI. And there seems to be some pretty advanced things going on behind the scenes. She... it,” he corrected himself again, “It seems like it has some fabrication technology. This house is a lot bigger than it looks. There’s a fair amount of space carved out below ground.”

Kyle slumped. “So I’m stuck like this?”

Sam sighed. “At least for another day. I’m sorry!”

Acting much like the teenage girl he appeared to be, Kyle threw his towel down on the floor and stormed off to his room. He flopped onto the bed.

“Do you wish to get ready for bed, mistress?” MARCI asked.

“No. I wish to....” he caught himself before he said anything that crazy machine might take as a command.

He thought for a bit, and asked, very slowly, “MARCI?”

“Yes, mistress?”

“If... I needed... wanted...to hide my... growth... TEMPORARILY,” Kyle emphasized that word, “would that be possible?”

MARCI was silent for a second. “Perhaps, mistress. However, scans must be made.”

Arms came out, hoisting Kyle into the air, holding him under his armpits. More arms extended and undressed him. Still suspended, another nozzle came out and sprayed solvent onto his crotch, allowing his trapped member to flop down. He sighed with relief at that.

An arm with a laser scanner came out. With Kyle still suspended, a red line moved up and down his crotch. He was turned to a different angle, and the scan repeated. Again he was turned, and the scanning continued. After several minutes of being turned and scanned, the now naked Kyle was gently set down on the floor.

“Measurements taken, mistress,” MARCi said. “I shall see what I can fabricate.”

“I need it for tomorrow,” Kyle said, quietly.

“Understood, mistress. Would you like to be prepared for bed?”

Kyle suddenly realized he really was exhausted. And sleep sounded pretty good.

Not relishing what he knew was going to happen, he cringed as he said, “Yes.”

Arms came out and carried him into the bedroom. His hair was brushed out and put into a high pony tail. His makeup was removed. A pink nightie was put on, and matching panties were pulled up his legs. He was dropped gently back into the bedroom, where he walked over to the vanity and looked at himself in the mirror. He looked like a girl, without makeup, getting ready for bed.

He flopped back onto the bed, sighing deeply. He wasn’t looking forward to the gym tomorrow. Sam really needed to get him out of this mess.

MARCI interrupted his thoughts. “Goodnight, mistress.” And the lights went out, leaving Kyle to drift off to a fitful night’s sleep.

Again he was lifted into the air. He had had enough and began kicking as MARCI tried to pull a hot pink thong up his legs.

More arms appeared, holding Kyle helpless as the thong was hiked into place, followed rapidly by tight yoga pants. Short socks and workout shoes were quickly placed on his feet.

"I thought we were going to the gym..." Kyle said.

Darla and Robin had predictable choices, an Iced Caramel Macchiato and an Iced Skinny Mocha respectively.

"Just a large coffee with cream and two sugars, please." Kyle replied.

Kyle just shrugged as Melissa hopped out of the car and ran into the coffee shop. Robin immediately undid her seatbelt and turned backwards towards Kyle.

"I dunno. MARCI's in charge of all that stuff, I'm just along for the ride." Kyle shrugged. "I don't usually dress like this."

Kyle missed Darla and Robin sharing a look before Melissa returned with the coffees. She handed Darla and Robin their's before handing a cup to Kyle. He immediately knew something was wrong, since his drink was cold instead of hot. And it was in the wrong type of cup.

"What's this?" Kyle asked. "This isn't what I said."

Robin pulled the car back onto the road and Kyle slumped back, defeated. Idly, he took a sip of the drink and grimaced. Skim milk... again. Even when MARCI isn't in charge, he's still on a diet. But the drink wasn't that bad. The girls continued to chat over their coffees as the car finally pulled into the parking lot of the gym.

1553322222222222121111112122212121111111.content:
With the radio blaring as usual, the car full of girls pulled into the gym’s parking lot. The three real girls jumped out. Kyle got out slowly, grabbing his bag as he did, certain that this was going to be his death sentence.

Robin held the door open for him, waiting for him to enter. “Come on, Kylie!” She shouted. “Let’s go!”

Kyle felt doomed as he crossed the threshold of the gym. There was a desk and a small waiting area. Behind that was a glass wall with various workout equipment being used. Darla called Kylie over to the desk to sign in. She was already mid-discussion with the attendant.

“So she’ll be using my guest pass for the day,” Darla said, smiling broadly at Kyle.

“Will she want a tour?” The attendant asked.

“Nah,” Darla said. “We can show her around. What’s your membership fee?”

Kyle’s eyes went wide as the girls were apparently thinking that he may want to join this gym.

“It’s twenty-five dollars a month. Would she like an application?” The attendant reached below the counter and pulled out a clipboard with a form and a pen on it.

“No!” Kyle said quickly. He then realized that he needed to downplay that remark, so he quickly added, “Let me see what it’s like here first.”

“Ok, that’s fine,” The attendant said, returning the clipboard to underneath the counter. “Just sign here,” she pointed to a sign in sheet.

Kyle picked up the pen and realized that his new manicure prevented him from holding a pen in his normal way. He shifted his position and signed in as Kylie.

Darla and Robin each hooked an arm through his and started leading him to what he thought was his doom, the ladies locker room.

He held his breath as they entered, waiting to be called out as a pervert or screams of a man being in the ladies locker room, but none came.

The girls put there things in lockers and locked it with padlocks. Kyle opened his bag to see a change of clothing, his stupid pink phone, some makeup, and a keyed padlock with a key on a chain. Stupid MARCI thought of everything.

He stashed his stuff in a locker, snapped the padlock shut, and put the key around his neck, as he didn’t have any pockets or anywhere else to put it. He felt like it drew way too much attention to his chest. He thought about putting it under his sports bra top, but the chain was too long. So he just left it dangle like it was a high fashion necklace.

The girls led him around, showing him places that he hoped he’d never have to visit again, the pool, the weight room, the equipment room... there was a yoga studio, “We should all definitely sign up for a yoga class!” Melissa said cheerily as they showed Kylie around.

They eventually made it to the spinning class, and it was quickly filling up with women. The four girls, well, three girls and Kyle, managed to get four bikes next to each other, with Kyle at the end of a row, next to Robin.

A guy walked into the class at that point and took the bike in front of the class. Kyle reluctantly hopped up on his bike and immediately noted that his trapped member was going to get smashed by the design of the bike seat. It wasn’t painful, but it really was uncomfortable.

He shifted nervously on his seat as the instructor began class. Kyle found that if he stood up slightly on the bike, he could keep his trapped member from being crushed. As the class went on, the instructor kept commenting on, “Form and position, ladies!”

It wasn’t long into the class when the instructor got off his bike and walked over to Kyle. “You’re new, aren’t you?” Kyle was pedaling rapidly, and wasn’t sure how to respond. Robin decided to answer for him.

“She’s new, and she’ll be joining here soon. Her name’s Kylie!”

“Keep peddling ladies!” The teacher called out. “Well, Kylie, it’s a pleasure to meet you, I’m Tom. And you’re not going to get the full impact of the workout with that position.”

He put his hand on Kyle’s shoulder and gently pushed him down into a seated position. With every rotation of the pedals, Kyle’s trapped junk was getting crushed. Hit bit his lip and nodded.

“Now,” Tom said, placing a hand on Kyle’s back. “Keep your back straight, OK?”

Kyle simply nodded, closing his eyes, trying to both ignore having a man’s hand on his back as much as trying to get through this class as quickly as he could.

Tom returned to the front of the class, leading the women through the workout. Every time Kyle tried to shift position a little, Tom would eaither call out, “Keep your form, Kylie!” Or he’s jump off his bike and move Kyle into the proper position. The workout was intense, and Kyle could feel himself using muscles he hadn’t in a while. He was going to be sore tomorrow.

The class finally ended, and Kyle was so happy to get off that bike. His legs felt like jelly and his crotch was happy to be off that seat. He was thrown a towel by Melissa, and she hip checked him, saying, “So did we nail it? Isn’t Tom hot?”

“Uh... yeah,” Kyle said as Tom game walking back to the group of girls.

“So, what did you think of your first class, Kylie?”

“Um... It was OK?” Kyle said, really unsure of how to answer, but not wanting to commit to anything regarding this nightmare of a gym.

“Well, I hope you decide to become a member here. I’d love to see you again in my class!” Tom said. “Now if you’ll excuse me, ladies, I need some water and some rest before my next class. It was a pleasure meeting you, Kylie!” Tom grabbed a towel, began wiping the sweat off his face, and left the class.

When he was gone, Robin squealed, “KYLIE!! He is so into you! He wants you in class!”

Kyle shook his head. “Don’t be silly. He’s just trying to increase membership here.”

“Then it’s settled,” Darla said decisively. “He likes you and you’ll join here.”

“Wait! What?” Kyle said, fearing he’d become ensnared further in this feminine persona.

“Kylie’s got a boyfriend!” Melissa and Robin began teasing him.

“C’mon,” Darla said. “Let’s get cleaned up and gorgeous and get on with the day.”

The trio led Kyle to what he dreaded. The showers.

Kylie was shaking his head, mouthing “No” but Darla held up the finger again.

“Great,”. Julie said. “Kylie’s man won’t stand a chance. We’ll see the four of you Wednesday at 10 AM.”

“Perfect!” Darla said. “See you then! Bye!”

“Bye”

Darla clucked off the phone.

Though Kyle didn't particularly want to learn. In fact, anything he learned over this summer was never going to be relevant to him ever again. Even sooner if Sam can manage to get MARCI to cooperate.

"She'll have the spinach and kale salad with the balsamic glaze." Darla said. As if anticipating your dissension, she said, under her breath, "Trust me, you don't want to eat heavy after our workouts."

Kyle wasn't happy about it, but he was too hungry to argue with Darla. The girls were quick to discussing all their plans for the forthcoming party, and their plans for Kylie, ensuring that she'd have a wealth of stories to tell at summer's end.

The salad wasn't half bad, and Kyle remarked as such, causing a ping from the phone, with Kyle knowing that he'd be having that salad an awful lot over the coming summer.

Once they were back in the car, heading towards home, Melissa remarked:

"Since we did the gym and shopping, I think it's time to..."

"I'd love to, but the girls are expecting me." Kyle said, for the first time hoping that they'd come to his rescue.

"Nonsense, they'll understand if you're a little late." Theresa grabbed Kyle's arm and dragged him into the living room.

Theresa walked over to a shelf and grabbed a book off of it, before settling Kyle in one corner of the room.

"Okay, shoulders straight, chin up, chest out." Theresa started adjusting Kyle's posture, moving him into her preferred position. "Okay, now go from heel to toe across the room."

Kyle started to take hesitant steps, nearly tripping a few times as he made his way across the room.

"No, no, no!" Theresa exclaimed as she rushed over to Kyle. "Follow after me."

Theresa, who Kyle noticed was also wearing heels despite being at home, walked across the room flawlessly, moving her body in such a way that Kyle was entranced by each time she moved her legs in front of each other.

"You want to take small steps, dainty steps, and keep your arms at your sides." Theresa adjusted Kyle again. "And don't look down. Look straight. Now, go."

Using her pointers, Kyle started to walk across the room, and managed to walk much more smoothly than he had previously done, though he wished he wasn't shaking his ass while he strutted through the living room.

"Magnificent! I knew you had it in you!" Theresa exclaimed. "We didn't even need the book!"

Theresa mockingly placed the book on Kyle's head, before taking it off.

"I thought that was only in movies." Kyle laughed.

"I only ever use it for the most extreme cases, but you're picking it up much faster than I anticipated." Theresa said. "You're a natural."

While it didn't feel good to be walking in the heels, Kyle did appreciate that someone thought that he was doing something right. All he got from MARCI and the girls has been critique after critique. After "Kylie" crossed the room a few more times:

Melissa walked by the living room on her way to the kitchen and did a double take, seeing her mother working with Kylie, who was looking great! She even had her party shoes on!

Her mom was teaching Kylie the finer points of walking in heels. And as much as Kylie had improved, Melissa didn’t want her to turn into one of mom’s projects.

“Mom!” She interrupted. “We’ve been waiting on Kylie! She’s not one of your students!”

Theresa smiled. “Not yet, but perhaps she will be. Have you ever thought about attending a finishing school, Kylie? We could polish all the rough edges off of you while preparing you to face the world!”

“Um... “ Kyle searched for something to say. “I’m only here for the summer, remember? And I’m not sure my family could afford something like that anyway.”

“We do offer scholarships! Tell you what, I’ll just get you some brochures, an application, and some financial aid forms, just in case you decide otherwise, dear. No pressure, but at least you’ll have them!

“And remember, shoulders straight, chin up, chest out! Exude confidence!”

Melissa grabbed Kylie’s arm. “C’mon, we have tanning to do.” She led him out into the backyard.

Theresa’s little class did a good job of helping Kyle walk in those heels. He strutted over to where the girls were and assumed his sunbathing position. The girls were pouring over fashion magazines: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Allure. Kyle was quickly drawn into reading the magazines. Of course his phone buzzed when the girls said he should read these regularly, as much for the sex tips as for fashion and beauty advice.

Kyle glanced over to see the boys back playing their video games. His anger rose when he saw Sam in there with them. He stood up. “Excuse me, ladies, but I have to go talk to my brother for a second.”

“Hurry back!” Darla said. “We’ll wait to take this month’s Cosmo Quiz with you”

Kyle strode on his heels into the game room, and the boys looked up and stared. To them, this back lit blonde goddess had entered their room. They forgot about the game for a second, with their characters dying horrible deaths.

“Sam?” Kyle said in a sweet but angry tone.

Sam peeked our from behind Eli, as he was seated in the couch away from Kylie. He knew he was in trouble with his feminized brother, but he had other things he was concerned about now.

“Before you get mad, let me.... introduce you to someone. Kylie, this is Eli’s cousin, Kim”.

Kim was seated at the far end of the couch, hidden behind the mass of boys. She was a girly, skater chick type. Ripped tights, dark lipstick, short spiky hair. But she was cute, not Kyle’s type, but cute. And then Kyle understood. Sam liked her.

Kyle cocked a hip, crossed his arms over his pushed up chest and said, “Sam, a word?”

Kim snorted. “Easy princess. Don’t get your panties in a wad. Sam can talk to you once we finish playing.”

Kyle already didn’t like her.

“Don’t princess me,” Kyle snapped. “I need to talk to my brother. NOW.”

“Unclench, bitch!” Kim started.

Eli stood up. “Ladies! Kylie, I’ll bring Sam out when he’s done with his turn. Kim, be nice to Kylie!”

“Whatever,” Kim mumbled.

Frustrated, Kyle clenched his fists at his side and stomped a foot, something he realized was very feminine. He spun and stormed off, gracefully back to the girls.

“I see you’ve met Eli’s cousin,” Melissa said.

Kyle sat down on his towel, hugging his knees to his chest. “It’s not just me, is it? She’s...”

“Mean?” Darla offered.

“Angry,” Melissa said.

“Unfashionable,” Robin added with a laugh.

Eli slipped out of the sliding door of the game room and walked sheepishly over.

“I’m sorry about that Kylie,” he said. “She likes to make sure she’s noticed when meeting a pretty girl.”

Kyke’s head shot up, his eyes wide. Pretty?

“Look, how about I make it up to you? Let me...”

Theresa then announced to the girls that she had iced tea, and the sunbathers all retreated to the patio. Sam shook his head and headed back inside for the last round of video games.

“Is something wrong?” Melissa asked Kyle, her face etched with concern.

“Seriously, Kylie,” Robin added. “If one of my girls has a problem, we ALL have a problem.” She winked at Kyle.

“No... Sam just promised he’d try to fix something for me.” Kyle admitted. “But with Kim around, he seems to have lost focus.”

“Hey!” Darla said, “Robin, don’t you have a cute cousin about Sam’s age? Isn’t she looking for a boyfriend? We could get her to distract Sam from Kim!”

“Great idea!” Robin said, and immediately began texting someone, probably her cousin.

“Look, I...”

“Got your back, girlfriend,” Robin said, smiling as she sent several more texts.

Kyle sighed. Could this get any worse? Sam would soon have two girls after him, in heaven, and he’d be stuck as Kylie until Amy got back.

The boys eventually emerged from the game room. Sam walked over to the patio, asking, “So, superhero movie. Are any of you interested in going?”

But Kyle was enjoying the movie, that is until Eli reached his arm and put it around Kyle's shoulder.

Kyle thought that Eli was about to ask for his arm back, and turned his head towards Eli, but was taken entirely by surprise when Eli went in for a kiss. He was so surprised that he froze, while his brain tried to make sense of what was happening. There were a lot of feelings and emotions running through his mind.

It was the quiet gasping and giggling from his right that finally snapped him out of his reverie. Eli pulled away and smiled as he blushed furiously, sinking into his seat and hoping that he'd be swallowed into it.

...No such luck.

After the movie ended, Kyle immediately broke off from the group and rushed towards the restrooms, with Melissa and Darla quickly following behind as he overheard Eli mentioning to Liam that "Kylie is a great kisser." He really hoped that Eli wouldn't say anything to Sam, given that he was too preoccupied playing tonsil hockey with Kim to notice anything going on in the movie, let alone anything going on several seats away.

"That was your first kiss, wasn't it?" Darla asked. "You can tell us, don't be ashamed."

"It..." Kyle started.

Kyle had kissed a few girls, but that was definitely his first kiss with another boy, and unfortunately, his brain wasn't firing on all cylinders, given the stress he was under.

"I guess it was." Kyle muttered.

"At least it was someone you know." Melissa said. "I think my first kiss was at a party, spin the bottle or something, and they meant so little that I can't remember who it was."

"And you'll have practice for your date." Darla added.

"Oh god..." Kyle had forgotten about that.

"God, I hate her..." Kyle sighed.

They peeled off the clothing he'd fallen asleep in, releasing and grabbing in a symphony of motorization until he was stripped down to his bare nothings. The dirty clothing was catalogued as new entries to the closet registry and shunted through a vacuum tube to the laundry room.

And there Kyle hung, like a marionette with robot wires, still fast asleep as whirring hard drives and flickering logic boards decided his fate. After running through its algorithms, cross-referencing between Amy's schedule and interests as well as countless other points of data, the computer calculated the optimal way to rouse its Mistress from her slumber in the best possible way for her to greet the sunny summer day.

From one of the many compartments within the depths of the closet, MARCI extracted Amy's swim gear. Arms released Kyle's legs to allow a one-piece swimsuit to be pulled up, clamping back once the fabric had passed. It was a form-fitting material that offered full coverage for optimal aquatic aerodynamics. MARCI encountered some trouble in getting the shoulder straps over his arms, but the material was stretchy and soon complied.

A light vacuum pulled Kyle's hair into the helmet as miniscule armatures secured it into a makeshift updo/bun. To protect its mistress' hair from the harsh pool chemicals, a spider-like arm descended baring a stretched-out latex pool cap. With a delicacy that human effort could never replicate, its arms contracted until the cap was nestled snugly on Kyle's head with no more warning than a slight pressure around his temples.

As the system worked, sensors noted the unusual amount of hair on its mistress' body. Not a great amount, but a clear derivation from other recent data. Taking proactive action, a wide laser quickly swept up and down Kyle's limp body, vaporizing each and every hair as it went. The beam even passed through the swimsuit material, eliminating what little chest hair was underneath into less than dust.

Hydraulic pistons in the floor parted the tiles to reveal an angled tunnel leading off to some unknown destination. With a final act of delicacy, the arms placed Kyle onto the tube, crossed his arms over his chest, and let go.

Kyle slid down the chute as cleanly as if it were greased, right up until the moment where the slide ended above the indoor pool.

"Good morning, Mistress Amy," MARCI stated again over Kyle's sputtering gasps, "Today's selection for your pre-breakfast aerobic exercise is swimming, in accordance with Master Mark's guidelines for oversleeping. Please perform a minimum of twenty laps to ensure sufficient aerobic activity and proper wakefulness. Breakfast shall be served upon your completion."

Kyle heard none of it as his mind and body still struggled to figure out just what was going on. Eventually, he managed to calm down and take stock of his surroundings. He was wet, and definitely not in the room where he'd fallen asleep. He then remembered his Uncle's comment from the other day about how some of the guest bedrooms had been converted into a pool. A quick look around confirmed that hypothesis. The whole room was a fairly large sized pool, the edges decorated with patterned blue and white tiles. But that still didn't explain why he was in it. And for that matter, what in the world was he wearing?

Kyle glanced down as best he could while keeping his head above water. It was some kind of bodysuit that encased him in lycra from shoulder to crotch. The material was lime green with loosely arranged swirls and arcs of yellow. Some kind of swimsuit, obviously, but not like one he'd ever seen around the public pool. Maybe it was meant for competitive racing? It did look similar to something he vaguely remembered from the last Olympics. Still, just because it was stretchy didn't mean it fit well. It was tight around the crotch, flattening down everything beneath it, yet simultaneously riding up his crack. Whatever it was, he decided to remove the uncomfortable garment.

The moment he tried to pull down the straps, however, the fabric seemed to stiffen. He tried again from the bottom. Maybe he could shimmy a leg out. "Skinny-dipping is not allowed during morning exercise," MARCI announced, "Please perform a minimum of twenty laps to ensure sufficient aerobic activity and proper wakefulness."

"Hey!" he shouted, thankful that he might finally get some information, "What's the big deal dropping me in the pool?"

"Swimming was selected for today's morning aerobic exercise." MARCI repeated, "Please perform a minimum of twenty-"

"Yeah, I heard you," he interrupted. Kyle continued to tread water, as the floor was just deep enough to be out of reach. What a pain this was. Uncle Mark had said that the system was a long-standing work-in-progress. This must be one of its bugs. That or someone had forgotten to turn off an automated system. Like a really wet alarm clock.

He sighed. Strange athletic suit aside, it wasn't all that bad. He knew he could do with a bit of exercise. Maybe it'd be better to just go ahead and do the laps? On the other hand, MARCI was supposed to be pretty advanced. Maybe he could talk her into something else?
